I even walked to Leblon from there in under 40 minutes. 

The hosts met me up front and helped me with my luggage. They don't speak English, but are very charming and helpful, so we communicated via (Hidden by Airbnb) Translate, using (Hidden by Airbnb) .

The building is slightly older. One day there was no water in the building due to maintenance. The hosts warned me about this, there was nothing they could do and I was prepared. Only issue is that after the water came back, because of the older pipes, it was brown for a little while, just have to let the taps run for several minutes. 

The bed isn't the most comfortable for an extended stay (I was there for eight nights), but for short durations it's fine. 

There is a washing machine in the apartment, it works great, I dried my clothes by hanging them on chairs, hooks, etc. 

The WiFi is strong and reliable. 

There is a grocery store and a couple of reasonably priced restaurants on the block, as well as two different banks. Excellent for visitors. A drug store is also available on the next block at the corner. 

Overall the inconveniences were small and the positives of this location was great. "}, {'_id': '105153541', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '10038496', 'reviewer_id': '81173012', 'reviewer_name': 'Maureen', 'comments': 'Ana and Jose were wonderful hosts. Al lado de la puerta de entrada había un supermercado con buenos precios y hay muchas tiendas de diferentes tipos alrededor.
El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy acogedor y para nada caluroso. Hay un ventilador de techo en el living para la cama que está allí y un ventilador y aire acondicionado para la cama de dos plazas en la habitación. El departamento estaba muy limpio apenas llegamos, con todo en su lugar. Teníamos todo a nuestra disposición, todo bien ordenado.
Valeria nos recibió en la entrada y nos entregó las llaves en mano, nos explicó todo paso a paso del departamento. Su llavero tenía una tarjeta de descuento para el supermercado, ella nos lo prestó y nos sirvió mucho para hacer las compras. Valeria fue de gran ayuda en todo momento. Previo a llegar se contactó conmigo, también durante la estadía por si necesitábamos algo y previo a nuestra partida. Cuando la contactábamos, teníamos respuesta rápida. Eso nos hizo sentir muy cómodos y nos ayudó.

[{'_id': '61992538', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10051164', 'reviewer_id': '25802720', 'reviewer_name': 'Izabella', 'comments': 'A Beatriz foi bastante atenciosa e respondia as minhas dúvidas muito rapidamente antes da viagem. O bairro do Catete tem uma localização boa, conseguimos ir para a Lapa à pé e também para outros lugares como o aterro e a praia do Flamengo durante o carnaval. A estação de metrô também é perto e tem várias opções de alimentação muito próximas à casa. O layout da casa assemelha-se à um hostel, o quarto que eu fiquei tem tamanho excelente para 4 pessoas e tem ar condicionado, o que faz muita diferença com o calor que está no Rio de Janeiro. Existem 4 banheiros, que são suficientes para o número de pessoas que cabem na casa, entretanto durante todos os dias que passei lá, o banheiro não foi limpo nenhuma vez, por sorte os hóspedes estavam mantendo-o em condições de uso, mas seria importante limpar o banheiro de vez em quando. \r\nOutro ponto importante é que os quartos são ligados por uma porta que não tem fechadura e é bem fina, ou seja, a privacidade não é garantida e o barulho de um quarto pode ser ouvido perfeitamente no outro.\r\nO preço é justo pelo que é oferecido, seria importante apenas melhorar a limpeza e verificar se é possível fechar a comunicação dos quartos.'}]

[{'_id': '63474829', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10201975', 'reviewer_id': '55293753', 'reviewer_name': 'Marina', 'comments': 'O apartamento é perfeito! Se o apartamento já é tudo de bom, a anfitriã o torna ainda melhor. Ich konnte die Wohnung zur vereinbarten Zeit haben. Anderson, ein Mitarbeiter von Barbara, zeigte mir alles in der Wohnung und wie es funktioniert (Klimaanlage, Fernseher, Dusche, etc.) und er gab mir sehr gute Tips, wie ich am besten zu den Sehenswuerdigkeiten in Rio komme.
Das Appartement befindet sich in einer sicheren Gegend und man hat ca 400 - 500 m zum Strand Ipanema. Es gibt einige Gaststaetten und kleine Supermärkte in der Nähe.
Die Ausstattung des Appartements ist sehr gut - 1 Hauptbad und 1 kleines separates, komplette Küche, TV in Wohnzimmer und Schlafzimmer, etc. Es ist wie auf den Fotos bei Airbnb dargestellt. Die Fotos haben dabei infolge der Beleuchtung einen leichten Gelbton. Im Original ist alles etwas heller.

[{'_id': '117000723', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10267144', 'reviewer_id': '4430560', 'reviewer_name': 'Nikolai', 'comments': 'Cesar goes well above and beyond to make his guests feel comfortable. He personally greeted me, recommended some restaurants (I went to one and had amazing sushi) and showed patiently how the pool and refrigerator work. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures. I especially loved the rooftop with 360 view. I really had a good chance to relax and unwind in Cesars place. One thing to mention is that the apartment has a great energy all round, I would highly recommend it to anyone. '}, {'_id': '122875195', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10267144', 'reviewer_id': '4430560', 'reviewer_name': 'Nikolai', 'comments': 'This is my second time staying at Cesars place, this time for about a week. The reason I came back is because besides marvelous view and the setup the place has this amazing energy which is especially rejuvenating after a stressful work period back in NYC. Wherever you are in the apartment your eyes are almost constantly facing the green if the trees, water and the Christo statue in the background which is very relaxing. 

During my starving was around 35C in Rio so I spend a good time in the pool which is very deep, clean and enjoyable. Tivesse so good I barely went to the gym which is literally minutes away. 

Cesar was super kind, he is definitely not your regular Airbnb host. As he knows I like to cook potatoes he showed me how to cook Mandioca Brazilian potatoes with shrimps. It was an unforgettable cooking and gastronomic experience. 

I will certainly come back again next time I am in Ipanema. '}, {'_id': '127837850', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 21, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10267144', 'reviewer_id': '71799343', 'reviewer_name': 'Dudu', 'comments': 'Excelente localização, seguro e tranquilo. O apto é maravilhoso. Excelente vista e as fotos correspondem fielmente ao local! O anfitrião é muito atencioso, pontual e tudo muito bem detalhado! Vale a pena mesmo! [{'_id': '74608112', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '10383490', 'reviewer_id': '70996760', 'reviewer_name': 'Gioconda', 'comments': '
Luana é ótima anfitriã, me senti em casa. Compartilhamento de áreas em comum, cozinha, sala sem problemas. Quarto limpo com armário grande e espaço suficiente. E o melhor de tudo, pertinho de onde eu precisava ir, fui e voltei caminhando, o bairro estava tranquilo.
Antes de ir ao Rio, nos comunicamos por celular, e ela pode me dar as direções de como chegar ao apartamento. No final, gentilmente se ofereceu para me apanhar no Terminal Rodoviário, a caminho de volta do trabalho. Achei ótimo, por não conhecer a malha viária urbana por lá. 
Conversamos muito, achei muito interessante.

  '}]

Great pool and sauna too.'}, {'_id': '211600956', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 11, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10411341', 'reviewer_id': '31205518', 'reviewer_name': 'Guilherme', 'comments': 'O apartamento é incrível. Fica no coração de Ipanema, a poucas quadras da praia e muito próximo da Lagoa. Na região, muitas lojas legais, bares para curtir o final de tarde e restaurantes deliciosos; tem estação de metrô a 50 metros do apartamento. A região é muita tranquila e segura, perfeita para uma caminhada matinal ou desbravar o bairro. O espaço da Liliane é realmente como na descrição, com quartos amplos (os dois são Suites), cozinha equipada e uma ótima área de lazer, com piscina e hidromassagem que podem ser usadas pelos hóspedes.  A Liliane foi muito atenciosa, desde antes do checkin; ela tem boas indicações de resultantes e lugares para conhecer na região. O apartamento deixou minha viagem do Rio mais linda. Siempre que consulté algo tuve respuesta inmediata de Liliane.'}, {'_id': '368867514', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10411341', 'reviewer_id': '6952854', 'reviewer_name': 'Gilles', 'comments': 'Just perfect. The liliane apartment is ideal, it has all the necessary comfort for a pleasant stay. Very well located. Liliane is very responsive which is very appreciable. I would return with great pleasure. Thank you very much Liliane.'}, {'_id': '404033763', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 22, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10411341', 'reviewer_id': '36129957', 'reviewer_name': 'Danilo', 'comments': 'Prós:
- O lugar é muito bem localizado, rodeado de ruas importantes e com bons restaurantes, além de ser tranquilo e suficientemente perto da praia (5 min andando)
- por telefone percebi que a anfitriã é bem simpática 
- o lugar é espaçoso e as camas grandes e confortáveis 

Contras:
- depois da primeira mensagem (quando o pagamento ainda estava pendente) a anfitriã parou de responder,  apesar de termos feito mais de um pedido de resposta. Uma consequência disso eh que tive que gastar 30 euros com ligações telefônicas usando um chip francês quando cheguei no aeroporto para me comunicar com ela e perguntar coisas básicas que não foram informadas: número da rua, com quem pegaríamos a chave, o horário em que poderíamos entrar etc
- além disso, apesar de ter usado o Airbnb inúmeras vezes, essa é a primeira vez que ninguém nos recebeu. Não vimos a anfitriã ou a agência que ela contrata ou outra pessoa em nenhum momento. Nós chegamos, pedimos as chaves ao porteiro, a maneira de abrir a garagem, onde estacionar, por onde entrar quando chegamos da praia etc. Fomos perguntando quando as dúvidas surgiam pq ninguém nos fez uma apresentação do lugar. Eles vendem um serviço como se fosse um produto, e sem muito atendimento ao cliente.
- o lugar estava empoeirado. Nitidamente ninguém realizou uma limpeza previa à nossa chegada. Não era nada gritante,  mas bolas de poeira e sujeira no chão do quarto e embaixo dos móveis podiam ser vistas com facilidade
- a cafeteira estava quebrada, e como eu não tinha muita esperança de que alguém se dispusesse a ir até lá, resolvi comprar uma cafeteira por 80 reais, que depois deixamos com familiares no RJ. O objetivo não era de comprá-la, mas devido aos fatos expostos acima fizemos um cálculo de custo/benefícios e nos resignamos na compra de uma cafeteira que não precisaríamos depois
- o ar condicionado dos quartos tem apenas dois modos: desligado ou frio glacial, o que nos força a ligar e desligar constantemente pra manter uma temperatura razoável, inclusive no meio da noite. Em um dos quartos ele é bem barulhento. O ar condicionado da sala também tem dois modos apenas: desligado ou fraquinho, o que é particularmente chato quando se está na cozinha quente que não se resfria com ele (a cozinha é americana e dá sobre a sala)
- por último, mas isso é menos importante pq a piscina fecha cedo, quando alguém nada nela uma das varandas treme bastante, o que reverbera sobre o quarto, fazendo um barulho como se alguém no andar de cima estivesse pulando.

Em resumo, o apartamento em si é bom, mas a ausência quase total de manutenção e alguém pra auxiliar com coisas tão simples como apresentar o lugar, informar horários, dizer o endereço exato, dizer as regras do lugar, substituir uma cafeteira quebrada ou limpar o apartamento de vez em quando faz com que ele esteja caro para o serviço prestado.

Esperamos ter ajudado outras pessoas a tomar uma escolha sábia, e também esperamos que a anfitriã  se torne mais presente na plataforma e pressione a agência que ela contrata para melhorar determinados pontos do serviço proposto.

Danilo & Marine'}]

[{'_id': '62041136', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10570041', 'reviewer_id': '36360293', 'reviewer_name': 'Hein', 'comments': 'Nice apartment! We needed an apartment during carnival and this was perfect. Good bed, bedroom had good AC. Two bathrooms. Big kitchen with huge fridge. Very big balcony. Nice common swimming pool. The neighborhood was even nicer than expected. Right next to the Jardim Botanico, many restaurants in this street and in the Rua Pacheco Leao. The Zona Sul, an upmarket supermarket indeed around the corner (corner Rua Jardim Botanico and Rua Pacheco Leao). We very much liked La Biciclette for breakfast, it is a French bakery on the corner of Rua Pacheco Leao and Rua Von Martius. Also we liked the restaurant SOBE in the Rua Pacheco Leao. Good starters, great view on the Christ as it is partly an open-air restaurant. Roberta and her sister were very nice for us.'}, {'_id': '64130564', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 29, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10570041', 'reviewer_id': '9094470', 'reviewer_name': 'Nubia', 'comments': '  Roberta muito atenciosa,  disponível, tranquila e sensata, aceita conselhos, e isso para mim conta muito...Apartamento super confortável no Jardim Botânico que eu amo, e a posição do apartamento é maravilhoso, tem o que precisamos dentro de uma casa... rua  tranquila. perto de tudo. If you're visiting Rio, it's a great base, in a lovely neighbourhood. Two things to keep in mind - it's really quite a small space (standard for Rio, but perhaps a surprise for guests who arrive from outside Brazil) and you hear a lot of street noise, so it's perhaps not ideal for light sleepers. We would stay here again!"}, {'_id': '337139594', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 10, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '10570041', 'reviewer_id': '16183107', 'reviewer_name': 'Antonio', 'comments': 'O apartamento entrega tudo aquilo que promete embora seja um pouco barulhento por conta do ônibus que passa na porta. The place is cozy and immaculate. Other than the bed being a bit stiff, I loved being in the apartment. The water was hot, the wi-fi worked perfectly. The only negative that I had about the room was the noise. 

The unit is situated on the 2nd floor of the building right outside a busy street. Every night around midnight, two bars would open up across the and start blaring music. The music would not stop until 8am the next morning. I ended up having to buy a white noise machine just to last through the night.

The only other feedback I had was around Fabio, the host. All of the reviews mentioned how responsive and helpful he was. However that was not the case for me. The day I booked, I couldn't get him to respond to the booking. I even had to have AirBnB call him. And then I asked him about touring the city. Instead of offering, he pointed me to a few self serve options. When I asked again, he said he would plan a trip then never responded. When I responded to him, he said he was too busy and my trip was over. 

Fabio being my tour guide is not a huge requirement, but I had thought he would be more willing (or suggest someone), given the feedback people had for him o this site.

All in all, great place if you don't mind the noise and don't need a helpful host. "}, {'_id': '20179968', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 9, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '5051864', 'reviewer_name': 'Armelle', 'comments': 'Fabio a été adorable.

Muy recomendado.'}, {'_id': '55929191', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '25798292', 'reviewer_name': 'Katherine', 'comments': "Avenida pra do júnior is a really interesting street! During a week there was live samba and then a small orchestra playing right outside our window.

Very close to several supermarkets, bars and restaurants, bus stops and of course Copacabana beach. 

The apartment was very clean (if a little dark because there's only one window) the mattress was really comfortable, air conditioning worked really well. Fabio was a helpful host with giving suggestions about where to go all around Rio on a map."}, {'_id': '56599424', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 15, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '3762101', 'reviewer_name': 'Graeme & Ros', 'comments': 'Unfortunately we were a little late meeting up with Fabio due to the fact that we asked the information desk at the airport how to find the airport shuttle bus and they dircected us to "a blue bus service" (which turned out to be the local bus and took about 2 and a half hours to get to Copacabana Beach in the traffic).  Fabio was understanding about our delay but we were a bit embarassed that we had kept him waiting.  The apartment was  centrally located (within walking distance to the beach), clean, modern, and compact with 24 hour security.  We don't speak any Portugese but Fabio was able to communicate with us in English and was extremely helpful in providing all relavant information including a map.  He suggested restaurants, how to purchase tickets for tourist attractions and marked most things out on the map.  He also suggested visiting the hippy markets that are open on Sundays - which we really enjoyed.  Fabio was a wonderful, helpful host and it was obvious he wanted us to enjoy his apartment and our trip to Rio.  Only bug bear was spare towels (ie none are provided).  Our bath towels got wet after the 1st day and although we hung them out to dry on the balcony - they didn't really get dry.  I think the problem was a little to do with us - we had just finished a cruise and linen was plentiful so we became a little spoilt - anyway we adjusted our routine (used the hand towels) so it wasn't a major problem.  Rio was fantastic, a really interesting place to visit.  I am sure anyone wishing to go to the Olympics stay at Fabio's - he is very helpful.  He arranged our transport getting back to the airport which worked out perfectly.  Thanks Fabio for the wonderful stay - love love loved it!  Ros & Graeme Ston (Website hidden by Airbnb)'}, {'_id': '57285039', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 24, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '23194711', 'reviewer_name': 'Rafael', 'comments': 'Barbaridade, o apartamento é tao lindo quanto esta nas fotos . Farmácias do lado. Padaria.  O fabio foi extremamente atencioso.  Ficou 1:30 conversando e nos explicando as melhores coisas do rio de (Website hidden by Airbnb) a maior paciência. e nem é obrigação, mas ele é guia e aproveitou para fazer esta gentileza.  Nota 1000!! '}, {'_id': '57766926', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 29, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '46869765', 'reviewer_name': 'Naomi', 'comments': 'My friend and I enjoyed our stay at this cute apartment! She slept on a bed, I slept on a sofa bed in the living room very comfortably. Good shower, I made coffee in some mornings (machine and ground coffee provided), there are 2 water jugs in the fridge which made it easy for us to hydrate everyday in hot summer.

I would point out that there is only 1 toilet paper provided- we had to go get some, a drugstore is half a block away on the same side of the street. And as some people have already mentioned there are 2 sets of towels (bath & face) for 2 people, no extras. But there is a washer/ dryer in the kitchen if you need to fresh them up, no problem.

Fabio was very nice and helpful person. Location was safe and convenient, I would stay here again!'}, {'_id': '59028983', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 6, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '4212901', 'reviewer_name': 'Paul & Shantini', 'comments': 'We stayed in this apartment for 7 nights over in NYE and loved it. Awesome location a block and a half from Copacabana beach, within walking distance to Galeto Sats (order the garlic bread!) and Cervantes which we ate at a couple of times and highly recommend. Felt safe in this area, the apartment is hated up with a doorman present at all times. The apartment itself is bigger than what the pictures depict. Nice bathroom, spacious shower area with large rainshower, great water pressure, lots of hot water. Lots of plates, cutlery, glasses etc (we ate a lot of takeaway in the apartment). The 2-in-1 washer/dryer was a blessing as we has tons of washing to do after traveling the rest of South America. two TVs with cable channels in English. Finally, Fabio is reliable and super helpful. He orientated us well into the apartment and Rio, drawing points of interests on a map for us which was our bible in Rio. Highly recommended apartment and highly recommended landlord/agent to deal with. '}, {'_id': '60115645', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '42550193', 'reviewer_name': 'Herve', 'comments': "Merci Fabio

Option prise en charge a l'aéroport pour le logement super et résonable ainsi que le retour.
Petite critique prévoir de plat style saladier.

"}, {'_id': '60751349', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '43126004', 'reviewer_name': 'Guilherme', 'comments': 'Apartamento com ótima localização. O Fábio foi muito atencioso e pontual na nossa chegada. Mostrou todo apartamento e indicou os pontos turísticos mais interessantes.

'}, {'_id': '61973177', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '2367398', 'reviewer_name': 'Nadya', 'comments': "We stayed about 10 days in Fabio's appartment. '}, {'_id': '139087963', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '5228340', 'reviewer_name': 'Consuelo', 'comments': "Excelente departamento ubicado en un lugar privilegiado: a una cuadra de la playa de Copacabana, a cinco cuadras del metro, con casa de cambios abajo; farmacia al lado y muy central para ir a Ipanema, Centro, Pan de Azúcar, Urca, etc. Todo impecable, con sábanas y toallas blancas. Como si fuera un muy buen hotel. 
Ojo con las opciones para comer cerca: Lanches Hiper Mate (al frente) para desayunos con jugos y sándwich misto quente; Churrasqueria Palace a cinco cuadras; Cervantes, un clásico, para sándwiches de cerdo y piña; y el mejor dato de todos: GALETO SAT'S a solo dos cuadras, excelente precio/calidad, pollo a la brasa (galeto) insuperable y picanha espectacular. Muy barato, abre todos los días hasta las 5 am.
Sin duda volveré.
"}, {'_id': '149511355', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 5, 4, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1063491', 'reviewer_id': '14163155', 'reviewer_name': 'Marco', 'comments': 'El departamento de Fabio esta muy bien ubicado en uno de los mejores sectores de Copacabana. [{'_id': '62023499', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '10648267', 'reviewer_id': '54459865', 'reviewer_name': 'Igor', 'comments': 'Dona Sonia foi uma excelente anfitriã. O apto estava impecável, sem nada a reclamar. Ela inclusive deixou água e cervejas gelada na geladeira, camas arrumadas, toalhas no banheiro, novos sabonetes e até alguns remédios em caso de emergência. Também se ofereceu  para ajudar várias vezes e se mostrou 100% a disposição. \r\n\r\nO apto é perfeito: amplo, arejado, muiiiito bem localizado. Há 1 quadra da praia, rodeado de bares, bons restaurantes, lanchonetes, healthy foods, hamburguerias, temakerias etc. Garantia de economia de tempo de deslocamentos, porque dá para fazer tudo a pé.'}]

"}, {'_id': '44361137', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '36203543', 'reviewer_name': 'Christopher', 'comments': "This apartment was perfect for me. She's a doll."}, {'_id': '51182855', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 18, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '5885375', 'reviewer_name': 'Karene', 'comments': 'A Silvia é ótima e sempre faz tudo para eu me sentir a vontade!
A descrição do anúncio é igual a realidade e todas as facilidades possíveis.'}, {'_id': '54382214', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '36203543', 'reviewer_name': 'Christopher', 'comments': "I had a terrific second stay at Silvia's apartment.  It was very easy to check and out.  Silvia, with Cristina's help, made me feel right at home.  I discovered even more restaurants and bars during my second visit.  Great place. "}, {'_id': '59036506', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 6, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '25899092', 'reviewer_name': 'Alison', 'comments': 'Overall our stay at Silvia's was great. The apartment's located within a 5 minute walk to many restaurants and bars as well as a 10 minute walk to the beach. The Leblon neighborhood is very safe and the building is also very secure (security guard during the day, tall gate out front, several doors to unlock in order to get into the building). Compared to Ipanema and Copacabana, the neighborhood is quieter and less touristy which made our Rio experience feel more authentic. The only downside is that the apartment is a tight squeeze if you have more than 3-4 people. We had a total of 5 girls and found that the apartment really only slept 4 "comfortably." The bedroom has an AC unit but the main area where the two sofa beds are located only has a fan. We were there during the height of the summer and whoever slept on the couch directly across from the TV had minimal air flow (the fan is directly above the first couch when you enter). While having the patio door opened helped a little, there was not much of a breeze due to the high walls on the patio. I would say that during the cooler months, the apartment sleeps 4 comfortably but during the summer only 3. Other than the air circulation/sleeping arrangement issues I would highly recommend this apartment due to its ideal location. Silvia is also a great host - she was very responsive and was super flexible with our check-in time. Overall we really enjoyed our stay in Rio at Silvia's!'}, {'_id': '61420853', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '31792371', 'reviewer_name': 'Michèle', 'comments': 'Choosing Silvia's apartment was easy, because it reminded me of those lofts in Europe. It's very well decorated, bright, confortable and had all the amenities necessary for my 3 week stay. 
I travelled by myself from Perth, Australia, after 5 years away from Rio, to visit one of my sons, granddaughter and friends.  Leblon is the perfect place to be for holidays or business, and this apartment is 3 short blocs away from the beach, while supermarket, amazing bakeries, restaurants, "lanchonetes", are just around the corner, 1 to 5 minutes away.  
The one bedroom apartment is exactly how t's described, on the street level of an old building and has a very charming terrace. During the day, there are two nice gentlemen, "porteiros", who take care of the entrance and us :). They keep the building safe and very clean. At night, the residents and I had the appropriate keys to lock the main gate outside and the main building door. Very safe building and apartment. I did not have any issues and all the residents were very kind and polite. Brazilians are amazing people. 
Leblon is also very central, close to Ipanema  and Gávea (both walking distance), Copacabana, Barra da Tijuca, the city and many touristic attractions. 
Silvia was fantastic since the begining. She always answered promply my emails, even with the 11 hours difference between Australia and Brazil. She was at the apartment at my arrival to give me informations, details about internet etc. Superb!
Sheets and towels were changed every week without a problem and I only had a problem with the internet once, which Silvia came to the apartment straight away and we discovered that I had disconected the wrong plug out of the wall. My mistake! 
I will definetly go back to the same place in the near future with my husband and adult son. 
Thank you Silvia. 
Muito obrigada, um beijo e até breve.
Michèle'}, {'_id': '62097300', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '55470365', 'reviewer_name': 'Mauricio', 'comments': 'Apartamento bom, de forma geral, e com localização muito boa. 
Ponto para melhoria: Ar condicionado do quarto que é muito antigo, barulhento e não funciona bem.
Silvia e marido estiveram à disposição para ajudar no necessário.
Recomendaria para até no máximo 3 pessoas.
'}, {'_id': '63927274', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1163119', 'reviewer_id': '4041204', 'reviewer_name': 'Jonathan & Janie', 'comments': 'Both Silvia and the apartment were great! TLDR: if you want to stay in that part of the city, I strongly recommend considering that apartment."}, {'_id': '95943115', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11695437', 'reviewer_id': '32290254', 'reviewer_name': 'Emily', 'comments': 'Our time in Rio staying at Dejanira's apartment was fantastic, I personally don't think that the photos do the property justice and feel that in person the property is actually bigger! The facilities were fantastic and we enjoyed using the pool (which is also a lot bigger in person) which has stunning views over Rio, including Christ the Redeemer on Corcovado mountain. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and learnt our faces immediately so we had no problem at all gaining access to the very secure apartment (the staff buzz you in the gates via CCTV). The neighbourhood is more downtown Rio and if you like a good night out it will be perfect for you. We didn't feel that the neighbourhood was the safest of areas in Rio, but then again anywhere in Rio during the night isn't the safest place to be. The noise from the street at night was sometimes a little loud especially on Fridays and Saturdays which are extremely busy times in Lapa however we understand that this noise is unavoidable and inevitable. It must also be taken into consideration that we were in Rio for the busiest two weeks of the year, during the 2016 Olympics, a time when at night there were hundreds of thousands of tourists on the streets as well as the locals! Despite this as soon as we entered the double electronic gated apartment block we felt completely at ease and safe and during or time in Rio we spent one of the day's exploring Lapa, admiring its arches and the colourful artwork and graffiti that the locality had to offer. The apartment was perfect for us, size, location, accessibility were all excellent. Our neighbours were very friendly and helpful and would always say "good morning" and "good evening" in the elevator throughout the day. There was a very convenient supermarket just 1 minutes  walk from the apartment and the kitchen had everything you could possible need. If however you prefer to eat out, Lapa has many excellent bars and restaurants and so does Copacabana and Ipanena if you want to travel a little further away. The shower was particularly excellent-hot water was always in abundance. This apartment had everything we wanted and we couldn't have asked for a better place to stay during our time spent in Rio De Janeiro for the Olympics. If and when we ever return to Rio Dejanira's apartment is the only option for us and we would love to stay there again.'}, {'_id': '103267553', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11695437', 'reviewer_id': '67209131', 'reviewer_name': 'Flávio', 'comments': 'Excelente! [{'_id': '91392592', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11740322', 'reviewer_id': '13788795', 'reviewer_name': 'Jade', 'comments': "One of our favourite airbnb stays. Rafaela and Edson are amazing hosts and made it a great stay. The house is quite tucked away and is really nice! The room was great, very clean and it had one of the best kitchens for guests to use that we've had. Overall, a fantastic stay with lovely hosts. 100% recommend."}, {'_id': '93402712', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11740322', 'reviewer_id': '17518364', 'reviewer_name': 'Nathalie', 'comments': 'Rafaela y Edson son los mejores anfitriones, tanto que me hicieron sentir parte de la familia. La casa es maravillosa, se nota que la arreglaron con todo el amor.

Tienes la opción de quedarte en un cuarto privado compartiendo baño como hice yo, o compartir cuarto o tener un cuarto con baño. Cualquiera de las opciones funciona muy bien.

Tiene cocina y un comedor súper acogedor donde pasamos noches conversando, en todos los idiomas posibles. 

La casa queda en un sector que a mi me gustó mucho, la estación más cercana del metro queda a 15 minutos caminando pero si no quieres caminar hay un bus que te lleva hasta el metro. Quedan cerca supermercados y restaurantes. Está a cuatro estaciones de metro de la playa de Copacabana. 

Para el objetivo que yo tenía funcionó de maravilla, estar todo el día fuera y llegar a dormir a un lugar tranquilo y acogedor.

Los recomiendo 100%, son amables, divertidos, serviciales. 

Conocerlos a ellos y a los otros huéspedes es lo que recordaré con más cariño de mi viaje a Rio!'}, {'_id': '94069981', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 14, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11740322', 'reviewer_id': '23129249', 'reviewer_name': 'Maria Do Socorro De', 'comments': 'A Rafaela preocupou-se em diferentes momentos em me tranquilizar quanto à estadia. '}, {'_id': '89635862', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 7, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11939367', 'reviewer_id': '21446390', 'reviewer_name': 'Ye', 'comments': '非常棒的一次住宿!
1.房东人很好,是个超棒的老太太,拿着谷歌翻译跟我对话,详细介绍了房间,还给准备了糖果､饮料,相当贴心｡
2.关于地段,Barra 区算是里约的新区和富人区,在里约的南边,人不多,而且算是安全的一块区域了,这个住处的周围全是酒店和小区,紧挨着大西洋,超长海岸线,平时当地人都会去海滩玩耍｡主干道上巴士也很多,想打车去旁边的酒店门口就有很多车在等着,还算方便｡就是在吃的上不太方便｡周围是有几家餐馆,我吃过一家买墨西哥卷的,一般般还不便宜,其他的没吃过但我感觉都不是便宜的主,最近的麦当劳有一千多米,说近不近说远不远,比较尴尬的距离｡附近有几个大的 mall 但都得坐公交或打车去｡
3.关于房间,一个独立房间双人床,带一个独立卫生间,有电视,能看到海,相当不错,主要一天才一百多人民币(可能记错了,但也差不多),在物价不低的里约来说相当便宜了｡
综上,非常推荐这里!

Highly recommend the room!

'}, {'_id': '106323754', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 10, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11939367', 'reviewer_id': '93125486', 'reviewer_name': 'Aba', 'comments': 'It’s my first AirBNB experience ever and I couldn’t be happier to have spent it at Mama Fatima’s house!

[{'_id': '94417272', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '11945972', 'reviewer_id': '66055760', 'reviewer_name': 'Deborah', 'comments': "Luiz and family met us when we arrived in Rio and drove us to the house. [{'_id': '95481550', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12088301', 'reviewer_id': '60620196', 'reviewer_name': 'Brevonda', 'comments': 'I was in Brazil for the Summer Olympics as a volunteer and I needed to be close to the Olympic Stadium (Engenhão). This home was perfect only 25 min by bus.

Kayanh and his family were awesome. He was great in making me feel at home, I left feeling like family. He took me on a tour of Rio on my first day and showed me everything to do in Rio. He was so accommodating and made me feel at home when I first arrived. Kayanh far exceeded my expectations. The home is so beautiful (I called it the tree house). The bedroom has everything- TV, fans, zoned air conditioning. The bathroom was awesome too. Everything was very well decorated and very clean. The neighborhood was great. It was in a very private, quiet neighborhood, close to the BRT and the area is very convenient, everything is in a walkable distance if you like walking. 

Kayanh home is 35-40 min from the airport by car and 1 hour from Centro Brazil, if you do not mind travelling by public transportation all the tourist areas are accessible.   

Kayanh and his family are the best hosts that you could ever ask for. I only speak English, and Kayanh spoke Portuguese and English which was a tremendous advantage. 

Kayanh and his family are 5 star hosts. '}]

[{'_id': '71357921', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 4, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12091894', 'reviewer_id': '37402443', 'reviewer_name': 'Danielle', 'comments': 'O apartamento do Armando é lindo, muito bem localizado e super bem equipado. Não senti falta de nada e foi muito confortável estar a duas quadras do posto 8 em ipanema. 
O Armando é uma pessoa muito fácil de lidar, não tive nenhum problema com ele nem com a hospedagem. Ele é muito disponível e tudo foi resolvido facilmente. 
A porta com fechadura digital traz comodidade pra gente não precisar carregar chave e também nem precisamos nos encontrar pessoalmente para isso. 
A varanda com churrasqueira e ducha também foram um plus, um ambiente muito gostoso prum dia em que a família chegou bem cansada! '}, {'_id': '75947728', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12091894', 'reviewer_id': '69495455', 'reviewer_name': 'Igor', 'comments': 'Eu e meus amigos alugamos o Ap do Armando durante um final de semana e estava tudo perfeito. [{'_id': '307212', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 6, 10, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '287354', 'reviewer_name': 'Rasmus', 'comments': "This is a great little apartment on a quiet tree-lined street about two and a half blocks from the beach.  It is close to everything including the Siqueira Campos Metro stop which is a big plus if you need to get to downtown Rio. There are parts of Copacabana that are quite a trek from the Metro. There are all sorts of restaurants within a block in all directions and of course the beach a 5-minute walk away.

Everything is brand new and the apartment feels modern and cozy at the same time. It is however quite small. I was there by myself for 4 nights and it was perfect. Great for a couple as well if you get along really well. I wouldn't try to put 3 people in this place. When the bed is unfolded there is very little floor space left. The little space there is actually feels a lot bigger because it is very organized. It is easy to keep tidy since there is really only one place to put each thing. The handy apartment guide shows you where things go, how to unfold the sofa into the various configurations, and has some tips on the area. 

There is both wired and wireless Internet which was fast and worked perfectly for me. There is a nice little flat screen TV with satellite channels and easily accessible hdmi ports so you can hook up your laptop and play your own content. Sometimes wall-mounted flat screens make it really hard to get to the hdmi ports, but not in this case.

Note that power outlets in Brazil come in about 4 different flavours and you can never really be sure whether it is 110V or 220V. So bring adapters and make sure anything you plug in won't be fried by being plugged into a 220V outlet. In this apartment all (and there are surprisingly many) the outlets are IEC-906-1 type plugs at 220V. It is 3-pronged but still 2-prong Europlug compatible so if you are coming from most of Europe you won't need adapters. If you are coming from North America, bring some regular US-Euro adapters.

The view of Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer statue) is especially nice at sunset and in the evening when it is lit up. There is a shot of it at sunset taken from the window of the apartment here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Alan and Catherine were lightning quick to respond and made the process extremely smooth.

All in all this was a perfect and relaxing 4 nights in Copacabana for me."}, {'_id': '337941', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 6, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '673310', 'reviewer_name': 'Mercedes', 'comments': 'Hola a todos!! Estuvimos en el Studio Apartment de Catherine y Alan a fines de junio de 2011 con mi marido. Fue una excelente elección, gracias Alan y Catherine!!
La UBICACION del depto es ideal, ya que estás cerca de todo (queda en Capacabana) y te podés mover en omnibus a todos lados sin problema.
La ZONA es muy seguro, tranquila y con lugares para comer y comprar comida cerca. Siempre nos sentimos MUY seguros.
El DEPARTAMENTO está buenísimo! Es tal cual las fotos. Todo nuevo, impecable y con diseño- Está todo pensado hastá el mínimo detalle! Tiene todo lo necesario y más!  El wifi anda perfecto; la pantalla plana es GRANDE, no como dice el comentario de Marcus. El sillón camo es muy cómodo, tanto como sillón tanto como cama(más cómodo que muchas camas de hotel). El baño está impecable!!! El depto está buenísimo para ir con pareja o con un amigo.
Tiene SEGURIDAD LAS 24HS.
ALAN y CATHERINE son muy organizados y amables. Siempre contestaron rapidisimo y nos dieron datos para la llegada que nos sirvieron mucho,  MUCHAS GRACIAS POR COMPARTIR SU CASA EN RIO CON NOSOTROS!!!
LES RECOMENDAMOS a todos los que quieran conocer Rio, quedarse en el Studio Apartmente de Alan y Catherine!!!
Saludos,

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Patricio & Mercedes'}, {'_id': '348679', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 7, 2, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '730928', 'reviewer_name': 'Caroline', 'comments': 'The studio is really nice and comfy, modern and well-equiped in a nice building, in a great area of Rio - its location, a few meters away from Copacabana beach, is really central and convenient. There are a lot of shops, coffee places, bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby, and the area is really safe.
Alan and Catherine have every thing prepared to make of your stay a great time - all you have to do is to enjoy!'}, {'_id': '369955', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 7, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '605979', 'reviewer_name': 'Johnatan Isais', 'comments': 'Pase mucho tiempo buscando por AIRBNB algún lugar en el cual pudiera pasar mis vacaciones. En cuanto vi las fotos del Studio, me di cuenta que era un lugar agradable y acogedor. Cuando me puse en contacto con Alan & Catherine, me di cuenta que eran personas muy amables y atentas. Siempre se mostraron dispuestos a resolver mis dudas y ayudarme a encontrar sitios en Rio de janeiro. El Studio es muy bonito y muy comodo, me gusto la vista que se tiene del Cristo Redentor desde la ventana. Muy recomendalbe el Studio! muy simpatica Lelita y muy cordiales los Porteros! Rio es una ciudad magnifica su gente es muy agradable!'}, {'_id': '398869', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 7, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '640942', 'reviewer_name': 'David', 'comments': "My rating is 5 out of 5!!!!! This studio is simply amazing!

Alan and Catherine's studio is a beautiful place to stay. The creative design and artistic details are inspiringly put together. It is also wonderful because it is situated in the heart of Copa. Very close to the shops, the beach, the metro, and major tourist attractions. Location and design are the perfect combo to make your stay comfortable and rewarding!

Alan is such a kind, polite and thoughtful person! I will not forget his kindness. He went above and beyond to make my stay a happy one. In fact, he went well and beyond my expectations of a land lord. He even helped me organise a taxi to leave and booked it for me. Alan also arranged to get the apartment cleaned mid-stay. I did not ask him to do this. In sum, you could not want nicer person to deal with! Alan is a rare gem! He responds to emails in a timely manner and is a generous, helpful and wonderful!  He thinks of everything to make your stay a happy one!

The apartment building is nice and the couple that work at the door and look after the cleaning are such warm, kind and beautiful Brazilian people!!! They helped me so much with many things. When I arrived my luggage was missing, so they rang the airport and even offered to drive me to the airport! They even helped me go shopping for electrical goods so I could use my computer. Outstanding kindness!!!  It was a joy to come and home and say hello to them on the way to the elevator. I will miss them very much!

The apartment is comfortable because every last detail has been very well considered. Coming from Australia, I found the internet speed very fast and easy to connect. The cable TV is excellent and nice to watch after a long day touring Rio! The kitchen is perfect and is a delightful place to make yummy breakfast etc. The bathroom is very well designed. While the living room and bedroom is a joy to be in due to the artwork and beautiful use of form and light. The use of colour in the studio is visually sophisticated and joyful. I really loved the use of design to create atmosphere and mixed with Brazilian art, this is a real treat to enjoy! Loved it!!!

I really enjoyed dealing with Alan and Catherine. They are perfect hosts and I will be coming back to stay again for sure! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine for letting me stay in your beautiful home. I had the best time and will always remember how lovely your home and your wonderful kindness! 

Thank you!!!!!! "}, {'_id': '432003', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 8, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '798831', 'reviewer_name': 'Penelope', 'comments': 'The pictures really shows what you get: a modern and cozy studio. At first may look tight and small, however the decoration work done by the owners are very smart and find for every single free space an appropriate use. The location also could not be better. Just one remark: the street is very peaceful, but Rio de Janeiro is a very noisy place. And the studio is placed between two very busy streets. Finally, Alan,  Catherine (the owners) and Lelita (the maid) are extremely friendly and attentive. The will do whatever they could to help your stay to be the best. Además esta ubicado en el mejor rincón de Rio, en el centro de Copacabana, con todas sus tiendas, restaurantes, transporte y vida urbana, pero en una calle tranquila y silenciosa. Un lujo.

Alan and Catherine were extremely helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Everything was IMMACULATE and looked exactly like it does in the photos. Although the space is small, the furniture and set-up made it very comfortable for two people. Such great use of the space. Loved the location...short walk to the beach. Neighborhood was friendly and felt very safe. Alan and Catherine provided suggestions for places to visit and also stocked some key items in the fridge. Amazing!  If I return to Rio I would love to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.  '}, {'_id': '713681', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 11, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '716455', 'reviewer_name': 'Alex', 'comments': "We stayed at Alan and Catherine's studio in November for 6 nights and had wondeful time.  From the point of booking, Alan and Catherine made sure that we were prepared for our stay in Rio.  They shared their thoughts and recommendations with us, this helped us enormously.  The studio is exactly as described, and the location is great. We are more than happy to recommend this studio to our friends and family and we will definitely stay again when we return to Rio."}, {'_id': '835956', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 1, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1177072', 'reviewer_name': 'Maria Luz', 'comments': 'tuvimos una excelente estadia. Alan y catherine han sido muyamables, nos han dejado el departamento super equipado con todo lo necesariopara disfrutar unos hermosos dias en rio. !muy cerca de laplayay del centro. excelente ubicacion

muchas gracias por todo!'}, {'_id': '893101', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 1, 31, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1139514', 'reviewer_name': 'Matthias', 'comments': "Alan and Catherine entrusted me with their apartment for a whole month and I would not be too surprised if I were to learn that they had nightmares about this. I am a newcomer to this fantastic forum and had no recommendations or much detail in my profile while the apartment that Alan and Catherine entrusted me with truly is their home in Rio. It is a lovely designed little gem in Copa. It is amazing to see how much thought this couple spent in developing this small apartment into a little home where everything just fits perfectly. 

The apartment is light during day and the sofa transforms into a most comfortable bed at night. When I read the description of the apartment I initially had my doubts about the sleeper coach but chose this apartment as all other things just sounded perfect. Well, it turned out that the sleeper couch is as perfect as the apartment proved to be. The most comfortable sleeper I have ever experienced!

The apartment was recently totally renovated and is kept in such good shape that it still feels new. One of the apartment's big asset (apart from its beautiful furniture and interior) is the large shower! And of course the aircon for the hot Rio summer nights!

The apartment is nearby a vast range of fair, good and excellent restaurants and various supermarkets and shops.

The special treat is the welcome pack which allows you some time to study the wonderful recommendations and tips Allan and Catherine provide you with in a little info brochure to assist you in finding your own way in the surrounding area. Alan also offed a Kyle chat to assist me finding my way, but I found the info provided so detailed that this was not necessary.

As with most apartments in Rio, security is tops with a watchfull 24/7 door guard, who by the way is always keen to help where he can.

The Wifi is pleasantly fast and reliable! 

I can only recommend Alan's and Catherine's home in Rio. It is stable for short term, for long term, for business or for just visiting Copa (which, if i may stray off the point :) ) should be on everyones list of things to do while you still can!!!!!)

Thank Alan, thanks Catherine! Your apartment and I will meet gain :) !


"}, {'_id': '910824', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 2, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1402092', 'reviewer_name': 'Helen', 'comments': 'A fantastically located, very neat and carefully designed studio!

The studio is very well designed, and makes excellent use of a small space with everything you could need; a comfortable bed, desk, a kitchenette including full fridge, good bathroom, good internet access and a wide range of TV channels including 3 in English.

Catherine and Alan are excellent hosts, have provided lots of useful information about their local area and its haunts, and have been prompt in all their dealings through Airbnb.

I cannot recommend this place strongly enough! Thanks Catherine and Alan.'}, {'_id': '920995', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 2, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '245059', 'reviewer_name': 'Lucila', 'comments': 'The studio is fantastic and I had a great stay! Alan and Catherine were absolutely exceptional hosts who went above and beyond their responsibilities as hosts and we could not recommend them more highly. They were extremely fast in responding to our quires and we had a good few especially as it was over carnival (They even responded to out quires during our week in the apartment and helped us with a problem we were having booking flights to Iguazu falls). The studio is ideally situated in a very safe area (although we found nearly everywhere in Rio to be very safe) that is perfect for exploring Copacabana and the surrounding areas. The city itself can be somewhat overwhelming at first but Alan and Catherine’s starter and information packs gave us the confidence to venture all over they city without hesitation. Carnival is an amazing time to go and it is good to have somewhere private to go back to after a long day or night at a bloc party (which you will run into everywhere). As a first time couple using this site we could not have been more happy with the outcome and it really made our trip to Rio carnival one we will never forget. So all that’s left to say is go and in stay in Alan and Catherine’s beautiful apartment, don’t believe the negative things you hear about Rio and bring a wig or a hat for carnival as you wont see a local without one :)'}, {'_id': '1032232', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 3, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1376452', 'reviewer_name': 'Tom And Cecilia', 'comments': 'Our experience with Alan and Catherine's apartment in Rio was a dream experience.  Our first time in Rio, we were faced with a 1:00 AM arrival at GIG.   Already wary of what I had read about airport taxi, I wondered how we were going to deal with this one.  No problem, everything was promptly arranged with their trusted driver who was at the airport promptly with our name and a reaonsable cost. 

The apartment is on a beautiful quaint street in the heart of Copacabana.  Building security is fantastic with trusted 24 hr porters,  restricted access to the floors.  We felt much safer than in a hotel -- but Rio  not to be construed as an unsafe city.  We felt fine everywhere we went.  The metro is clean and efficient.  

Everything in the apartment is well organized and works.  The high speed internet permitted flawless (Hidden by Airbnb) calls at all hours - a great stress reliever when you're on business.

Alan and Catherine responded immediately to al communications, offered tons of helpful information about the area, checked in frequently to see if anything needed.  Its just goes on and on.  In short, they "get it".   Its not about the apartment, rather the total experience. 

Put this on your A list and consider yourself lucky if it books..

Tom and Cecilia Kessler
Guadalajara, Mexico'}, {'_id': '1073796', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 4, 2, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1913625', 'reviewer_name': 'Natacha', 'comments': 'We had a wonderful time in Rio! The studio is great! It is very well designed. Everything works perfectly well and Internet is faster than what we have in Switzerland! The location is great too! About 5 minutes walk to the beach of Copacabana, and located in a safe neighborhood. The bus station to go to the Sugar Loaf is about 10 minutes walk and the subway and the supermarket are only 3 minutes walking distance. Ipanema is only a 30 minute walk or you can take the subway (2 stations). Catherine and Alan were very helpful in helping us organize our trip. They were very patient with all our questions and fast in responding emails. They also helped us book our transportation to the apartment and all went very smoothly. We also loved the handbook loaded with all sorts of recommendations. We tried out a few restaurants and were not disappointed. We also went to Churrascaria Carretao (10 minutes walk) as my husband loves grilled meat (very touristy, get there early to avoid the tourist buses!). The hotel Othon has a restaurant on the top floor with a beautiful view of the beach of Copacabana. The food is rather pricey but the view is definitely worth it! The restaurant Colombo in the Fort of Copacabana is supposed to be good too, unfortunately we ran out of time! There are some very nice markets on Sundays. When heading to the hippie market in Ipanema stop at this very small market off Avenida Atlantica just before the Fort of Capacabana! They sell great pastels and the best caldos de cane! There is also an information center on Copacabana only a few minutes  towards Leme... And all this in short walking distance from the studio! 
We highly recommend this place!
'}, {'_id': '1103821', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 4, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1933691', 'reviewer_name': 'Lu', 'comments': 'Estuvimos en el estudio de Alan & Catherine por 5 días y todo fue perefecto. "}, {'_id': '2657438', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '1820420', 'reviewer_name': 'Marylin', 'comments': 'The apartment is beautiful, well located, clean and secure. Alan is constantly within reach and made us feel very comfortable and safe. They are the ideal Airbnb hosts and have set the bar VERY high. "}, {'_id': '96361935', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '46312284', 'reviewer_name': 'Antonio', 'comments': "Alan & Catherine's studio is just as shown in the pictures. It is a small, cozy, beautifully decorated space, in a great area of Copacabana. It is perfect for a couple, with a comfy bed, and surprisingly big shower. It is very close to Copacabana beach, and even  within walking distance to Ipanema, and the lake. There are lots of restaurants and shopping around.

From the moment I booked the place, Alan and Catherine communicated with me quickly, clearly and in a very friendly manner. I felt welcomed right away, and that left me no doubt that I had found the right place.

This proved true as soon as I arrived, as we were able to catch an earlier flight, at the last minute, from São Paulo to Rio. I emailed Alan from the airport letting him know of the situation, and he was able to make all the arrangements for us to go directly to the apartment upon arrival in Rio - 3 hours before our original arrival time!!!

Alan had recommended for me to contact Marcio for transportation from the airport to the apartment. Marcio was friendly and also very flexible, and was able to pick us at the airport at the earlier arrival time.

When we got to the apartment, Hugo was already waiting for us. He helped us with our luggage, and took us up to the place. The studio was immaculately clean, and ready for us to use. Moreover, Alan had arranged for us to have fresh fruit, bread, ham, cheese, cookies, etc!!

That was a totally unexpected, wonderful surprise!!! With all the attentions from Marcio, and Hugo, plus the fruits and snacks Alan had arranged, we definitely felt like we had come to the right place!!!!

I highly recommend Alan's and Catherine's studio, and would absolutely stay there again. What's more, I would love to meet them someday, as they seem like wonderful people, the type I would like to have as friends.

Antonio 

"}, {'_id': '100962463', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '17709879', 'reviewer_name': 'Nora', 'comments': "We totally loved the apartment, it's cozy and functional, it has everything you need, the location is great, and the decor is lovely. Gracias de nuevo! Excelente lugar!'}, {'_id': '137137073', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '104346493', 'reviewer_name': 'Charles', 'comments': 'Fue la primera vez que mi mujer y yo fuimos a Rio y a su vez fue la primera vez que alquilamos un hogar por medio de Airbnb. Con todos los medios que lo desconocido conlleva tuvimos la enorme suerte de encontrarnos con Alan & Catherine, quienes no solo nos brindaron un espacio para hospedarnos sino que además nos aconsejaron sobre el lugar, y nos guiaron en cada paso para que saliera de la mejor manera.
Al llegar ellos no estaban en Brasil, pero dejaron a Hugo, una persona increíble que supo aconsejarnos, darnos recomendaciones y dejó que lo molestemos con todo tipo de consultas.
El Lugar es un ambiente pequeño, pero SUMAMENTE funcional, para hacer un comodo living comedor de día y un acogedor dormitorio de noche. El baño, tiene una de las mejores duchas con las que me bañe.
La locación es excelente. En una parte segura de Copacabana apenas a unas cuadras de la playa entre Avenidas llenas de locales para todas las necesidades (restaurantes, supermercados, bares y más).
Mas allá de todo, creo que lo esencial está en los detalles. No falta nada, se encuentra provista de todas las necesidades y además está llena de atenciones como frutas frescas y sabrosas listas para comer sin cargo alguno.
Definitivamente es un lugar al que volvería! De hecho lo hice!
Si tengo que pensar en un lugar para quedarme en Río sería en el estudio de Alan & Catherine sin dudar.

Muchas gracias!'}, {'_id': '197437989', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '125656', 'reviewer_id': '135539961', 'reviewer_name': 'Sérgio', 'comments': 'Apartamento muito estiloso, charmoso, tudo muito limpo, organizado e muito bem localizado. [{'_id': '76740290', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12639342', 'reviewer_id': '73429247', 'reviewer_name': 'Joelma', 'comments': 'A hospedagem foi incrível. Os porteiros também foram bem atenciosos. Iremos voltar, certamente. Experiência sensacional. Super indicamos. '}, {'_id': '97081434', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12639342', 'reviewer_id': '14954841', 'reviewer_name': 'Tilo', 'comments': 'It was a pleasure. Great apartment in Flamengo.'}, {'_id': '110950614', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 10, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12639342', 'reviewer_id': '3761165', 'reviewer_name': 'Alain & Juliana', 'comments': 'As fotos fazem jus ao apartamento, que é mesmo aconchegante e prático. O prédio é antigo mas o apartamento foi bastante reformado. Fica no início da Rua São Salvador, portanto longe do barulho que pode vir da boêmia Praça São Salvador, dois quarteirões adiante, mas suficientemente perto de serviços de todo tipo (banco, mercados, correios, metrô, etc.). Os funcionários do prédio são simpáticos e, quando tivemos uma pequena reclamação de barulho em relação a um vizinho, o porteiro rapidamente resolveu-o, sem sequer ser necessário fazermos contato com a anfitriã a respeito. Só sentimos que uma parte da cozinha não condiz com o restante do apartamento, mas penso que a anfitriã deverá resolver isso em breve. O banho de chuveiro é excelente, os eletrodomésticos da cozinha e a máquina de lavar-secar são novos e muito bons, a iluminação é linda e o ar condicionado no quarto é bastante potente (talvez o suficiente para refrigerar o apartamento inteiro, mas não há como isolar a casa da área de serviço com tanque, que é aberta). Acabamos não conhecendo a Sonia, pois chegamos e saímos em horários inusuais, mas a chegada e a saída foram tranquilas mesmo assim e o contato (por (Hidden by Airbnb) ) correu de forma fluida e sempre que necessário (de ambas partes). Ficaríamos aqui de novo e recomendamos para quem queira um apartamento de quarto e sala confortável numa zona agradável, central e não cara do Rio de Janeiro.'}, {'_id': '123264438', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '12639342', 'reviewer_id': '8065409', 'reviewer_name': 'Leticia', 'comments': "Sonia's been an amazing host from beginning to end of my trip to Rio! My next visit to Rio will definitely be with Sonia again! '}, {'_id': '337494204', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 10, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12639342', 'reviewer_id': '43783065', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariela', 'comments': "This apartment and host are wonderful! It was lovely to wake up to so much sunlight and the chirping of local birds! The kitchen appliances are all new and function to perfection; the ceiling fan in the living room is great; and the air conditioning in the bedroom also works great (there were a few warmer nights while we were there and it was great to be able to stay nice and cool!). The TV and WiFi also work great. Overall we felt very much at home. The location is also fantastic. You can walk to the metro, bars/restaurants, the São Salvador plaza (where there is also a lovely feira on Sundays!), the nearby Zona Sul supermarket, the nearby Flamengo park, and many other fun places. We highly recommend this spot and would definitely stay here again!"}, {'_id': '349982200', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 11, 18, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '12639342', 'reviewer_id': '108477204', 'reviewer_name': 'Tiago', 'comments': 'Um estada inesquecível e para ser repetida. Localização: A localização é excelente! Tudo perto: farmácia, mercado, metrô, táxi super acessível, pertinho da praia. Incrível!

Praticidade: O AP tinha tudo o que precisávamos: compacto, mas super utilitário. Pudemos cozinhar, o local já conta com as panelas e um pequeno fogão.

A minha estadia no verão tórrido foi agradável, pois o apartamento tem ar condicionado e ventilador que funcionam muito bem juntos. O local é limpo e tem água quente. O flat é ótimo para até duas pessoas. O anfitrião foi atencioso e corresponder bem às solicitações. Aconselho a estadia nesse apartamento.'}, {'_id': '10332991', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1264811', 'reviewer_id': '10637055', 'reviewer_name': 'Yavor', 'comments': 'O apartamento é muito bem localizado, fica pertinho dos estações do metrô Catete e Largo do Machado, fica perto de supermercados e varias atrações turísticas como o Palácio do Catete, a praia do Flamengo, o centro histórico da cidade também. O apartamento tem geladeira, mini-cozinha, ar condicionado, ventilador, etc. É muito bem equipado com tudo que você precisa. O Leandro e os porteiros são muito simpáticos e atenciosos. O preço e muito bom também.
Recomendo muito!!! Leandro, obrigado pelo tudo, gostaría de voltar sempre!!!
Ако има българи, които се чудят къде да нощуват на поносима за стандартите на Рио цена, това е апартаментът на Леандро. Намира се на прекрасно място, съвсем близо има две спирки на метрото (до Копакабана се стига за десетина минути, до Ипанема за 15), както и спирки на градските автобуси. Освен че е на около 15-20 минути пеш от центъра, може да се стигне пеша и до подножието на статуята на Христос (Корковадо), може би за около 50-55 минути нормален ход. Иначе апартаментът отговаря напълно на цената си – с климатик, вентилатор, хладилник, два газови котлона. Аз бях сам, но е идеално и за двойки, леглото е голямо и удобно. Не се колебайте :)
'}, {'_id': '10491601', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 22, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1264811', 'reviewer_id': '7494057', 'reviewer_name': 'Claire', 'comments': "I had a wonderful stay at Leandro's place. '}, {'_id': '64177353', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 29, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1264811', 'reviewer_id': '20149227', 'reviewer_name': 'Stéphane', 'comments': "Voici selon moi les avantages et les inconvénients de cet appartement, sachant que je n'ai pas beaucoup d'autres expériences d'appartements à Rio:

QUALITÉS
Pas cher;
Climatisé;
Pratique, fonctionnel, contient l'équipement nécessaire;
Propre;
Bien situé, proche du métro et des commerces, juste à côté du Catete Palacio et de son parc très agréable;
L'appartement est conforme à la description (sauf qu'il semble plus grand sur les photos qu'en vrai);
Leandro est accueillant, sympathique, parle anglais.

DÉFAUTS
Climatisation bruyante;
Pas de vue;
Cuisine très petite.

En conclusion, ça me semble très bien pour un petit budget, sauf si vous avez l'intention de faire la cuisine pour 12 personnes en regardant un coucher de soleil ;)"}, {'_id': '65284096', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 12, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1264811', 'reviewer_id': '59048034', 'reviewer_name': 'Fernando Leme', 'comments': 'Estou muito satisfeito com minha estadia no apartamento do Leandro. [{'_id': '94677775', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12653230', 'reviewer_id': '27132657', 'reviewer_name': 'Jay', 'comments': "Ricardo's apartment is wonderful.  The patio helps you feel connected to the city, and is a scenic place to share a candlelight meal or drink.  To the right is the ocean and to the left is toward Ipanema beach.  The beds are cozy, the kitchen is stocked to cook in, the front room is a relaxing place to watch movies (or, in our case, Olympic highlights).  The neighborhood below has a grocery store, pharmacy, restaurants, juice bars, a gym, yoga...anything a traveler could need.  It is a 1 and a 1/2 block walk to Copacabana Beach and a short walk to Ipanema.  We could not have asked for a better place to stay, or for a kinder, more gracious host.  Ricardo helped us with Uber, shopping, bike rentals, getting money exchanged, what sites to see, and had some nice surprises upon our arrival.  Thank you, Ricardo.  We hope to entertain you when you visit California."}, {'_id': '96568523', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12653230', 'reviewer_id': '84236127', 'reviewer_name': 'Milton', 'comments': 'O Ricardo foi um excelente anfitrião, nos deixou muito a vontade em seu apto, nos recebendo muito bem, deixando toalhas e roupas de cama, indicações do que fazer no Rio durante as Olimpíadas, dicas de restaurantes, enfim tudo para o nosso bem estar. A experiência foi ótima desde a chegada até o dia de ir embora, ele sempre muito acessível quando solicitado. 
O apto é muito bem localizado, com fácil acesso ao metrô, praias de Copacabana e Ipanema, além de ótimos restaurantes. [{'_id': '14467841', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1273526', 'reviewer_id': '13411388', 'reviewer_name': 'Federico', 'comments': 'La casa esta en un condominio cerrado, lo cual brinda seguridad. Esta algo alejada del centro, por lo que es recomendable tener movilidad propia. La casa no esta preparada para recibir huespedes. No se han vaciado los cajones y armarios; la heladera debe compartirse con los propietarios. El loft del ultimo piso no tiene cortinas por lo que entra mucha luz desde temprano. Tres gatos viven en la casa y conviven con los visitantes.\r\nPatricia fue amable, dispuesta a ayudar y brindar informacion.'}, {'_id': '18650315', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 8, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1273526', 'reviewer_id': '7832648', 'reviewer_name': 'Elisa', 'comments': "Patricia was a good host! she is friendly and helpful and at the same time she was not always at home so we had our own space. I've stayed in her house 6 days with four friends of mine and we were all quite happy with the accommodation. We could also use the kitchen and the BBQ. The house is big and nice and she has four cats in the house. The house is part of a group of houses surrounded by a fence and 24/7 guards, so very safe. In the surrounding area there are mainly big buildings and shopping mall but in just 30min walking you are on the beach :-)"}]

[{'_id': '94139517', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 14, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '12761564', 'reviewer_id': '73724763', 'reviewer_name': 'Aldemar', 'comments': 'Es un apartamento pequeño y sencillo pero muy limpio, con buena luz natural todo el día, con todo lo suficiente para sentirse muy bien y ubicado en un entorno muy tranquilo, agradable y seguro del sector Taquara de Río de Janeiro.
Se puede llegar fácilmente desde el aeropuerto internacional Galeao hasta la estación de BRT Taquara. El apartamento está cerca de la
estacion de metro BRT de Taquara a través de las cuales se puede llegar a cualquier sitio en Río de Janeiro. Tiene restaurantes, farmacias, pastelerías, almacenes grandes y tiendas cercanas a las que se puede llegar caminando.
Don Paulo Henrique es una persona bondadosa, de gran corazón y muy amable con sus huéspedes. Sin dudarlo, cuando tenga la oportunidad de volver a Río, me alojaría en ese apartamento nuevamente.'}]

Só peca pela qualidade das roupas de cama e banho.'}, {'_id': '26275683', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1284892', 'reviewer_id': '24665378', 'reviewer_name': 'Nívia', 'comments': 'O Anfitrião foi muito atencioso, negociação fácil e rápida todas as vezes que ligamos foi solícito e nos ajudou em alguns contratempos que tivemos ao chegar (vazamento de gas)foi resolvido logo na manha seguinte do dia que chegamos.
Ao chegar as chaves foram entregues pelo porteiro portanto não tivemos nenhuma instrução a respeito do funcionamento do imóvel.
Aquecimento a gás.
 TVs conectadas em pontos escravos .( as dos quartos  só funcionam se a sala for conectada).Demorei pra descobrir!
Os aparelhos de ar condicionado estavam funcionando, mas os filtros estavam imundos. Dos 4 existentes 3 estão muito velhos causam barulho e aquecimento na rede eletrica o que faz desarmar a chave geral toda hora (ex: chave n°12 desarma com freqüência)
No quesito limpeza do apartamento estava nojento imundo, tinha filhotes de baratas ate dentro de geladeira.( se tem pequenas é porque tem ninho)
Sugiro dedetizar "geral e urgente"
A mesa da sala estava desmontada com vidro no chão, achei arriscado aquele vidro no chão poderia tombar e quebrar a qualquer momento. E foi muito desconfortável ter que comer com pratos nas mãos todas as vezes.
Na cozinha faltam utensílios básicos tipo um tabuleiro/ ralador/ peneira panelas vasilhas de plastico....
( um cha básico de cozinha)
Logo que chegamos tinha um ventilador ligado diretamente em roupas que estavam secando, com o calor do RJ, achei desperdício de energia eletrica." um absurdo "
A área de serviço estava muito suja principalmente onde ficam as vassouras rodos que é atrás da máquina de lavar.
Tem um banheiro de empregadas mas estava impossível de usar, tem de tudo lá dentro.
Não da pra entrar."Acho que as baratas moram lá "
Os banheiros, tem lodo falta 1 parte de vidro nos box. Tem lâmpadas precisando trocar estão queimadas.
Molha tudo quando toma banho.
Nada identifica quente e frio nos registros. Um perigo pra crianças e idosos.
Tem uma bancada se desprendendo da parede.(suite)
Vai cair é só uma questão de tempo.
A água escorre por trás da pia. Falta acabamento.
Nos quartos tem roda pés soltos e ar condicionado ligado na gambiarra.
Nada aconchegante.
Acima da bancada da pia da cozinha tem tomada sem acabamento básico, risco de curto circuito a qualquer momento.
Agua /energia eletrica não combinam.
O apartamento em si tem um ótimo potencial.
Mas sugiro uma reforma básica e rápida.(Designer ou Arquiteto, empreiteiro cuidadoso)
A rua e agradável a estrutura de comércio e boa.
A distancia da praia também e boa.
As camas sao boas e confortáveis e as toalhas e roupas de camas estavam limpas.
Enfim  deixamos o $ de pagar a faxina, mas acho que ela vai lá faz meia boca e vai embora.
Falta inspeção de alguem ou do anfitrião.
Espero ter ajudado o anfitrião a melhorar .
Pois gostaria de voltar em uma outra ocasião.
Pois adoramos o Rio.
Desde de já obrigada pela oportunidade.'}, {'_id': '27678597', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1284892', 'reviewer_id': '25885808', 'reviewer_name': 'Thaís', 'comments': 'O bairro é bem tranquilo, super bem localizado, fica bem próximo da praia, o apartamento é excelente, condiz realmente com o anúncio, todos os quartos tem ar condicionado e tv com net, as roupas de cama estavam bem limpas bem como o apartamento no geral. O apartamento é bom, bem espaçoso (comporta muito bem o número de pessoas que ele determinou como limite), possui ar condicionado em todas as dependências e a paisagem que pode ser vista de um dos quartos e sala é estonteante. No entanto, o apartanento falhou no quesito limpeza. Quando acabamos de chegar, a moça da limpeza estava saindo... mas parece que ela não fez absolutamente nada. Havia centímetros de pó por todos os eletrônicos da casa e a mesa de jantar estava grudenta, cheia de marcas de copos e comida, além disso algumas roupas de cama não foram lavadas. No entanto, o pior ponto foi a falta de dedetização do apartamento. Toda vez que acordavamos e ascendiamos a luz existiam dezenas de baratas que desapareciam minutos depois... não pudemos utilizar nenhum utensílio de cozinha, pois os insetos passavam pelos mesmos. Mesmo assim a experiência foi ótima e eu voltaria com a promessa de que o quesito limpeza foi considerado. Igor, muito obrigada pela atenção. E desculpe por parte do feedback negativo, mas é necessário.'}, {'_id': '76775195', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1284892', 'reviewer_id': '62777223', 'reviewer_name': 'Thiago', 'comments': 'Great location, but the cleanliness  and maintenance of the apartment could be better! '}, {'_id': '81379851', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1284892', 'reviewer_id': '25725888', 'reviewer_name': 'Fernanda', 'comments': 'o Igor foi muito solicito e atencioso.  '}, {'_id': '129152355', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 29, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1284892', 'reviewer_id': '105534398', 'reviewer_name': 'Johana', 'comments': 'La ubicación es buena cerquisima a la playa de Copacabana a pie, cerca a los buses para visitar Ipanema y Leblon incluso para Pan de Azucar en bus.

The apt. is a nice place to stay in Rio. It's clean, and has everything you need. The hand over of the key was done by the housekeeper, it all went smooth, but she didn't speak anything but Portugese. This makes it hard to ask questions if Portugese is not spoken by the renters.

Marcella is very flexible, we could prolong our stay with two days without any problems. Marcella reacted quickly to our questions and requests which made our stay very pleasent. I would definately recommend the apt. to visitors of Rio."}, {'_id': '19231456', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 9, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1304552', 'reviewer_id': '20540371', 'reviewer_name': 'Marcelo', 'comments': 'El departamento es como se anuncia respecto a buena ubicacion y cercano a la playa. Amazing location and all around great stay.'}, {'_id': '19897795', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 9, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1304552', 'reviewer_id': '19263577', 'reviewer_name': 'Florencia', 'comments': 'Mi pareja y yo fuimos al apartamento de Marcela por una semana y realmente quedamos muy conformes!
Marcela es amorosa. Nos respondió a la brevedad todas las preguntas que tuvimos previo a la llegada, y estando ahí nos recibió para darnos las llaves y explicarnos cómo funcionaba todo, y estuvo dispuesta a ayudarnos con todo lo que necesitamos todo el tiempo.
El apartamento es perfecto para dos personas. Es un ambiente pequeño pero ideal para una pareja, con todo lo necesario (ropa de cama, toallas, utensilios, herramientas de limpieza, secador de pelo, etc. etc. etc.) 
Está ubicado excelentemente: a dos cuadras de la playa, muy cerca de la Lagoa, en una calle absolutamente principal llena de supermercados, tiendas de ropa, minimercados, restaurantes, todo a pocos pasos del apartamento. 
Tiene un minimercado 24hs abierto exactamente en la puerta del edificio lo cual es ideal!! 
Tiene portero 24 hs y está en una zona muy segura. 
Definitivamente quedamos encantados tanto con Marcela como con el apartamento. Si volvemos a ir, sin duda iremos al mismo lugar!
Gracias por todo Marcela!

Being only 2 blocks from the beach, and several good restaurants within 2 blocks.  I recommend trying ViaSete which is only 1 block away.  Many busses available within 2 blocks, and the subway will be much closer once the expansion is completed.  We had to go to the General Osorio station which was about a 10-15 minute walk away.  The various 24 hr doormen were really friendly despite our language barrier.  There is also one of the locations where you could purchase in advance tickets to the Christ the Redeemer train across the street.

Unfortunately the walls are a little thin; an upstairs neighbor (or outside somewhere) was doing construction and we constantly heard a drill running or somebody hammering something in the mornings.

I love a hot shower with plenty of water, but the water heater is built into the shower head in this bathroom and not so powerful.  So it is either hot water but not  full pressure, or cool water with full pressure.'}, {'_id': '35751819', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1304552', 'reviewer_id': '29105932', 'reviewer_name': 'Jairo', 'comments': 'Apartamento de acordo com as fotos, reformado, bastante aconchegante. I would highly recommend this place, just be sure to check that the price online is in your currency, as the price jumped for us after I paid with my credit card.
