I would definitely come back to sergio's place if i come back in Rio and i highly recommend this airbnb!"}, {'_id': '31721179', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '30695145', 'reviewer_name': 'Mylene', 'comments': "Lorsqu'on réserve une chambre, un appartement sur internet dans une ville qu'on ne connait pas, malgré les photos, on a parfois du mal à imaginer l'environnement. Dans le cas du studio de Sergio, nous avons constaté sur place qu'il était très bien situé, à proximité immédiate du métro, des rues commerçantes mais dans une rue tranquille, à 5 minutes de la plage de Copacabana et à 10 minutes de celle d'Ipanema.  Le studio lui-même était exactement conforme aux photos, très bien aménagé, clair, fonctionnel, très propre. L'accès au studio se fait par l'accès principal de l'appartement de Sergio, ce qui ne nous a pas gênés, les espaces étant bien séparés, en l'occurrence il s'agit d'un duplex. J'ai apprécié avant même l'arrivée à Rio, de pouvoir échanger avec Sergio et qu'il réponde rapidement. Il a gentiment accepté de nous recevoir avant l'heure d'arrivée habituelle compte tenu de notre vol d'arrivée très matinal. Durant tout notre séjour, il a été d'une aide précieuse pour nous conseiller sur les visites, sur les modes de transport, pour  réserver et imprimer les billets pour accéder au Christo de Corcovado, réserver le taxi, ou encore faire une lessive. Sergio est un hôte discret mais charmant, s'intéressant  le matin à ce que nous allions faire et  le soir de ce que nous avons fait. Nous avons eu la belle surprise de découvrir tous les jours à notre table des délicieux fruits frais (mangues, bananes, papayes). C'est un excellent hôte et une excellente adresse! "}, {'_id': '32035218', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '11075535', 'reviewer_name': 'Denise', 'comments': 'O apartamento é bem aconchegante e limpo, fica numa localização ótima em Copacabana e muito perto de Ipanema. '}, {'_id': '32510770', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '29446351', 'reviewer_name': 'Angela', 'comments': 'Ficamos muito satisfeitas com a hospedagem proporcionada pelo Sérgio em sua residência.

Fica como destaque a limpeza do ambiente que pareceu uma preocupação permanente do anfitrião.

El Studio muchísimo más amplio que lo que podes ver en fotos. Una zona totalmente segura para caminar. El metro a 1 cuadra. Buses a 1. Playa de Copacabana a 2. Ipanema a 5. Supermercado, resto/bar todo muy a mano.

'}, {'_id': '37594602', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '32816579', 'reviewer_name': 'Michele', 'comments': "Sergio was the perfect host, courteous and helpful, his advice enriched our stay in Rio.  The accommodation is excellent value for money - although listed as a private room it is effectively a private apartment accessed by staircase via the host's home.  Clean, bright and spacious with kitchen and outside terrace it is exactly as the photos if not better.  Refreshments, coffee and fruits were provided as were fresh towels and good bed linen. Situated minutes from Copacabana and Ipanema beaches.   Osario metro (2 mins walk) provides access to the rest of the city.
Comfortable and welcoming, we would not hesitate to recommend.


"}, {'_id': '39034053', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '9544054', 'reviewer_name': 'Lucas', 'comments': 'Experiencia 10 PUNTOS. La habitación era super confortable, Sergio limpiaba diariamente, era muy amable, nos recomendó muchos lugares para recorrer y ahorrar con las excursiones. El barrio era tranquilo. Nos espero con frutas a nuestra llegada y siempre tuvo buena predisposición a nuestros pedidos y consultas.'}, {'_id': '39756580', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '33336198', 'reviewer_name': 'Anna', 'comments': "Sergio has been an absolutely amazing host! 

From the moment we arrived in Rio, Sergio was welcoming and helpful. He helped us to find restaurants, attractions, buses, and how to navigate the metro. He definitely made us feel at home in his lovely apartment, and we are very thankful to Sergio, for making our time in Rio so lovely and easy! 

The apartment itself also could not have been more perfect! The location is excellent. It is safe, very close to the metro, very close to both Copacabana and Ipanema beaches, as well as close to many lovely restaurants. 

The apartment is great because you have your own space- a nice bedroom, a bathroom, a separate lounge and kitchen/dining area, and a lovely courtyard. It is an excellent space for relaxing. 

I definitely will be recommending Sergio's apartment to anyone I know who is heading to Rio de Janeiro. Definitely a 10/10 experience! 

Many thanks Sergio!!! "}, {'_id': '41397828', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '9505196', 'reviewer_name': 'Grace', 'comments': 'Sergio was a gracious host.  From the minute we booked the reservation, he responded promptly and accepted our request.  He provided very detailed information and directions to his apartment in Copacabana.  We found the apartment without any problem. Upon arrival, he accommodated us with an early check in.  He stocked the fridge with beer, soda, water and several fresh fruits and snacks.  He placed chocolates near our bed! I cannot say enough about how kind and considerate he is.  He thought of everything.  He even gave us a farewell gift!

The location is very centrally located.  The metro is only a block away with quick access to other parts of the city.  The metro is really the way to go to venture to different neighborhoods in Rio and is very safe and efficient to use.  You will save a ton of money on cab fare!  If you feel like walking, Copacabana beach is about 3 blocks away and Ipanema is about 8-10 minutes walk.  There are fabulous restaurants within walking distance from his apartment.  It is also located near a grocery store if you need to get some provisions.  

The room feels like its own apartment.  You enter the apartment through a common area, but you have the upstairs all to your self.  There is a living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchenette, and terrace all just for you!  It is very relaxing just to sit on the rooftop and drink a beer or glass of wine.  The bedroom has a ceiling fan and air conditioner just in case it gets too warm.  The apartment is extremely clean.  

The neighborhood is lively.  Music can heard until the early morning sometimes and there is a lot of construction going on in Rio at this time.  That can be a drawback if you are looking for peace and quiet.  After all, this is a very bustling city!  

Sergio called us a cab to the airport which was much cheaper than what we would have paid if we called one ourselves.  

Sergio, thank you so much for a memorable stay in Rio.  Thank you for all the helpful information you provided.  We were able to navigate the city quite well with your help.  I hope we meet again someday.  Please call us if you every find yourself in California!

Most Sincerely, Grace.'}, {'_id': '46128639', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '35880031', 'reviewer_name': 'Karine', 'comments': 'A melhor opção que poderíamos ter escolhido para nossa hospedagem no Rio de Janeiro! Nossa estadia foi show, fomos recebidos no apartamento bem limpinho e cheiroso com frutas frescas, iogurte, chocolate e bolachinhas. 
O prédio fica muito bem localizado, próximo ao metrô, a praia de Copacabana e Ipanema. Pudemos conhecer vários pontos turísticos da cidade graças as dicas do Sergio, que sem dúvidas, é um ótimo anfitrião. Sempre atencioso, nos deu dicas da melhor maneira para chegarmos aos pontos turísticos da cidade e sugestões de restaurantes. 
Viemos embora com vontade de voltar em breve! Recomendo a todos!'}, {'_id': '48087092', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '3704353', 'reviewer_name': 'Hans', 'comments': "I enjoyed the time in Rio 
Sergio's apartment has two levels and I stayed at the 1 bedroom studio on the top floor. The location is great, the metro station is close by and there are many buses that will take you to the best attractions that Rio has to offer. You can hear the music from the local bar in the evening so if you are a light sleeper it may bother you. having said that, it's Rio and it's part of the experience. 
Sergio provided insightful recommendations which made my visit quite enjoyable. "}, {'_id': '48999468', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '39037377', 'reviewer_name': 'Andres', 'comments': 'La pasamos súper bien, el apartamento es muy confortable, y la atención de Sergio de lo mejor. Sergio todos los días nos daba frutas, muy amable, sus recomendaciones super buenas y fáciles de seguir... Sergio could not be more helpful and friendly.  He was very welcoming and was always there to give us recommendations on things to do, how to get to places, etc.  Sergio was very well prepared with all the Olympics materials and we also got a present from him on arrival - an Olympics magnet :).  He left us some Brazilian beers and drinks in the fridge and selection of fruit was often refreshed by him. One Sunday we were at the apartment and Sergio invited us to join him and his family for Sunday lunch, which was very nice of him. 

The apartment is spacious and clean and it is very well located.  General Osorio metro station is at the end of the street only couple of minutes walk away.  The beaches of Copacaban and Ipanema is also only a short walk away.

We highly recommend Sergio's apartment and we'll definitely stay there if we visit Rio again.  A big thank you to you Sergio for letting us stay with you!"}, {'_id': '94119887', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 14, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1797689', 'reviewer_id': '33662170', 'reviewer_name': 'Erika', 'comments': "Came to Rio for the Olympics not knowing what to expect or how to navigate the city.  Sergio came through like a blessing.  Immediately he made me and my parents feel at home.  He provided medicine for me because he heard me coughing in my sleep (this medicine is another blessing, btw.  I must buy some!).

Sergio kept our studio clean and stocked with light refreshments and beverages.  He even had a welcome souvenir for me upon my arrival.  His knowledge of Rio is extensive and he was instrumental in us finding great places to eat, and fully understanding the easiest ways to navigate to and from  our venues and excursions.

[{'_id': '248030219', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 3, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '18134491', 'reviewer_id': '25449086', 'reviewer_name': 'Francisca', 'comments': "This duplex is in an amazing location in Ipanema - safe and quiet, yet close to restaurants, bars and shops. Two nice bedrooms, good WiFi, and importantly good air con! Nice with the common pool downstairs but not suited for sunbathing. Je recommande cette adresse bien située à proximité de la plage ce qui est idéal pour aller prendre un bain dès le matin avant d'aller visiter la ville. 
Idéal pour aller en métro ou en taxi à Ipanema, Central ou  Santa  Theresa.
Bel appartement, et toujours la conversation et les bons conseils d'Ylsa en Français ou en Anglais sur la ville et le Brésil.
Une adresse que nous recommandons à ceux qui ont une semaine pour découvrir en toute quiétude les secrets de cette ville de légende."}, {'_id': '1213991', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 5, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '2164997', 'reviewer_name': 'Carla', 'comments': "[Fuer Deutsch bitte runter scrollen]


My stay at Ylza's place was perfect! She has a wonderful apt. in Copacabana, you can see the famous beach from her windows.

I needed a place on short notice and Ylza answered me within a couple of hours - she made my day. I planned to stay for the long weekend, but ended up staying for a week.

We had some really good talks, her coffee is great, and she even made me breakfast (which is not included I guess), I really felt like staying at a friends place.

One night we went out with her scooter to Ipanema (together with Blue, the dog) - what a fun experience!

I could keep on telling how wonderful the stay was, because it really was. 
Ylza was the first airbnb host for me and an inspiring person, I hope to see her again someday.

If you decided to stay here, you will find a very clean room, there is good wifi connection, supermarket (24hrs) around the corner, beach, restaurants - Rio!

Enjoy your stay :)

[Thanks for everything Ylza, I will be back soon :-) ]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wunderbarer Host, Ylza war mein erster airbnb-Versuch - perfekte Wahl! Sie wohnt direkt am Copacabana-Beach. Supermarkt, Restaurants, Turistenangebote in unmittelbarer Naehe. Sauberes Zimmer, gutes Wifi, lustige Haustiere. Ylza ist ein besonderer Mensch, und eine gute Adresse fuer Urlauber/Backpacker/Geschaeftsreisende, die keine Lust mehr auf Hotels/Pousadas/Hostels haben."}, {'_id': '1236426', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 5, 6, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '2178004', 'reviewer_name': 'Jordan', 'comments': 'Ylza is a great host, and her place is ideally situated close to Copacabana beach. She is brilliant and most helpful and goes out of her way to help. She has an apartment most conveniently located and Ylza keeps the place very welcoming. She is a good host and we recommend her to whoever wants a great location in Rio.'}, {'_id': '3215641', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 1, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '3489314', 'reviewer_name': 'Chele', 'comments': "Our profile: Husband & Wife, age 43, from United States; we stayed the week between Christmas through New Year's Day.  We HIGHLY RECOMMEND this apartment and Ylza as a host.  We enjoyed our stay completely and would DEFINITELY stay again!  Her apartment is VERY clean and VERY secure; locked gated front building entrance with 24 hour doorman, and a lock on your own bedroom door too (but we never even locked our door).  Bathroom is very clean and has plenty of hot water for showers. GREAT location! The apartment is in the first block from the beach - VERY close easy walking distance to Copacabana beach!  Bus stops and Metro stops are very easy walking distance.  Ipanema Beach and Lake also within a little longer walking distance.  On Sunday mornings there is a fantastic farmer's market right on Ylza's block at the park.  Her dog and cats are loving and sweet.  You MUST like animals to stay here - they are very affectionate and want to be with you.  We loved that!  The only potential negative for someone would be that there is no air conditioning - so if you get hot easily, you will not like that.  My husband and I don't mind the heat - we were not uncomfortable.  But if you need A/C, this is not the place for you.  Travel from the airport to Copacabana in a taxi is approximately $30 - $35USD.  Whenever we return to Rio, we will definitely contact Ylza again!"}, {'_id': '4111307', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 4, 10, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '5568528', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariana', 'comments': 'A Ylza é uma ótima anfitriã. Muita atenciosa e gentil. O imóvel é super bem localizado, perto da praia de Copacabana e com tudo o que se precisa por perto. O Rio de Janeiro é uma cidade maravilhosamente linda!! Tudo nota 10. '}, {'_id': '6801083', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 8, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '8085571', 'reviewer_name': 'Johann', 'comments': "My name is Johann and I am from South Africa and stayed in one of Ylza's rooms in her apartment. 

It was really very nice to stay in Ylza's apartment.

The welcoming at 8 or 9pm was very welcoming. Blue met me outside the front door! For those of you that know him, he is Ylza's little dog - Very friendly.

Ylza is an excellent host and we had some great conversations about a variety of topics.

The apartment was very spacious and my room was inviting, clean and also cozy.

The apartment is very very central - A short 1 minute walk to the beach and about 100 meters to the closest supermarket and bank. There are many supermarkets and banks in the area. Buses are also close by.

My favorite restaurant was across the road from the apartment and there are many more.

I would like to thank Ylza and her animals (or babies!) for the very good time and experience I had. This is the first time in all my travels in 30 years to many countries that I stayed in a room in an apartment with the host. And all I can say: We are never too old to learn and experience something new.

Staying at this apartment is highly recommended!

Thanks Ylza  and give Blue and the white cat a hug from Johann.

Regards and best wishes

Johann"}, {'_id': '8852747', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 11, 21, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '5133572', 'reviewer_name': 'Julia', 'comments': "Ylza was a very nice and helpful host. Thanks for letting us stay at your place :-)"}, {'_id': '12976258', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 5, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '3976046', 'reviewer_name': 'Brune', 'comments': "En voyage pendant quelques mois au Brésil pour un projet documentaire, Ylza a eu la gentillesse de nous accueillir pendant un mois entier ! L'appartement est très bien situé à une minute de la plage !! C'est l'idéal pour un bain ou un jogging matinal. Copacabana n'est plus le quartier glamour qu'il était et il ne faut pas s'y promener à pied la nuit. Mais il y a une borne de taxi juste en bas de l'immeuble donc c'est parfait ! 

Ylza nous a laissé sa cuisine pour se préparer de bons petits plats (équipements minimum). La chambre était propre et spacieuse, ça nous changeait des pousadas et auberges de jeunesse ! L'appartement a surtout un grand salon et une salle à manger très agréables pour bouquiner ou travailler.

Ylza est vraiment adorable et s'est très bien occupée de nous. Un grand merci !! Par contre, attention pour les allergiques, il y a deux adorables chats qui se promènent partout dans l'appartement y compris dans votre chambre et sur la table du petit déjeuner .."}, {'_id': '14808823', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '182139', 'reviewer_id': '7472780', 'reviewer_name': 'Matthew', 'comments': "Loved staying at Ylza's place. [{'_id': '14335905', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1844578', 'reviewer_id': '9622861', 'reviewer_name': 'Shelley', 'comments': 'We had a wonderful experience here. If you want to stay for a few days and get the feel for a local neighborhood it was great. The price was more than fair and there are a number of great areas to walk to.'}, {'_id': '15567335', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1844578', 'reviewer_id': '11790548', 'reviewer_name': 'Rafael', 'comments': 'Un logement aussi agréable et beau que Elmiro et Sergio sont accueillant et tout ça dans le meilleur quartier de Rio.

À conseiller '}, {'_id': '24114923', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1844578', 'reviewer_id': '24233589', 'reviewer_name': 'Øystein Bolstad', 'comments': 'Miro is a superb host. All in all we felt very welcome and I really recomend staying in Miro´s place.'}, {'_id': '27043996', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 24, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1844578', 'reviewer_id': '22736040', 'reviewer_name': 'Vani', 'comments': 'Estamos felices de haber elegido tan bonito hogar para pasar el Carnaval! Las descripciones son totalmente correctas, en todo momento recibimos amabilidad y cordialidad por parte de los anfitriones, ya sea en cuanto información turística de la ciudad, como en la atención de estar en aquellos pequeños detalles que nos hacían sentir como en casa: muchas gracias por todo!!! 
La habitación estaba súper limpia, como el resto de la casa. Una ambientación muy linda, se trata de una antigua casona remodelada. También disfrutamos de la grata compañía de sus dos perros y dos gatos! Incluso, algunos días tuvimos la suerte de recibir la visita de monitos en los árboles del patio. 
El desayuno era servido con dedicación, creo que no faltaba nada en la mesa de ese precioso patio lleno de plantas y árboles brasileros. Nos deleitaron con sus exquisiteces caseras: bolo (una especie de budín) especialmente el de laranja (obrigada de Sergio) y la mermelada de carambola de Miro, qué delicias!
El barrio es tranquilo y se siente seguro al caminar, tanto de día como de noche. Está muy bien ubicado en relación al Centro, Lapa, el Sambódromo. También es fácil moverse para ir a las playas de zona Sur. 
Con convicción creemos que habremos de volver a Santa Teresa y sin dudas será a Canto de Carambola. Hemos quedado encantados con la buena energia que circunda este hogar y a sus dueños, muito obrigado de corazón.
Raúl e Vani.'}, {'_id': '58233262', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 1, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1844578', 'reviewer_id': '49237322', 'reviewer_name': 'Hayden', 'comments': 'El miros place was amazing ..... located in a very good area winthin santa teresa. [{'_id': '157748325', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 6, 4, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '19018752', 'reviewer_id': '115186068', 'reviewer_name': 'Andre', 'comments': 'Reservamos o quarto com a Cassiana, o quarto fica dentro de um hotel, fomos bem atendidos no hotel e também pela anfitriã, o local é bem localizado e está a 1 km da jeunesse arena, ficamos surpresos pois esperávamos menos... Super recomendo'}, {'_id': '194826226', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '19018752', 'reviewer_id': '104417367', 'reviewer_name': 'Giovanni', 'comments': 'Desde  consideração do lugar, a Cassiana foi gentil e atenciosa, esclarecendo todas as nossas dúvida. Atendia todas as minhas questões, pra não ter erro nenhum. eixou a gente super a vontade com relação ao check-in e check-out, e foi um amor deixando alguns mimos no quarto, quando chegamos. O espaço é incrível, muito organizado e com uma localização ótima. Como fomos para o Rock In Rio, ficamos bem contentes em saber que estávamos há apenas 5 minutos de caminhada do Parque Olímpico, onde se deu o evento. Acesso super fácil ao BRT, e com um suporte muito amplo de lugares públicos, como supermercados, drogarias, padarias, restaurantes, shopping e parques. Fizemos uma ótima escolha e pretendo visitar mais vezes! Melhor experiência no Rio de Janeiro <3'}, {'_id': '197483474', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '19018752', 'reviewer_id': '67780821', 'reviewer_name': 'Regina', 'comments': 'O quarto é perfeito para casal e super bem localizado na Barra. Fomos para o Rock in Rio e não poderíamos ter escolhido melhor: fomos e voltamos a pé dos shows todos os dias, tranquilamente. O condomínio também é ótimo e fica próximo a um minishopping, e um parque muito bom. A Cassiana foi super atenciosa conosco. Recomendo muito!'}]

[{'_id': '14110652', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1912695', 'reviewer_id': '2596213', 'reviewer_name': 'Robert', 'comments': 'We stayed at the Penthouse in the days leading up to the World Cup. '}, {'_id': '62858699', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 17, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1912695', 'reviewer_id': '14667634', 'reviewer_name': 'Enrico', 'comments': "All'arrivo in casa non c'era nessuno ad accoglierci, abbiamo avuto difficoltà a trovare l'appartamento in quanto nessuno ci aveva detto che dall'ultimo piano raggiungibile con l'ascensore dovevamo ancora salire un piano a piedi.
La piscina non era funzionante e non ci è stata riparata per tempo.
Le luci in terrazza erano in parte rotte.
In bagno le prese della corrente erano rotte.
L'impianto audio era inutilizzabile.
La cucina era poco attrezzata, non è stato possibile cucinare nulla e siamo dovuti andare tutti i giorni al ristorante."}, {'_id': '69421967', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 4, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1912695', 'reviewer_id': '41947759', 'reviewer_name': 'Philippe', 'comments': 'The apartment is very well located in Copacabana on the seafront From the 12th floor, the view is spectacular : from Sugar Loaf to the Fort Copacabana.
Its location in the city is perfect for visiting all the interests.
The building is a bit old as many in Copabana but is maintained. The apartment has undergone renovations that remain to be completed.
The air conditioning works well and the pool is very nice.
 2 bathrooms and kitchen have been remodeled.
We may regret the absence of a mixer on showers and of a dishwasher. The curtains are not blackout and should be changed.
The lighting in the rooms is impractical. Despite a sum of details that should be resolved shortly, it is very nice to stay in the apartment.'}, {'_id': '70588213', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 4, 18, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1912695', 'reviewer_id': '55757887', 'reviewer_name': 'Christos', 'comments': "The penthouse is located in a great spot in front of Copacabana beach with great view from every room. Although if i chose to visit Rio one more time, i would definitely choose Leblon to stay because of the proximity to all nice bars and restaurants. The neighbourhood is safe in general and we encountered no bad surprises! 
Pros: Frank and his team are really easy to find and very helpful. They provided everything we asked or at least they tried. The doormen are 24/7 and very helpful!
Cons: The apartment though had some issues. Firstly the jets don't work properly at the hot tub so its more like a small pool. One of two safes and the microwave were out of order. We had some difficulties to fix the right temperature of the water in the showers as well. When we visited there was noise coming from the renovation of the apartment just underneath ours so we had to wake up at 8 every day except weekends. Overall it was a satisfying experience. "}, {'_id': '76854719', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1912695', 'reviewer_id': '1391175', 'reviewer_name': 'Tracy', 'comments': 'Elisa and Frank were easy to get a hold of when our group of six had questions. Pros: Location, location, location! It's awesome and right on the beach with tons of places to eat and drink right around the corner! We were granted an early check-in and a late-check out. The view of the beach is fantastic and the lighting in the apartment is reminiscent of The Max from Saved By the Bell! Elisa, who helps you get the keys and communicates with you when you arrive in Rio, is welcoming and always reachable by (Hidden by Airbnb) . The doorman, Simão, is delightful and super friendly. We miss him already! 
Cons: This is advertised as a five star penthouse, however, we think it is more of a three star. Our group is all good with a three star, no problems...we have all stayed at a many Motel 6 before and hostels, but the advertising was not quite accurate. The space does not have the same furniture as pictured in the living room. We had previously contacted Frank about the "pool" because we saw prior guests write that it was not working. Frank assured us that it was, however, it did not work. Ivo, a maintenance man, came by twice to help and ultimately, it never worked. We felt bad, as it was not Ivo's fault and he also came by later because the second bathroom did not have hot water. Overall, we had a lovely time exploring Rio and we would have appreciated an honest representation of this space. '}, {'_id': '83626762', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 7, 3, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1912695', 'reviewer_id': '37763400', 'reviewer_name': 'Christoph', 'comments': 'Sehr freundliche Betreuung. [{'_id': '9801232', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1940174', 'reviewer_id': '10412778', 'reviewer_name': 'Daniel', 'comments': 'Ótima estadia em uma das melhores localizações do Rio. Rafael foi extremamente atencioso tanto na reserva quanto no check-in. Apartamento idêntico às fotos. Recomendamos fortemente a estadia.'}, {'_id': '11840462', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 4, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1940174', 'reviewer_id': '13540362', 'reviewer_name': 'Lucas', 'comments': 'O apto é ainda melhor do que nas fotos, muito amplo e arejado. Excelente localização, perto de tudo: praia, barzinhos, restaurantes, padaria, mercado e frutaria. O Atendimento por telefone feito pelo Rafael foi muito bom, nos deixando bem à vontade para tirar dúvidas. Os proprietários Angélica e Paulo foram muito atenciosos e simpáticos, nos recebendo muito bem. Tudo ocorreu conforme combinado, minha família e eu gostamos muito e quando voltarmos ao RJ com certeza vamos procurar ficar nesse mesmo apto. Só teve um pequeno "problema": existem muitos copos na estante da sala decorados com o escudo do time do Vasco, e eu sou Mengão, kkk. Brincadeiras a parte, recomendo a todos esse local e voltarei em breve. Obrigado.'}, {'_id': '17011472', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 8, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1940174', 'reviewer_id': '17781387', 'reviewer_name': 'Michelle', 'comments': 'O apartamento superou todas as expectativas, localização excelente,  tudo o que você precisa tem em menos de duas quadras, sem falar que é do ladinho da praia, pertinho do Forte de Copacabana.
Os anfitriões super atenciosos, sanaram todas as dúvidas antes de chegar do RJ, fomos muito bem recepcionados, com direito a mimos e tudo.

Angélica sua mãe, uma pessoa gentil e educada, superou todas as expectativas, com certeza recomendo a todos e qd retornar ao Rio ficarei lá novamente.'}, {'_id': '50267716', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '1940174', 'reviewer_id': '11415651', 'reviewer_name': 'Ludovic', 'comments': "Mes amis mon mari et moi avons passé une semaine dans l'appartement de Rafael, les échanges durant la réservation  se sont bien passé et Rafael a été plutôt réactif et précis. Nous avons été accueilli par ses parents à notre arrivée, des personnes très charmantes, ils nous ont montré l'appartement et donné les informations nécessaire pour le fonctionnement du matériel TV. 
Il y a un gardien très sympa à l'entrée de l'immeuble qui sécurise les lieux le jour et la nuit. 
L'appartement est très bien placé, à 2 minutes de Copacabana ! Un régal !
Concernant l'appartement en lui même, les chambres sont du côté rue c'est extrêmement bruyant, il n'y a pas de double vitrage, nous avons dû dormir avec des bouchons d'oreilles toute la semaine. Il y a une climatisation par chambre, elles aussi sont TRÈS bruyantes malheureusement. 
Les salles de bains sont spacieuses avec de grandes douches, il y en a une dans une chambre et pour la deuxième vous devrez traverser la cuisine pour y prendre votre douche... 
La propreté générale de l'appartement était correct malgré quelque cheveux dans la douche et du sable sur le sol. Un panier avec des produits de première nécessité nous a été offert à notre arrivée ainsi qu'une boîte de chocolat. 
Le WIFI est instable et de mauvaise qualité, impossible de se connecter à plusieurs sans devoir attendre plusieurs minutes avant de pouvoir ouvrir une page web. 
D'autre part, nous étions 2 couples et nous n'avions à disposition qu'une seule clé d'appartement se qui n'était pas évident à gérer lorsque nous faisions des activités différentes. 
Plus généralement l'appartement est correct et bien placé mais il y a vraiment besoin de revoir l'insonorisation des chambres et des climatisations ainsi que de mettre un double des clés à disposition des locataires. 
"}, {'_id': '52888574', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '1940174', 'reviewer_id': '36671316', 'reviewer_name': 'Gilberto', 'comments': 'O apartamento é conforme o descrito, a localização não poderia ser melhor, todos os serviços muito próximos ao apartamento, a atenção e maleabilidade para atender meus horários foram os melhores pontos. The apartment is really what it says in the announce, really good place to be , near to everything that you can need, the kindness to deal with my crazy schedule were fantastic, I will recommend today and ever for anyone who needs to stay in rio.

Rafael's mom and dad greeted us at the apartment and took us through the apartment, it's amenities, the neighborhood and city guides! Very friendly and helpful. 

The apartment is well spaced and the rooms are fairly large and comfortable. The place is tastefully furnished with all modern appliances. There was more than adequate bed and bath linen provided as well as enough toiletries. Everything was neat and clean. 

The apartment is in a perfect location for tourists. Just a minute away from Copacabana beach and 3 blocks away from the subway station. It's surrounded by many restaurants and bars. 

Perhaps the icing on the cake was the prompt and valuable advice Rafael gave us whenever we sought it including helping us find last minute tickets to a league football match at Maracana stadium. El departamento es excelente, moderno y bien cuidado,  tenía muchas toallas de muy buena calidad y estaba equipado con suficientes y buenos articulos de aseo, algo destacable es que posee muchos closets, lo que es muy cómodo para mantener todo en orden.

A pesar de estar en un edificio relativamente antiguo el apartamento ha sido remodelado y tiene un ambiente acogedor y moderno. El baño y la cocina son prácticos, renovados y muy limpios, la sala, comedor y habitación ofrecen espacios agradables y confortables.

Al llegar Maria Lucía nos recibió con gran amabilidad y nos explicó al detalle las condiciones y recomendaciones del apartamento, nos tenía agua embotellada, galletas y otros detalles. Realmente su amabilidad merece 5 estrellas.  

Fue inesperado que nos hiciera firmar un contrato durante el hospedaje indicando las fechas de estadía y el valor de cada uno de los artículos dentro del apartamento en caso de daño. Esto nunca lo había hecho en oportunidades anteriores. Esto no fue problema toda vez que devolvimos el apartamento en las mismas condiciones pero fue curioso.

El Sector: Es una zona céntrica de  Copacabana, con mucho comercio informal y formal. Eso significa vendedores ambulantes, transeúntes, supermercados y restaurantes. No recomendaría caminar después de 10PM por temas de seguridad, aunque es sólo mi percepción. 

Después de mi estadía en la apartamento de Maria Lucía, sólo mejoraría la velocidad de la conexión a internet (es de 1 Mb).

A localização é ótima! Perto da Av. Rio Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, onde tem buses que vão para todos os pontos turísticos da cidade, a poucos quarteirões da estação de metrô Cantagalo. Muito próximo a pé das praias de Copacabana, Arpoador e Ipanema. O bairro está cheio de lugares para comer (Salgados, bares e restaurantes), há dois supermercados perto.
O apartamento é muito espaçoso, confortável, e você pode ver a praia de Copacabana pela janela. Como é um andar alto você ate pode dormir com as janelas abertas! 
Muito obrigado Diogo! Adoramos Rio!

Perfect location, near the buses, metro and a few minutes walk from the main beaches (Copacabana, Arpoador, Ipanema). There are plenty of bars and delis just around the corner, and supermarkets which were useful to make it cheaper for us. We really enjoyed Rio thanks to being there. ThankU so much Diogo!

[{'_id': '241278903', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 3, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '20969380', 'reviewer_id': '19109930', 'reviewer_name': 'Federico', 'comments': 'Lindos departamentos, en un edificio muy comodo. [{'_id': '235114493', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 15, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '21053564', 'reviewer_id': '169713163', 'reviewer_name': 'Henrik', 'comments': 'O apartamento da Rose é super bem localizado em Ipanema, é perto do metrô, perto da Avenida Visconde de Pirajá com todo tipo de comércio disponível e muito fácil de chegar à praia andando.

O Quarto conta com um banheiro, ambos pequenos, porém totalmente conveniente para uma pessoa solteira que busca apenas um lugar para dormir e tomar um banho tranquilamente.

Rose é uma pessoa simpática, tive mais contato com seu filho Pietro, que é um jovem muito solicito e simpático, sempre me tratou muito bem e disposto a dar dicas sobre os melhores lugares onde eu poderia gostar de ir. Os funcionários de portaria também são muito gentis.

Totalmente recomendo o apartamento da Rose!!

Rose’s place is really well located at Ipanema, close to the metro, close to Visconde de Pirajá avenue where you can find anything you need from supermarkets, drugstore and restaurants.

The room has a bathroom, both are small, but fits perfectly to a single person like me who was just looking for a place to sleep and have a shower.

Rose is friendly, I’ve had much more contact with her son Pietro, who is a young guy really friendly and always willing to give me good advices of places that a guy like me would like. I really appreciate that. 

I totally recommend Rose’s place!'}, {'_id': '366846188', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '21053564', 'reviewer_id': '180200688', 'reviewer_name': 'Andres', 'comments': 'Si bien las fotos de la publicacion no coinciden con la habitacion que nos dieron, ya que nos toco una mas pequeña, igual nos sentimos comodos. Excelente ubicación. Rose es muy amable y una inquilina que vive alli tambien. Tuvimos un problema con el inodoro  y rose estuvo muy predispuesta a solucionarlo rápidamente. Como no se pudo arreglar nos permitio usar otro. La ducha del baño no es muy comoda. El espacio de la pileta es hermoso aunque su acceso no es completamente libre ya que hay que pasar por la habitacion de la inquilina. El resto del departamento es muy lindo y confortable, asi como tambien el edificio, que tiene seguridad. La pasamos muy lindo. Muchas gracias!'}]

[{'_id': '27392582', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2105881', 'reviewer_id': '26221452', 'reviewer_name': 'Jaime', 'comments': 'O apartamento fica no bairro carioca do Botafogo, bem a meio-caminho de todos os pontos mais interessantes do Rio de Janeiro. O apartamento é muito bem instalado; quarto tem cama gigantesca (tenho 1,90 e não tive problemas), ar condicionado e ventilador para os mais friorentos; sua cozinha é bem instalada (fizemos café da manhã e lanche noturno todos os dias), sala e varandas aconchegantes com uma excelente vista do Cristo redentor. [{'_id': '124995200', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2113927', 'reviewer_id': '96218030', 'reviewer_name': 'Ana', 'comments': 'Excelente estadia tivemos no apartamento da Sandra! Ela flexibilizou os horários de check in e check out de acordo com nossas necessidades e atrasos. Aluguei para o reveillon com alguns amigos e não tivemos nenhum problema no prédio ou no apartamento. Assim que chegamos, Sandra nos recebeu pessoalmente e deu todas as orientações de chuveiro, cozinha, etc. Ela havia deixado água na geladeira, uma coca cola e algumas frutas para quando chegássemos. O apartamento estava limpinho, o espaço é ótimo, ideal para seis, sete pessoas. Existem dois banheiros com chuveiro funcionando. Ao lado do prédio existe uma lanchonete e ao lado da lanchonete uma agência do Banco do Brasil. Na esquina há uma agência do Banco Itau e uma Loja Americanas. Em frente ao prédio há uma loja da Mundo Verde, para quem compra coisas saudáveis e sem açúcares e também um restaurante self service (por quilo) de comida caseira muito bom e barato.\nAssim que pudermos, voltaremos!!!'}, {'_id': '134831454', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 1, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2113927', 'reviewer_id': '108033255', 'reviewer_name': 'Everton', 'comments': 'Lugar muito bem localizado, apesar de não muito amplo o apartamento acomodou muito bem todos hospedes, lugar do jeitinho como descrito e com uma anfitriã fora de serie. Voltar e quase uma obrigação. '}, {'_id': '234882732', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2113927', 'reviewer_id': '151388504', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariana', 'comments': 'Bom, tivemos um problema com o check in. Eu e minhas amigas alugamos a casa de sexta de carnaval até quarta feira de cinzas. E por motivos pessoais, não podíamos chegar na sexta durante o dia e avisamos a Sandra que chegaríamos de madrugada. E a resposta dela foi que não poderíamos chegar de madrugada, e sim no sábado pela manha. Não gostamos, pois estávamos com a casa alugada e tivemos essa resposta. Assim que chegamos no sábado, Sandra abriu a porta do apartamento e disse “ué, vocês não iriam chegar no domingo?” Ficamos mais uma vez decepcionadas. Tirando essa péssima desavença, o resto foi ok. A casa limpa e bem arejada, tivemos uma ótima estadia. A casa muito bem localizada.'}]

[{'_id': '9768485', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '11044145', 'reviewer_name': 'Rafael', 'comments': "My girlfriend and I stayed at Ewa's and Davi's house in Santa Teresa, Rio during the new years holiday of 2013/2014. It was a very good experience. Rooms are confortable, wide and clean. The house is also well decorated and breakfast is tasty. It is well located in Santa Teresa (which is my favorite neighborhood of Rio) in a quite street that is close to bars and restaurants (less than 5 minutes walk). I definitely recommend, 5 stars!"}, {'_id': '9942293', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '1428043', 'reviewer_name': 'Anne', 'comments': "We had a very nice stay in Ewa's house, in the lovely area of Santa Teresa. Welcoming host, comfy house and bedroom, good breakfast.   The area is also well connected by bus to other districts of Rio, and 10 mins walking from the vibrant neighborhood of Lapa, full of bars and nice restaurants."}, {'_id': '10024554', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '6537132', 'reviewer_name': 'Jonas', 'comments': "The house is centrally located in the charming neighborhood of Santa Teresa. From there it is easy and cheap to explore the city's attractions by bus. We felt safe in the area, even if we have came home after sunset.

We spent one week at Ewa and Davi’s house and were very warmly welcomed. Both were glad to assist us in any possible way and gave us a lot of helpful informations to the city. Great was as well the small guide, written by Ewa, containing small walking tours through the quarters of Rio.

The rooms are located in an old building that has been affectionately renovated by the two. The photos in the profile give a realistic impression of the accomodation.
The rooms and the public areas were clean of great amenity value. Convenient for us was the fully equipped kitchen that we could use at any time.

The highlight of the day was the excellent breakfast. We could not even make it better. It contained the best home-baked bread, fresh fruit juices, french cheese, fruits, cereals, eggs, ... 
And even though we were there for one week, some individual components of the breakfast vary, so there was always something new to discover.

We would warmly recommend this accommodation to each of our friends and can not wait to come back ourselves.


*****


Das Haus liegt zentral in dem charmanten Stadtviertel Santa Teresa. Von dort kann man gut und günstig mit dem Bus alle Sehenswürdigkeiten der Stadt erkunden. Wir haben uns in der Gegend sicher gefühlt, selbst wenn wir erst im Dunkeln nach Hause gekommen sind.

Wir haben eine Woche bei Ewa und Davi verbracht und wurden sehr herzlich aufgenommen. Die Beiden standen uns bei allen Fragen mit Rat und Tat zur Seite und konnten uns jede Menge hilfreicher Tipps zur Stadt geben. Toll war auch der eigens verfasste kleine Reiseführer von Ewa, mit kleinen Stadtrundgängen durch die einzelnen Viertel Rios. 

Die Zimmer befinden sich in einem Altbau, der von den Beiden liebevoll renoviert wurde. Die Fotos im Profil geben einen realistischen Eindruck von den Räumlichkeiten wieder.
Das Zimmer, sowie die allgemeinen Räume waren von großer Aufenthaltsqualität und vorbildlich sauber. Praktisch für uns war die voll ausgestattete Küche, die wir jederzeit benutzen konnten.

Das Highlight des Tages war das grandiose Frühstück. Man könnte es selbst nicht besser machen. Es gab die besten selbst gebackenen Brötchen, frische Fruchtsäfte, französischer Käse, Obst, Müsli, Eier, … Und obwohl wir eine Woche dort waren, variierten einzelne Komponenten des Frühstückes, sodass es immer wieder etwas neues zu entdecken gab.

Wir würden jedem unserer Freunde diese Unterkunft empfehlen und können es kaum erwarten selbst wieder zu kommen.
"}, {'_id': '10109869', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 31, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '6162503', 'reviewer_name': 'Pete', 'comments': "Great place in the coolest neighbourhood.  Rooms are very clean and well kept, Breakfast was prepared with love, the hosts are very nice and helpful.  I will definitely stay there again when I'm back in Rio."}, {'_id': '10400017', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 17, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '11880769', 'reviewer_name': 'Laura', 'comments': 'My boyfriend and I spent a memorable weekend in Rio, hosted by Ewa. The house and room are gorgeous, located in the beautiful neighborhood of Santa Teresa. The breakfast is full of all good things, like the homemade bread and the fresh fruit juices.
We used all the time the small guide printed by Ewa, containing walking tours in every neighborhood of Rio.
Hope to be back soon!'}, {'_id': '10460041', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '12221579', 'reviewer_name': 'Maria Eugenia', 'comments': 'Estamos muy contentos de haber dado con Ewa en nuestro viaje. 
Fue muy gentil, atenta, y lo mejor es que prepara unos desayunos muy buenos, con mucho amor. 
La casa está bien ubicada en el barrio de Santa Teresa, un lugar de Río muy interesante, para quien le gusta sumergirse en la cultura e historia de Brasil. Queda a unos minutos caminando del barrio de Lapa. El diseño y la decoración de la casa están 10 puntos, se nota que saben...
Recomendamos sin dudas la casita, de volver a Río me hospedaría nuevamente ahí. '}, {'_id': '10757788', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 3, 6, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '8780662', 'reviewer_name': 'Matthew', 'comments': "The hosts were the hosts that EVERYONE wants! They responded to messages promptly,made sure that we arrived safely, helped us order tickets for events/sightseeing on websites that were in Portuguese.... they really went beyond the duty of hosts, and I must  mention, they are just kind people. The house was awesome...clean, comfortable with a minimalistic and artistic flair. The big shower with the window followed by the perfect latte is the perfect start to anyones morning. The breakfast menu consisted of homemade bread,cheese,hard boiled eggs,meats homemade muesli,yogurt,tropical fruits,juices,pao de quejo...DELICIOUS! When my girlfriend and I go back to Rio, we know exactly where we're going back to stay! "}, {'_id': '10817649', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 3, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '8642411', 'reviewer_name': 'Jackie', 'comments': "We arrived early in the morning and were greeted right away by Ewa. She offered us breakfast and a chance to shower even though we had not stayed there the night before. The place looks exactly as it appeared in the photos. The design is perfect and you can tell Ewa and David put a lot of thought into it. David designed and made almost all the furniture in their place.  Our room was a good size, had a hammock that we used every day, and two big windows with amazing views. There are two bathrooms, both with brand new fixtures, and great design as well!  Breakfast was amazing! It was the best I have had in Brazil. Homemade bread, fruit, meats, cheeses, fresh juices, and other things that kind of vary day to day. Ewa also makes an amazing cup of coffee with steamed milk that she offered to us throughout the day. She also hand made books and maps highlighting cool things to do in Rio De Janeiro and Santa Teresa which we used every day we were there. Her husband David is from Rio and gave us lots of good tips and ideas about what to do as well. 
This was our first time using Airbnb and weren't quite sure what to expect but were more than satisfied with our stay, in fact, I can't even imagine there being a better place to stay in Rio. We will definitely stay there again!

Every morning- Delicious and NEW brekfast +  New collection of Fresh Juices+ Brazilian music "playlisted" by Davi especially for us.

the neighborhood is amazing- quiet, friendly and inspiring.  
'}, {'_id': '11281469', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 3, 28, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '717932', 'reviewer_name': 'Taylor', 'comments': "Beautiful place built with love and the best breakfast in Brazil. Add the trendy area and this Ewa and David's bnb, a gem.

They've built out the entire place themselves with four rooms for guests and have done a great job. The pictures do a good job showing you ;)

"}, {'_id': '11374260', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 3, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '8149657', 'reviewer_name': 'Romulo', 'comments': "The Bnb is amazing! What’s more, as other guests have noted, the included breakfast is fantastic. It includes home-made rolls, fresh juice and good coffee, tons of fruit, pao de queijo and other items. "}, {'_id': '14144832', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '2325838', 'reviewer_name': 'Julia', 'comments': "We loved our stay in Santa Teresa at Ewa's place. Quinten & Erika'}, {'_id': '22008640', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 10, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '22931163', 'reviewer_name': 'Evandro', 'comments': 'Adorei ter ficado com vocês, o cafe da manha foi ótimo amei a hospitalidade '}, {'_id': '22345802', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '2805800', 'reviewer_name': 'Nadya', 'comments': "I’d been in Brazil for about a week and a half, traveling around Rio state, before coming to Rio to spend the end of my two week trip there. I chose Ewa’s place based mainly on the beautiful pictures of the place (image culture forever) on the airbnb website. 

I want to talk about a few things in this review: 1) Santa Teresa (aka, Ewa’s neighborhood), 2) the House (capitalized!), 3) Ewa and Davie. 

1) Santa Teresa. Different people who'd been recommended staying here, even though it’s much closer to the city center (Centro) than it is to Ipanema/Copacabana. It’s a beautiful neighborhood and there are small shops, restaurants, galleries, and bars, but people LIVE there, making it vibrant. It’s also VERY hilly and walking around in that neighborhood gives you a new appreciation for what I imagine taking walks in the (US) Midwest is like. But the views! Every corner there’s a new one, there’s wall-art everywhere, houses are gorgeous. Gloria is (I believe) the closest metro station and it’s a little bit of a hike ~25 minutes of leisurely walk and uphill on the way back. It’s also kind of easy to get lost because the roads turn into different roads, double back on themselves, and just in general, hilly terrain isn’t the easiest for finding your way. That being said, getting there and away was always an adventure in map-reading and you develop a feel for the directions VERY quickly (because you have to), which feels like what exploring other places is supposed to feel like. Loved Santa.

2) the House. OMG THE HOUSE. It’s so beautiful, Ewa and Davie have spent so much care and time on decoration and design. The place is one of the most beautiful, thoughtful living spaces I’ve ever seen. Sounds like hyperbole. Isn’t. Both of them MADE (WITH THEIR HANDS!) the tables in the common/kitchen/living space, and Davie taught me a lot about the different types of brazilian wood (there are so many). Oh and he made the beautiful bed frames. The love that went into this place is palpable and makes the house an above and beyond great place to stay. Hammocks and fans in every room, but no AC. Not a deal breaker, just good knowledge to have going to Rio (say, if you’re sensitive and can’t sleep if the ambient temperature isn’t down to your needs).

3) Ewa and Davie. So friendly, so helpful, made delicious, delicious breakfast (freshly baked bread!?). Told us lots of stories, gave us advice when we needed it, were hands-off when we wanted to fly free or just pass out in our room hammock. Basically, the perfect hosts. We weren’t the only guests while we were staying there (they have several rooms on airbnb) and that was awesome too. We chatted with the travelers over coffee at beautiful tables hand-made out of reclaimed brazilian wood. It didn’t get much better than staying with them, I’d love to do it again! "}, {'_id': '22625773', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '22158153', 'reviewer_name': 'Svend', 'comments': 'Ich war ungefähr eine Woche in Rio bei Ewa und Davi und kann mich den vielen positiven Kommentaren hier nur anschließen. Stay as you are! Congratulation for everything!'}, {'_id': '23388308', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 30, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '574361', 'reviewer_name': 'Ilana', 'comments': "Staying at Ewa and Davi's house feels like having the chance to enter someone's dream made concrete by their own hands - literally, including the tables and the photo+illustration frames. For all that they have used 'pinho de riga', a kind of wood that is rare to find  nowadays in Brasil, but of which there was plenty in the original structure of this house. The windows restoration is quite impressive, and I feel that like that, with no painting, showing their simply beautiful veins, they get to be prettier that ever - and also make a good symbol of the concept there seems do be behind every decision made to make this house rebirth. 
During our 3 days we had the sensation that Santa Teresa is a good travel destiny on its own, and spending some night and days just there could be refreshing even for a carioca."}, {'_id': '23801379', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '2726777', 'reviewer_name': 'Dasha', 'comments': "Ewa and Davi were the most wonderful hosts. When we arrived a lot later than expected on Friday night trying to figure out the address in the dark, Ewa came out onto the street and welcomed us. She offered us water and cake, we really felt right at home. The breakfast in the morning was everything we could have asked for - fresh juices, coffee, home made bread, cheeses, fruit, cereal, yogurt... amazing. Right away, Ewa was very friendly and extremely helpful with her advice. She has made special brochures for every neighbourhood in Rio worth visiting with personal recommendations of places to check out, eat at, etc. We ended up using them on daily basis and they sure came in handy. 
The house is a colonial jewel, bright,clean and spacious rooms with a touch of contemporary design. So pleasant to chill at, it must have been one of the reasons we had really long breakfasts. The location  -Santa Teresa is a true find for anyone with appreciation of art and architecture. There is a myriad of local shops, bars and restaurants around that are really worth checking out, during the day and in the evening. 
We originally booked for five nights as we thought it'll be sufficient for Rio, but then we liked it so much we stayed five extra nights. Ewa and Davi's home and company was definitely part of the amazing vacation feel, and I'm really thankful to them. They truly care about their guests having a great time and leaving with the best impression and memories of their magnificent city. "}, {'_id': '23824353', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '10976042', 'reviewer_name': 'Elena', 'comments': 'We just fell in love with this house and Ewa! Santa Teresa itself is a beautiful suburb of Rio de Janeiro, with nice little cafes, restaurants and bars. There is loads of graffiti art, colonial buildings and beautiful gardens to explore. Ich habe mich wirklich sehr wohl gefühlt und werde das liebevoll gestaltete Frühstück vermissen ;) 
Es war ein sehr sozialer und unterhaltsamer Ort und ich  komme wieder! Bis bald*"}, {'_id': '138930133', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '14536240', 'reviewer_name': 'James', 'comments': "We've stayed in many great air bnbs but Ewa's place is our best-ever air bnb experience, and we can't recommend her wonderful home and her amazing hospitality highly enough. 

Where to start?! The house is in Santa Teresa, a beautiful and bohemian enclave of Rio on a hill overlooking Centro and Lapa (near to all of the samba bars and clubs). Exploring the neighbourhood was fantastic and it's close to the famous Santa Teresa tram (bonde). 

Ewa's place itself is a beautiful converted townhouse, with designer touches throughout. Amazing ceramic tiles, cool furniture and light fittings with Ewa's own photography on the wall. She lives upstairs so is always available but also gives you space if you need it. 

Ewa was super helpful throughout; she's designed and printed her own guides to each area of Rio which were a great local's way of exploring the city. She kindly did some laundry for us at no extra cost and printed off bus tickets. Nothing was too much trouble! 

The room was clean and comfortable with a hammock and pretty wooden shutters. There's a fan which made sleeping no problem. 

And then there's the breakfast! Truly unbelievable. Each morning Ewa would put out freshly baked homemade bread, cured meats, cheeses, fresh fruit and yoghurt with coffee and homemade juice. It saved us a lot of money and was truly delicious! 

As you can tell I could gush about this place all day. The touristy areas of Ipanema and Copacabana are full of faceless tower blocks; staying here will give you a real taste of old Rio at a very reasonable price. "}, {'_id': '140915762', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 4, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '95638430', 'reviewer_name': 'Naila', 'comments': 'The interiors and laid back style made my stay enjoyable.'}, {'_id': '153684359', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 5, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2116352', 'reviewer_id': '10776530', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariana', 'comments': "We had a wonderful time at Ewa and Davi's place. Adorei a estadia e voltarei com certeza.'}, {'_id': '149891393', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 5, 6, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2119162', 'reviewer_id': '11282963', 'reviewer_name': 'Nélia', 'comments': "Commençons plutôt par les points positifs pour ne pas paraitre trop méchant par la suite. Appartement très bien situé dans Copacabana, à 7-8 min à pied de la plage, et à 2-3 min du Métro. Communication avec Adriano parfaite. Appartement cosy mais quelques points négatifs tout de même. 
Voici les points négatifs, une des fenêtres du salon reste en permanence ouverte, pour y laisser passer un tuyau de l'évacuation de la climatisation, bref, Isolation du bruit et du froid à l'extérieur 0/10. L'appartement se trouve au rez de chaussée, certes c'est l'idéal pour les bagages quand on arrive et pour ramener des courses, mais c'est au même endroit que se trouve un gardien (Jour et Nuit), et ils sont malheureusement un peu bruyant, donc un conseil, prenez des boules quies. La cuisine n'est vraiment pas fonctionnel, très peu de couverts, ou de verres, vraiment à renouveler. Et dernier point un peu effrayant je vous l'accorde, mais personnellement, nous aurions aimé le savoir en lisant les commentaires, il y a des cafards, et oui pas que un mais des, nous en avons trouvés 4 et pas des tout petits :-((((. Encore une fois Adriano, ce commentaire n'a rien contre vous, votre communication est parfaite, vous semblez être un gentil garçon, mais honnêtement le statut de SuperHost est à mes yeux un peu exagéré. Il y pas mal de choses à améliorer dans l'appartement.
Here are the negatives, one of the windows of the living room is permanently open, to let pass a pipe of evacuation of the air conditioning, in short, Isolation of the noise and the cold outside 0/10. The apartment is on the ground floor, although it is ideal for luggage when arriving and to bring back shopping, but it is in the same place that there is a guard (Day and Night), and they are Unfortunately a bit noisy, so a tip, take earplugs. The kitchen is really not functional, very few cutlery, or glasses, really to renew. [{'_id': '14731755', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2163225', 'reviewer_id': '7285379', 'reviewer_name': 'Nurlan', 'comments': 'Мы с супругой останавливались у Марсело с 14 по 24 июня в период группового этапа чемпионата мира по футболу 2014 года в Бразилии, когда все гостиницы были переполнены и цены на проживание возросли вдвое, однако благодаря airbnb и гостеприимству Марсело, мы провели не забываемый отпуск в одном их лучших районов Рио де Жанейро. Одним из безусловных преимуществ апартаментов Марсело является их расположение в элитном и безопасном районе Ипанемы. 
В квартире имеется все необходимое, чтобы чувствовать себя, как дома (стиральная машинка, электрическая плитка, кухонные принадлежности, пляжные шезлонги и тд. ).

'}, {'_id': '195997195', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2163225', 'reviewer_id': '7534843', 'reviewer_name': 'Diego', 'comments': 'El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía confortable. Sabiendo que muchos viajeros tienen muy en cuenta la seguridad, genera mucha confianza que el edificio cuente con vigilancia las 24 horas. También que haya un control policial permanente apenas cruzando la calle. En el barrio podrán encontrar todo lo necesario, supermercados, tiendas, farmacias, y la hermosa playa de Ipanema a solo dos calles. El wifi funciona perfecto, lo mismo que la TV con canales locales, youtube y Netflix. El baño, cocina y, lo más importante, la cama, son súper cómodos. La limpieza es impecable. Súper recomendado.'}, {'_id': '197950235', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2163225', 'reviewer_id': '148129865', 'reviewer_name': 'Antonio Durval', 'comments': 'O apartamento é confortável e limpo. Voltaríamos outras vezes se possível.'}, {'_id': '234369260', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 12, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2163225', 'reviewer_id': '104646499', 'reviewer_name': 'Nicola', 'comments': 'The location is perfect and the apartment is as described.

However, I had some issues in the relation with the host, Marcelo.
Marcelo complained, at various rates, in any single occasion we had to comunicate: literally from the first day to the last.
Although I was probably not at the highest of the organization , it was Carnaval in Brazil. This makes messy the country in general and Rio in particular. But for this reason we were paying a specially high amount of money, more than 500 reais/night for 1 room flat.

Not to enter here disputable and unsolved big issues, I mention here only three indisputable ones:
- a complain about cleanliness (which was absolutely fine, according to former experience) and especially sand (!?) while I am paying 180Reais(!!) for cleaning 1 room
- a complain about trash, when not a single word was told us on how to deal with it (whoever travels, knows that rules change consistently from country to country)
- an ABSOLUTELY FALSE complain about used condoms left around, which we did NOT use at all. We left some closed ones because we were given those in Carnaval. Either this was a plain lie, or some former used condoms were found in the flat, which would make the cleanliness of the flat really low. However, we did not find any used condoms.

All those kind of complains, which I found completely bad posed, rendered my relation with the host uneasy.

In conclusion, if the period of time and your style of travel is highly fixed, and you do not specifically care about the relation with the host, probably your travel here will work without any problem and, I repeat, the location is amazing.

If, for your travel, it is crucial the hospitality and a nice and smooth relation with your host, this might be not the right place.'}, {'_id': '369405899', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2163225', 'reviewer_id': '162377842', 'reviewer_name': 'Daniel', 'comments': 'Marcelo tiene una comunicación en más de un idioma, lo hace bueno para manejarse mejor con él. el apartamento está ideal, creo que podría decir que mucho mejor a lo que representa por fotos. La limpieza al momento de nuestra llegada estaba perfecta. fuimos una pareja, el sommier es muy comodo, algo a tener en cuenta si se va a pasar varios días. (10 nuestro caso)
la ubicación es practicamente perfecta, a 2 cuadras de la playa (el apto cuenta con un par de sillas y sombrilla) aparte de estar realmente muy bien equipado en otros aspectos, tiene esto un plus si también tu idea es hacer playa.
Como consejo si viajas sin datos moviles, preguntar antes de la llegada numero de telefono o numero de apartamento, para contactarlo al momento de hacer el checkin, no tuvimos esa información y cuando el portero nos hizo pasar al lobby del edificio, (dudaba si dejarnos pasar porque no teniamos mucha información) estuvimos vario rato buscando la forma de contactarnos con el anfitrión para ingresar.
Despues de todo, fueron unas muy lindas vacaciones, el apartamento es muy comodo para ser un mono ambiente, y no le hace falta nada. sin dudas que si algún conocido vuelve a ir, le recomendaría el apartamento de Marcelo.
para el que quiera, entrando en éste enlace y creando una cuenta, tendrá unos 30 USD gratis para su hospedaje: https://es.airbnb.com/c/danieli8000?currency=UYU'}, {'_id': '401382546', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2163225', 'reviewer_id': '10813662', 'reviewer_name': 'Roberto', 'comments': 'O apartamento é estilo loft, muito arejado e claro. Fez bastante falta a mesa para comer (Marcelo informou no check in que estava aguardando a chegada do tampo) e acredito que deixaria a sensação de um espaço mais diferenciado um jogo copos novos, pratos brancos e talhares novos (algumas facas estavam desmontando). Senti dificuldade com a geladeira que não gelou água mesmo no freezer.

[{'_id': '9945256', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '11173018', 'reviewer_name': 'Loana', 'comments': 'O apartamento é muito confortável e tem tudo o que precisamos para uma boa estadia! O proprietário também é muito atencioso e sempre disponível. Imóvel super recomendado!'}, {'_id': '10056370', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '11554735', 'reviewer_name': 'Carlos', 'comments': 'Excellent and well situated apartment, only two blocks from Copacabana beach. The building has 24H security system. The place comfortably accommodates 4 people in 2 double beds. Street noises are not a problem since the apartment is located at 6th floor and the window has good acoustic insulation, which is excellent when you want to rest after spending your day having fun at the beach. Also, you will have TV, Wifi internet connection and a potent air conditioning system. The kitchen is well equipped and allows your to prepare your own food if you wish. In case you want not to wast time cooking, there are great restaurants nearby. Decoration is modern and make the ambient even more cozy. Negotiation and deal was a pleasant experience since the owner is quite respectful and a very kink person. For now on, this place is my favorite to stay when I am in Rio!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Excelente apartamento e com ótima localização, há apenas duas quadras da praia de Copacabana, em um prédio com segurança 24H. O apartamento hospeda com muito conforto 4 pessoas em duas camas de casal. Por ficar no sexto andar e com o ótimo isolamento acústico da janela, nem dá pra ouvir o barulho da rua, o que é ótimo quando se quer relaxar e descansar depois de um longo dia de praia e sol! O conforto não para por aí. O ambiente ainda conta com ar condicionado super potente, TV, internet Wifi e uma cozinha completa para que você prepare suas próprias refeições. Se não quiser perder tempo cozinhando, existem ótimas opções de restaurantes na região. A decoração em geral é de muito bom gosto e moderna. Por fim, a experiência de negociação e locação foi muito tranquila e o proprietário foi extremamente atencioso. '}, {'_id': '11537380', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 4, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '3831814', 'reviewer_name': 'Ayaz', 'comments': "My girlfriend and I stayed in this apartment for a week and had a great experience. The location is good, right on the border between Copacabana and Leme, with a nice mix of tourist things (a Best Western is across the street) and local things (supermarket, restaurants, etc) nearby. The metro is a close walk as are a few bus stops that can get you pretty much anywhere in the city. And, of course, the beach is right down the street. 

Most of all, we enjoyed the experience because of Rafael. He was extremely attentive and helpful, even providing a booklet highlighting essential things near the apartment. Muito bem localizado, pertinho de uma estação do Bike Rio e da praia, além de diversos restaurantes, serviços e estação de metro. Apesar disso, tivemos problemas com o chuveiro (durava cerca de 3 min ligado), em função de uma reforma na rede elétrica do prédio - fato que não estávamos avisados previamente, e também problemas de comunicação, tendo que antecipar nosso check out sem estarmos preparados e de acordo com isso - e tendo que matar tempo na rua, abaixo de chuva, para esperar a hora do vôo. Ainda assim, o Rafael assumiu o erro e se dispôs a nos recompensar pelo mal entendido, então, apesar dos pesares, apreciamos essa atitude e acreditamos que ele terá mais cuidado com os próximos hóspedes, pois o apartamento tem muito potencial para ser um lugar incrível para se hospedar no RJ :)'}, {'_id': '14947179', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '11522384', 'reviewer_name': 'Michael', 'comments': "Three friends and I visited Rio for the World Cup and stayed in Rafael's place. '}, {'_id': '18164788', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 8, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '656997', 'reviewer_name': 'Justine', 'comments': "What can I say? Our stay in Brazil was magical for many reasons and this apartment certainly helped facilitate that because of location, location, location. The apartment itself does look and feel much like the pictures show. It is definitely enough space for a bachelor, a couple, or a small family such as we are - two adults and a youngster. If your party is bigger than that, well more power to you, but we wouldn't recommend it. Lol.

Rafael's studio is conveniently located on a quiet street on the edge of a busy boulevard, not too far from the beach, public transportation, and plenty of awesome restaurants that are open at all hours for your convenience. 

Unfortunately, the building itself is undergoing repairs so the entrance and lobby look shabby, water pressure is low at times, and the electrical grid is very, very temperamental. However, the staff in the building are really pleasant and helpful and Rafael was accommodating and supportive. We were a long term stay - over a month - so we had to suffer through various planned and unplanned power outages that we otherwise may not have endured if we were just in town for a few days. We must mention, however, Rafael did right by us in stepping up to support us in times of need, it was just frustrating to have to deal with these things over time.

If the electrical situation in the building gets fixed I would whole-heartedly recommend this place to anyone including families with small children but as a mother, as the place is now, I would say it is best for bachelors, couples, or groups of younger travelers but not for families.

The AC cuts out too often, the shower generally runs cool to warm at best, and sparks fly in the kitchen from time to time making it a little less than cozy or charming during this period of renovation. Otherwise the place is very cool, well-decorated, and owned by a well-meaning AirBnB host who I can tell is a really nice guy. "}, {'_id': '19310089', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 9, 10, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '3102929', 'reviewer_name': 'Marta', 'comments': "Staying at Rafael's place was great! Dort trafen wir auf die sehr nette Putzfrau, welche gerade ihre Sachen zusammen gepackt hat (wir waren etwas zu früh da). Die Wohnung ist genau wie auf den Fotos bzw. den Beschreibungen. The area itself has a few bars and restaurants but you have to travel a little for the best places. That's no problem though because there's a metro stop less than 10 mins walk.

This place is great if you want somewhere nice to crash and you're happy to do lots of exploring. But if you want somewhere where you never have to go far from the apartment that's still near the beach, maybe try somewhere in Ipanema instead.

Rafael was really helpful, and answered a bunch of questions for us about how to get around while we were there, even at really short notice. There's a lot of handy info in the flat and he's put together a guide of the best bars/restaurants/clubs too. (Pretty telling that only one of them's in Copacabana though!)"}, {'_id': '116758036', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '13555708', 'reviewer_name': 'Sara', 'comments': 'We booked this air bnb studio apartment months in advance and from the beginning Rafael made us feel so welcome giving us tips about Rio. Thanks Rafael for a great stay and time in Rio!'}, {'_id': '120107669', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '34605789', 'reviewer_name': 'Nancy F.', 'comments': 'El departamento de Rafael es tal cual las fotos, muy bien ubicado a 2 cuadras de la playa...cerca de las lineas de bus y el metro. Apartamento limpo, organizado, super bem localizado a 3 quadras da estação Cardeal Arcoverde do metrô, tem mercado próximo, uma feirinha de hortifrutis, farmácias, padarias e restaurantes. 5 minutinhos da praia de Copacabana, e do quiosque que vende ingresso para o Corcovado onde vc vai de van da praia até o Cristo. Vc acha táxi praticamente na porta, ônibus a todo instante e Uber chega super fácil lá. A região é bem movimentada, a avenida que passa ao lado do apê não para dia e noite mas nada que atrapalhe o sono dos justos! Roupas de cama e banho limpíssimas, e um sofá cama mais confortável que já dormi!! Tivemos um probleminha com o ar condicionado no segundo dia, mas foi prontamente resolvido pelo Rafael e sua família, então não tenho nada a reclamar!! La zona es tranquila, y con muchos negocios alrededor. El edificio es tranquilo, y los vecinos muy agradables. Intercomunicado muy bien con gran cantidad de buses. Lo aconsejo !! De volver nuevamente a Rio, seguramente tomaria el mismo alojamiento'}, {'_id': '135290916', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '38850493', 'reviewer_name': 'Ben', 'comments': "We stayed in Rafael's apartment during rio carnival 2017 and had a great stay.

Location - Safe residential area which is right next to a large row of hotels running down to the beach.  Some great food options for breakfast, lunch and dinner nearby.  Also just 7 minutes to the local metro. We felt safe coming and going from here even late at night.  Only thing I would say is that if you can't sleep with traffic noise then this isn't the place for you as it is 6 floors up but on a main busy road in. I'm fine with this living in a city and caused me no bother.

Property - 100% as photographed.  Clean with plenty of space for two people to stay and having. Shower was powerful and hot enough too. A/C is great and keeps the place nice and cool.

Rafael - Great host! Before arriving I asked about having an ironing board and although he didn't have one he ensured one was bought before my arrival. Didn't have to do that at all!

Rafael provides a great list of local bars and restaurants which we visited a number of and they were some of the best we visited during our stay. Bar urca after sugarloaf was a great evening, Cervantes provided a great pork sandwich for lunch and Nova Capela was a great traditional place in Lapa. The lamb is great there!

During our stay we had some questions with regards to the cooker and shower and despite being away on holiday himself, Rafael was always quick to respond.

All in all, if you're looking for a reasonably priced apartment for carnival, or any other visit to Rio for 2, this is a fantastic choice!

Obrigado Rafael!"}, {'_id': '139082841', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2187573', 'reviewer_id': '93440885', 'reviewer_name': 'Elmar', 'comments': 'Rafael hat auf alle Anfragen sofort reagiert und war sehr hilfsbereit. [{'_id': '63156834', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 21, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2213067', 'reviewer_id': '7309898', 'reviewer_name': 'Maria Regina', 'comments': "This is our 2nd time we spend our holidays in Claudia's apartment. Her place is in one word , beautiful. Everything in both occasions was perfect. The apartment is amazing, very cosy, with 3 bed/ 2 bath, a beautiful and modern kitchen and a very large and cosy living room with a breathtaking view of the ocean. 
We went with our 2 little girls, which are 3 and 4 years old. The condo is perfect for kids since it has a wonderful outdoor playground (just outside the building where Claudia has its apartment) and most of all because of its fun and amazing water slides. Our girls love them!!! 
The condo also has: indoor and of course outdoor pools, 2 tennis courts, indoor gym, a bar/restaurant that's very convenient since you can order whatever you want and they bring it upstairs to the apartment. The location also is perfect. The condo it's between Post 6 and Post 7 of Barra. You have beach service, with chairs and umbrella per each apartment. The beach is beautiful, wide  and white sand beach with a perfect blue sea. The neighbourhood is very nice, you have at 1 block a supermarket and also many bars and restaurant a couple of blocks away. I recommend you rent a car to move free from Barra to wherever you want. Also, if you enjoy kitesurfing, just in front of the Condo there's a kite spot that;s perfect to navigate during windy days.
The apartment has everything you need to spend a great vacation time. Claudia is an amazing host. Always very helpful and kind! We cant say more nice words about her place!!!! [{'_id': '575955', 'date': datetime.datetime(2011, 9, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '223200', 'reviewer_id': '1034004', 'reviewer_name': 'Anselmo', 'comments': "Staying at Elias' was absolutely wonderful.
