It's a beatiful modern flat with a large master bedroom (with a view on the Corcovado for the real Rio feeling!), a smaller second bedroom, a bathroom, two toilets, a well equiped kitchen and a living room with balcony. 

The flat is in Flamengo neighbourhoud, which appeared to be a safe upmarket neighbourhoud with more than plenty lively restaurants and bars around. Public transport to Copacabana/Ipanema, Pão de Azúcar, Corcovado, Santa Teresa, Central, Niteroí and the two airports is excellent with bus and metro-stops next door.

Elias, thank you!"}, {'_id': '944509', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 2, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '223200', 'reviewer_id': '1677278', 'reviewer_name': 'Geraldine', 'comments': 'Elias has an amazing apartment really well located (near metro and in front of Flamengo) in a quiet neighbourhood. Elias was very polite and helped us a lot!
I would definitely rent again and tell my friends about this apartment!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Minha família adorou o apartamento!
Lá está camas reais para 6 pessoas, uma sala, uma cozinha agradável e um banheiro. E também é perto de vários lugares agradáveis, tais como bares, mercados e da praia. Ele está localizado em uma área maravilhosa e segura!
É importante dizer que o edifício tem um restaurante com deliciosa comida a um preço barato. Você pode pedir um prato para duas pessoas (um monte de comida), por + / - 16 reais (8 dólares).
Elias foi muito educado e nos ajudou muito!
Eu iria alugar de novo e dizer aos meus amigos sobre este apartamento!"}, {'_id': '996932', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 3, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '223200', 'reviewer_id': '802185', 'reviewer_name': 'Luiz', 'comments': 'Ótima estadia, tudo foi perfeito. The Flamengo area is a "real" local area, not a touristy one, and there are lots of supermarkets (really, lots and lots!) cafés, restaurants etc closeby. The beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema are only a close metro ride away (metro is safe and clean and just 2,5 blocks away). Centro is only 4 km away - it's walkable (if it's not too hot). 

The flat itself is narrow with lots of stairs - i.e. not recommended for persons with mobility issues. There are two bedrooms and a sofa bed in the living room, and they provide plenty of sheets and towels. It had everything we needed in terms of equipment. There are ACs in both bedrooms and a fan in the living room. And you can see the Christ statue from the balcony!

Il est abrité des bruits de l’Avenida das Americas.
Il se situe à 500 m du Recreio Shopping où l’on trouve tout le nécessaire.
De là, on dispose des transports en commun et le centre de Rio est à environ 1h30. 
Les magnifiques plages de Recreio sont à peine à 1 km.

L’appartement est très bien équipé et s’il vous manque quelque chose, Anna Gabrielle ou Paulo vous fourniront le nécessaire, dans la journée.
L’accueil est excellent et l’exactitude dans la prise des rendez-vous (arrivée, départ) exceptionnelle.

Ce séjour (7 semaines) a été formidable grâce à tous ces détails.
Je recommande fortement cette location.
Didier

Lejligheden indeholder alt hvad man skal bruge og fremstår, pæn og ren og velholdt. Har kun positivt at sige om lejligheden og Cynthia kan kun få vores varmeste anbefaling. Perfekt til en familie på 4 som vores.'}, {'_id': '26856555', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 21, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '6897172', 'reviewer_name': 'Vlad', 'comments': 'Квартира хорошая, даже очень, лучше чем на фото! Район спокойный , не было ни одного случая, чтобы кто-то пристал или грабил. Если хотите посмотреть самобытность Бразильцев, вам надо сюда, единственный минус добраться до пляжа, на такси у нас выходило 30-35 реалов до ипонемы...очень хорошая семья, нас встречала мама и кажется брат... В период карнавала, это была самая адекватная цена, мои друзья сняли квартиру в пять раз дороже!!! И ни чем не лучше. '}, {'_id': '29486605', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 4, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '5655896', 'reviewer_name': 'Leona', 'comments': "The apartment was great clean and spacious just as it appears in the pictures. 
Cynthia was great at responding to emails and whilst sadly we didn't get to meet as she was away when we arrived (a friend showed us around, gave us the key and a free bowl of fruit). 
Santa Teresa is a great area but if you want to be near the beach, it's not ideal and takes about an hour to get to Ipanema. The apartment is near a bus stop and a road where you can catch a taxi. 
There is a supermarket around the corner and its 10 minutes from all the really nice local bars and restaurants where you can easily spend a whole day chilling out in Santa Teresa. "}, {'_id': '34113904', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '14846199', 'reviewer_name': 'Anne', 'comments': "Accueil très agréable de Cynthia, appartement confortable pour 2 adultes et deux enfants, plus limité pour quatre adultes d'âge mûr.  Nous avons apprécié la fraîcheur  (précieuse quand il fait 30 en fin d'automne), l'exposition sur 2 côtés, la literie du lit double, le quartier de Santa Teresa, l'occasion de marcher tous les jours et surtout Rio, la magnifiquement contrastée. 
Il a fallu que nous insistions pour avoir un deuxième jeu de clef que nous avons obtenu au bout de 6 jours. Nous avons signalé que la machine à laver ne fonctionnait pas et, après nous avoir dit qu'ils la remplaceraient rapidement et nous avoir donné une date, rien n'a été fait jusqu'à notre départ. Nous sommes débrouillés en lavant à la main.
Cela n'a pas affecté notre séjour à Rio. Par ailleurs, la chasse d'eau a été réparée rapidement, alors que nous n'avions pas signalé qu'elle ne fonctionnait pas.
En résumé, un appartement agréable, des hôtes sympathiques, mais qui ne tiennent pas toujours leurs engagements, une ville magnifique."}, {'_id': '60499877', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 24, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '24073966', 'reviewer_name': 'Alain', 'comments': "Appartement très charmant et calme dans le plus sympa quartier de Rio, nous nous y sommes sentis tres bien tout de suite . Transports en commun en abondance et station de taxi à côté . À proximité, le Largo Guimarães, avec ses bars, restaurants, dont le Café do Alto, qui est devenu très vite notre cantine ! Ainsi que des boutiques  pour des cadeaux très sympas pour tous les budgets. C'était parfait!"}, {'_id': '62090183', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '10887256', 'reviewer_name': 'Thano', 'comments': "We were lucky enough to stay in Cynthia's apartment during the carnival, and everything was great. The master bedroom had air-conditioning and the WIFI was OK(seems like highspeed internet is quite rare in Brazil). Had some trouble finding a taxi to take us to the neighborhood during nighttime, but Uber saved us. All in all we had a great stay. "}, {'_id': '63634650', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 25, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '13379622', 'reviewer_name': 'Leandro', 'comments': 'Cynthia procuro en todo momento que nos sintiésemos muy comodos, la descripción del anuncio fue tal cual es el apartamento, el barrio de Santa Teresa es a mi entender el barrio mas lindo de todo Rio.'}, {'_id': '65032306', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2274454', 'reviewer_id': '57014545', 'reviewer_name': 'Maxime', 'comments': 'Un excellent sejour chezz Cynthia! Nous avons ete tres bien accueillis, l´appartement etait grand et agreable. La coupelle de fruits apres l´avion faisait plaisir. La climatisation dans la chambre est un plus. Pas de bruits le soir, nous avons bien dormi. Il y a un purificateur d´eau qui permet de remplir les bouteilles. Le quartier de Santa Teresa est sympa, on peut sortir a pied manger dehors ou prendre le tram vers le centre ville. Tard le soir il fallait bien indiquer l´adresse sur une carte aux taxis, mais pas de soucis ils nous deposaient devant la porte. Nous avons creer un probleme en rompant la vitre de la machine a laver mais Cynthia a parfaitement geree la situation et nous nous sommes arranges a l´amiable. En resume un excellent sejour, je recommande!

VVery nice week at Cynthia´s place! [{'_id': '95455859', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2283492', 'reviewer_id': '70129467', 'reviewer_name': 'Iain', 'comments': 'Rio was great, the people are friendly and eager to help, even though I speak very limited Portuguese, 

Marcelo is a good host, he arranged for me, to be met at the airport by his niece Gabriella and her brother Paulo.

Marcelo also helped me to get acquainted to Rio, he took me around the local area and showed me how to use the BRT and Metro, he even showed me how to get to Samba City on his free day, as I needed to collect my uniform for the Olympics.

Marcelo’s home is nice its on the second floor of a apartment block, my room had a celling fan, a TV on the wall, I had my own shower and toilet, I had use of the fridge, washer and cooker, although its so easy to eat out as the prices are very good, the area is very quiet, there are shops local to the apartment, the supermarket is a 3 minute walk away, the locals in the area are very friendly I got to know a few of them and although they had limited English we were able to chat via (Hidden by Airbnb) translate, they all wanted to know about me and if I needed any help while I was in Brazil, (in the media in the UK prior to my travels, were warning us about the Zika virus and street robberies) well I felt very safe in my adopted city.

From Marcelo’s home, it’s about a 5 minute walk to either the BRT station or the Metro station, where you can get to anywhere in Rio. Travelling around Rio, is so easy, I used the BRT, which operates 24 hours a day, I used the BRT from 05:30 in the morning, you can either buy a ticket at the station or get a weekly pass, it costs R$3.80 per journey, the buses are frequent every few minutes and so easy to use, the Metro system is good and there is a train every 5 minutes as well although it does gets packed at times.


In conclusion, I would definitely return to Rio in the future, next time I will take my wife, and do the tourist think and see more sights that I was unfortunately missed out on, no fault of anyone just on my day off there was cloud cover so I couldn’t get to see Christ the redeemer or sugarloaf mountain. And I would defiantly use Marcelo’s home again if its available, as I said he’s a good host and has a lovely family, it felt like I was in my own home.

'}, {'_id': '234607910', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2283492', 'reviewer_id': '154826552', 'reviewer_name': 'Joyce', 'comments': 'Apartamento bem localizado em bairro seguro e prédio silencioso. Marcelo é bem compreensível com horário de check-in, simpático, com a família agradável sempre nos recebendo bem e disposto a nos ajudar. O quarto com banheiro privado, limpo e confortável. Recomendo e voltaria.'}]

A cozinha é bem equipado e adequada. 
Como sugestão fica a dica para trocar o móvel da TV, seria melhor pendurá-la na parede, para evitar acidentes com crianças. A gente foi em uma época de inverno, por isso não nos fez falta, mas para o verão, a instalação de um terceiro ar condicionado, no quarto que não tem seria ideal. 

Pontos mais positivos: hospitalidade, incluindo o anfitrião e o porteiro do prédio; limpeza; mobiliário; roupas de cama e banho (seria interessante disponibilizar lençóis e toalhas extras).

The street is a little busy and can be a little noisey for light sleepers. I didn't have trouble going to sleep. Wifi was a little slow. The only major issue I had was the disclosure of the cleaning fee upfront. Being my first AirBNB I'm not sure if those prices were excessive that he quoted us on arrival. I would have shopped around a bit if I knew a one night stay would require a $80 usd cleaning fee. You live and learn. Would I stay again? Probably so if all fees were upfront and transparent before arriving from a 15 hour flight."}, {'_id': '99752343', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2296225', 'reviewer_id': '92686137', 'reviewer_name': 'Larissa', 'comments': 'Sempre fui apaixonada pelo Rio e dessa vez a localização e as acomodações me deixaram mais convencida de sempre voltar.
O bairro do Leme é mais tranquilo, mas com todas as coisas que precisamos, lojas para compras, banco, padaria, mercado, lanchonetes. Além de ficar bem localizado para demais baladas conhecidas que a cidade possui (Ficando sempre com preço bom as corridas de táxi), e próximo a um dos pontos turístico mais cobiçado (Pão de açúcar) onde a corrida para lá não passa de uns 15,00. Por falar em táxi esse nunca foi um problema do Rio, mas o local esta sempre com fluxo, sendo possível tranquilamente pegar um táxi na frente do apartamento. 
A praia fica duas quadras, sendo um lugar bem seguro e tranquilo para circular, da frente do apartamento já é possível ver o mar.
Quanto ao apartamento, muito espaçoso, arejado, ambientes confortáveis, excelente sinal de wi-fi, cozinha equipada com todos os itens necessário para alimentação, banheiro organizado e com ótima ducha de banho. 
Os anfitriões Rodrigo e sua esposa nos atenderam muito bem, foram muito gentis e prestativos, além de ter nos esclarecidos todos os pontos de forma muito correta sobre a locação do imóvel.
Enfim! adoramos o espaço e no regresso já temos um local para ficarmos.'}, {'_id': '101422750', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2296225', 'reviewer_id': '16150687', 'reviewer_name': 'Thais', 'comments': 'O apartamento é ótimo, super confortável e exatamente como mostram as fotos. Além disso, o Rodrigo é atencioso e sempre disponível para ajudar a resolver o que for necessário.
Foi uma experiencia deliciosa!'}, {'_id': '102898219', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2296225', 'reviewer_id': '91522696', 'reviewer_name': 'Jacqueline', 'comments': 'O apê do Rodrigo é super bem localizado, pertinho da praia e com bons restaurantes no entorno. É seguro também pois a rua é bem movimentada. As janelas acústicas não deixam o barulho externo atrapalhar o sono, e isso foi muito bom! Chuveiro maravilhoso, quartos amplos, cozinha adequada... Enfim, uma ótima estadia para quem quer curtir o Rio de Janeiro!'}, {'_id': '107300997', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 10, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2296225', 'reviewer_id': '32543870', 'reviewer_name': 'Lady', 'comments': "I visited this apartment with my husband, my mother and two young kids. 
PROS: It is located 2 blocks from Copacabana beach in a safe place and good restaurants.  We liked the pizza place in front of the beach. 
There is a supermarket very close if you want to cook.  Apartment is clean, big, comfortable and safe. 
Rodrigo is a nice host and cares for you to have a good stay.
Jesus, the doorman is very very nice.
The elevator is old but it's all an experience to know this kind of elevator.
You can easily use the elevator or stairs because it is in a second floor.
Also can take an Uber to move easily.
CONS: when I found this option it was not specified in the airbnb page I had to pay extra fee for electricity and cleaning. When we were leaving the apartment, Rodrigo said we had to pay extra 240 reales (~$80) cash for 2 nights stay.  At that moment I reviewed Airbnb again and found the 230 reales specified in the reservation 'house manual'.  It is not in additional prices or rules, etc.  
House manual is not showed when you are comparing your options or before requesting reservation, only when you have already reserved. This is unfair to customers and other similar airbnb places and I'm very disappointed.  
Another Con is that the closest part of the beach is closed because they are removing the olympic stadium of volleyball, so you have to walk additional distance. 
I would recomend to have pretty small quantities of cooking materials, just like salt, sugar, oil, ... so you don't need to buy a big quantity for a short stay.
Would I recommend this place? Only is they include the electricity and cleaning fee in the apartment daily fee or clearly specify it.
"}, {'_id': '108810509', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 10, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2296225', 'reviewer_id': '9105348', 'reviewer_name': 'Fernando', 'comments': 'A experiência foi extremamente agradável. O apartamento é enorme, super completo. Não perde em nada para as fotos aqui divulgadas.

Internet wifi en todo el departamento sin problemas, todo funcionó correctamente. 

Excellent apartment as seen in the photos, Rodrigo is a very good host, the area is safe, very well located, whether for eating, to rent a vehicle, pharmacies, markets, taxis, what is needed for a family holiday or friends. 
The apartment has everything necessary for an excellent stay, has a direct access by elevator, plus another access by the back of the apartment which leads to the laundry room and bathroom, excellent access for when you return from the beach. Wireless internet throughout the apartment with no problems, everything worked properly.

Excelente apartamento como visto nas fotos, Rodrigo é muito bom anfitrião, a área é segura, bem localizado, seja para comer, para alugar um veículo, farmácias, mercados, táxis, o que é necessário para uma família de férias ou os amigos. O apartamento tem tudo que você precisa para uma excelente estadia, tem acesso por elevador directo privado, além de outro acesso da parte de trás do departamento que dá a sala de serviço e banheiro, excelente acesso quando voltar da praia. acesso à Internet em todo o departamento, sem problemas, tudo funcionou corretamente.

Excellent appartement comme on le voit sur les photos, Rodrigo est très bon hôte, la zone est sûre, bien situé, que ce soit pour manger, louer un véhicule, les pharmacies, les marchés, les taxis, ce qui est nécessaire pour des vacances en famille ou amis. L'appartement a tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour un excellent séjour, a accès par ascenseur privé direct, plus un autre accès à l'arrière du département qui donne la buanderie et salle de bains, un excellent accès lors du retour de la plage. L'accès à Internet dans tout le département sans problèmes, tout fonctionnait correctement."}, {'_id': '133058640', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 2, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2296225', 'reviewer_id': '53453799', 'reviewer_name': 'Paulo', 'comments': 'Tudo certo, nada a reclamar. OJO el consumo de luz se paga por separado.

[{'_id': '58504962', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '31211498', 'reviewer_name': 'Mayara', 'comments': 'Adorei minha estadia no apto da Sônia.  Ela é uma ótima anfitriã. Quando chegamos ela foi direto nos receber. O apto é ótimo, bem espaçoso. Tem 2 quartos (um com cama de casal e outro com 2 beliches). O banheiro é grande, e o chuveiro é um dos melhores que já tomei banho. A localização é perfeita, 1 quadra da praia e perto de tudo (mercado, farmácia, lojas, restaurantes), fizemos tudo a pé! Voltaria sem dúvidas alguma!'}, {'_id': '61993452', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '15507508', 'reviewer_name': 'Kyle', 'comments': 'We were a group of 4 guys (3 Americans and 1 European) and we enjoyed our stay at Sonia's apartment. The location is fantastic, one block away from the heart of Copacabana beach on a relatively quiet street. There are plenty of restaurants, cafes, and shops around. The apartment unit itself was nice, and there are plenty of places to sleep. It was also nice to have a second bathroom with a shower and toilet in the back of the apartment.

The apartment complex rules are pretty strict and we found some of the rules regarding trash and using the "servico" elevator versus the social elevator a bit strange. I would also note that guests are not allowed in the apartment (perhaps for safety reasons?), which was not really an issue for us, but may be for some people.

Overall, we had a positive experience, and enjoyed our stay! Thanks Sonia!'}, {'_id': '96646738', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '27577882', 'reviewer_name': 'Guilherme Loos', 'comments': 'Estadia maravilhosa no apartamento da Sra. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, recomendo a todos.'}, {'_id': '197728032', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '11378706', 'reviewer_name': 'Andreas', 'comments': 'This was so much better than we expected! The best location, near everything we needed, groceries stores, banks, restaurants, just half block from the beach on the best location of Copacabana beach, in a really safe place. Great apartment, recently reformed, with great rooms, beds and a really unforgetable shower ready for our stay. But the best were the hosts, Sônia and João, two great people that welcomed us with open arms and beers, gave us the best tips of bars and everything we needed. I really recomend it to everybody who wants a nice and safe trip to Rio, and hope to be back there soon. Everything was great!'}, {'_id': '199757265', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 10, 3, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '28294035', 'reviewer_name': 'Andrew', 'comments': 'The host canceled this reservation 89 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.'}, {'_id': '234874884', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '40288695', 'reviewer_name': 'Leandro', 'comments': 'Sonia, uma excelente anfitriã . Atenciosa e muito simpática .  localização sensacional, perto de tudo.'}, {'_id': '367689556', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2298271', 'reviewer_id': '2633826', 'reviewer_name': 'Rosa', 'comments': 'Pontos positivos:
O apartamento tem áreas excelentes e a cozinha e a casa de banho foram remodeladas recentemente e estão excelentes. 
Existe uma segunda casa de banho nos fundos que é muito útil e o chuveiro tem uma ótima pressão. 
O edifício tem segurança 24h por dia e está muito bem localizado, rodeado de bons restaurantes, muito próximo do metro e a alguns passos da praia.
A comunicação com os proprietários é ótima e estão sempre disponíveis para dar dicas e ajudar no que for preciso.
Pontos a melhorar:
As mobílias são muito velhas e os armários dos quartos estão desarrumados e cheios de roupas de cama desnecessárias que cheiram a mofo. 
Também o armário da casa de banho está repleto de toalhas já muito gastas e os lençóis das camas deveriam ser renovados. 
Não há um roupeiro completamente livre para os hóspedes e os cabides de roupa têm pó entranhado. 
Apesar do apartamento ter capacidade para 4 pessoas, existe apenas uma pequena mesa em ferro na cozinha com 3 cadeiras também em ferro e na sala o sofá é muito velho e desconfortável, sendo que o móvel da televisão está cheio de velharias.
Já na cozinha existem "coisas" a mais, como um forno decadente e umas panelas enormes, sendo que dentro dos armários, todos os utensílios precisam de uma boa lavagem.
Em resumo:
No geral, o apartamento é ótimo mas precisa de uma remodelação nos móveis e na decoração, de uma limpeza e arrumação profundas.'}]

[{'_id': '244425937', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 3, 18, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '23572358', 'reviewer_id': '176543728', 'reviewer_name': 'Tálison', 'comments': 'O apartamento não é tão bom quanto parece, o prédio onde fica localizado é péssimo, não recomendo para famílias, pois o ambiente é de prostituição.
Fica em cima de uma casa noturna de stripper, Café Sensoo Bar.

Apesar de ficar perto da praia, o ambiente não é legal, muitas prostitutas ao redor, os restaurantes que ficam perto são pontos de encontro.

No elevador e corredores, só encontramos pessoas esquisitas, ambiente não familiar.

Nas proximidades muitos moradores de rua...'}]

She picked me up from the airport, explained all ways to go and helped me buying things I didn't know where to find them.
The room I had was big, lots of space, nice furniture and a big bed. 
The wifi was nice and fast too. 
The apartment is located in the centro area, 5 min walk from the Airport Santos-Dumont. 3min walk to so many buses and the metro station. Not even 10 min walk and you are in Lapa. It's a very good and safe location. Busy at day, quiet at night. Restaurants are close.

O quarto é espaçoso, bem iluminado e a cama (cama box) é confortável. Achei ótimo ter uma mesa no quarto, pois pude trabalhar confortavelmente enquanto estava lá. A internet e o ar condicionado funcionaram muito bem!

'}, {'_id': '49536015', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 4, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2422745', 'reviewer_id': '35276010', 'reviewer_name': 'Cleverson', 'comments': 'Bom, só posso dizer que em nenhum momento me senti como um hóspede na casa da Mônica! Passei apenas 2 dias, e a vontade era de ter ficado muito mais... Porque a Mônica, além de ser muito simpática, sempre fez questão que me sentisse a vontade... explicando e dando dicas sobre locais, hábitos e dicas de segurança.
Então, quando for ao RJ, não tenho outro endereço!
A localização é show de bola, no centro da cidade, ao lado da Cinelândia, em frente a embaixada dos EUA, a menos de 10 min do Santos Dumont... fantástico! 
Eu fui participar de um curso/evento ali pertinho a cerca de 5 min na Av. Rio Branco e tranquilamente podia sair em cima da hora!!!
O local só me fez sentir em casa, a cama deliciosa, o chuveiro reconfortante, o ar condicionado e o ventiladores no quarto (apesar de eu não ter usado) com certeza ainda o deixam mais confortáveis.

[{'_id': '13201759', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 5, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '4189751', 'reviewer_name': 'Rob', 'comments': 'What a place! They’ve done a great job remodeling a classic old building 
overlooking the city (with great view of Sugarloaf Mountain). Spotless, 
secure, modern, and comfortable, with a tasteful, minimalist design that 
is hard to find in this city. It’s in front of a very special – and 
well-stocked! – old neighborhood bar where local legends, artists, and 
musicians hang out every day.

The location on the edge of Santa Teresa is magical: it’s on top of the 
hill, but there are busses ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) and motorcycle taxis (near 
the Gloria metro station) that make getting there easy. The famous tiled 
steps and Flamengo park are close by, and within just a few minutes you 
have the madness of Lapa or the convenience of the metro, but the 
location is amazingly peaceful. Cannot wait to get back here someday!'}, {'_id': '20655984', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 10, 3, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '351630', 'reviewer_name': 'Richard', 'comments': "Marcela did everything to make my stay perfect. She helped me with all the things I needed and getting around. The apartment was perfect for me. A good kitchen, bed and a little balcony. I like it that it is away from the touristy locations. It is a more real Rio experience this way. The apartment is located on a hill. It is about 15 minutes walking to the subway and there is also a beach at about 30 minutes walking. There's also a bus that stops close by. I can recommend this place."}, {'_id': '22699582', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 12, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '21692830', 'reviewer_name': 'Adrian', 'comments': 'I had an amazing experience by staying here. The flat was newly modernized, looking like a hotel room, in a building with about ten flats available for rent. The view was towards the sea and the Sugar Loaf mountain, so very beautiful. The internet is good, with a unique router for each apartment. The TV has about one hundred channels available, most in dubbed in Portuguese. The room comes furbished with a drawer in the wall, with a fridge, freezer, cooker, washing machine. Soap and shampoo is provided for the first day, and detergent enough for a month to wash cloths. 

The hosts were very warm in welcoming me, providing advice about visiting Rio and a complex Rio tourist map (you can have this map from the airport as well, as well as other materials about tourism in Rio). One day when I lost the key, they waited me late at 11.30 when I arrived with a new set of keys. 

The neighborhood of Santa Teresa is safe and well lit. But you should know the flat is on the top of the hill, and you need about 15 minute climb from the Gloria metro station or 10 minutes from Lapa and the famous stairs Selaron. However, there are also taxis by motorcycle for 3 reals from Metro Gloria, as well as buses that can take you to the Central Station for also 3 reals. Being at the top of the hill gives an amazing view over the city, especially the Sugar Loaf mountain. In front of the flat there is a small shop from where you can by water, beer, fruits and even pizza to go.  The Lapa neighborhood has many nice bars. And right on the hill there is the Museum of the Ruins, where on old house has been offered to the tourists to see the city from its top floors, given an even better view. 

Also the price was very good for the quality.

Overall, a great experience. I recommend it.'}, {'_id': '30982052', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 4, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '11181450', 'reviewer_name': 'Meryem', 'comments': "Nous avons passé un super séjour dans l'appartement de Marcela et Frédérico! Le quartier est un quartier bohème juste au dessus du fameux quartier dansant de Lapa et à 5 min en descente des escaliers colorés de selaron. Une petite épicerie se trouve juste en bas de l'appartement, parfaite pour les produits de première nécessité, ils font d'ailleurs de très bonnes pizzas et sont très aimable.
Frédérico est très disponible et répond rapidement lorsqu'on le sollicite. Les photos de l'appartement sont très fidèles.
Rio est une magnifique destination nous y avons séjourné 1 mois sans regret.
"}, {'_id': '35492234', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '3298287', 'reviewer_name': 'Paul', 'comments': "The apartment is just great, loved it!
Very nice new and clean.
When you had a place in Copacabana before you will just love the quietness in Santa Teresa.
There is a bar/mini-supermarket at the other side of the street which is handy. It is not far from Metro station Gloria, a bit hike up the mountain but no problem when you are healthy.
I got a local prepay phone card which is handy for foreigners as you cannot buy this yourself (need to register with a social security number). My luggage was delayed and Marcela and Frederico had it delivered at their place and brought it to the apartment. All in all great service. I didn't need much more help but am sure that you can ask them for tips to visit Rio too. Thanks for the nice stay!"}, {'_id': '61363566', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '884024', 'reviewer_name': 'Michael', 'comments': 'There’s not enough accolades I can offer to express how happy I was to stay at this wonderful place! It truly is an Amazing Flat In Santa Teresa! Frederico & Marcela were absolutely charming and made sure my stay was very close to perfect. The views from several units are spectacular with unobstructed views of Pão De Açucar-Sugar Loaf Mountain and the neighborhood of Santa Teresa is very appealing. Walking down the hill or taxi, bus or van to Lapa, Centro or Gloria metro station is only literally minutes away. I was very fortunate to find this "Amazing Flat In Santa Teresa" and I highly recommend.'}, {'_id': '62141434', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 12, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '9708821', 'reviewer_name': 'Carlos', 'comments': "Frederico and Marcela are amazingly nice people! I really enjoyed myself in Rio and I will return!! It's a short stroll from the top of the famous Celeron steps and the Bar do Serginho where they also tend to have street parties on weekends. 
They have several individual flats very tastefully and thoughtfully renovated with various of electrical sockets, essential in Brazil. And we had the best internet in Brazil! The TV was very conveniently located. 
The compact kitchen seemed to have the essentials and anything else was quickly provided - we did not get into any cooking.

This was a unique Air BnB experience in that they are very professional in how everything is set up with full-time staff to help you with tourism throughout the city.

Santa Teresa is a really beautiful neighborhood that I felt I was in a unique and authentic neighborhood. You are on top of a hill which sets you up for amazing views but plan to walk down hill to get to the subway and uber uphill to get to the front door.

If you get a chance, take a city tour with Bike in Rio on the first day you are there to a get a better idea of how Rio is laid out and it will give you a better idea what is accessible from Santa Teresa and how to better arrive to the surrounding neighborhoods.

The apartment is exactly like the pictures.  There are other apartments in the building that dont' have windows facing the street that you can pay a bit more for but all in all we enjoyed our apartment.  What you see in the pictures is what you get."}, {'_id': '192902301', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 9, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '16381262', 'reviewer_name': 'Charles', 'comments': "Appartement conforme aux photos. Actually, it’s probably the most organized Airbnb that I’ve ever stayed at. Check-in and communication between the hosts was also excellent. Having said this, I don’t feel like the area is very safe. I have lived in Brazil for 5 years and am generally able to distinguish “safe” areas from “unsafe” areas and I do have to say that the area the loft is in, isn’t the safest. For you to have an idea, several Uber’s and Taxi drivers refused to go up the hill to drop me off because of the abundant number of assaults & robberies happening in the area. In addition, there are posters up all over the neighbourhood warning travelers about the real possibility of being robbed. So, getting around by foot especially at night is challenging and finding an Uber is equally as difficult. If you are okay with this, though, I’d recommended Frederico and Marcela’s place. The view is spectacular.'}, {'_id': '255757400', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 4, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '29889075', 'reviewer_name': 'J Ellis', 'comments': 'Stay here if at all possible. Thanks so much !!'}, {'_id': '257020354', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 4, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '95720167', 'reviewer_name': 'Valeria', 'comments': 'O apartamento estava limpíssimo, com cozinha, banheiro, e máquina de lavar (Website hidden by Airbnb) para nós! Não podia ser melhor, um charme!
O “SugarLoft” é muito bem localizado, com lindas vistas, gerenciado pela Amélia, para o casal de donos Frederico e Marcela, que vivem em Barcelona, mas são muito presentes em comunicação por mensagens e emails; todo mundo de enorme gentileza, recomendo! 
O prédio não tem elevador, mas para quem tem uma longa jornada sentados num carro, como no nosso caso, as escadas são especialmente bem vindas.
À princípio estávamos um pouco hesitantes quanto a segurança do bairro, mas ficamos felizes em saber que rua está bem policiada e que não tem havido ocorrências indesejáveis. Nosso carro ficou na rua, sem problema, os 3 dias que ficamos hospedados e foi fácil achar vaga para estacionar bem próximo do prédio. Amélia, que vive na vizinhança, nos disse que anda pelas redondezas sem preocupação e que devíamos apenas evitar a Celaron, uma escadaria para o Centro, durante a noite, sentimos esta segurança. A experiência foi memorável e pretendemos voltar!'}, {'_id': '257839790', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 4, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '130193343', 'reviewer_name': 'Thais', 'comments': 'O apartamento é novo, lindo e muito limpo. Exatamente como na foto. Houve um pequeno desconforto com relação ao valor que paguei e o valor que o apartamento estava anunciado no Airbnb na hora que fiz a reserva mas foi tudo resolvido, nos colocaram num apartamento com uma vista linda e que corria um vento delicioso. Eu tive uma necessidade especial com relação ao horário de check-in que foi prontamente atendida. Recomendo muito os apartamentos de Frederico & Marcela e com certeza voltarei se houver oportunidade. PS: foi um pouco difícil de chamar Uber de lá então, se precisarem de transporte, é melhor pedir com um tempo de antecedência e tentar outros aplicativos de táxi mesmo (foi como eu consegui).'}, {'_id': '261994702', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 5, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2515976', 'reviewer_id': '52936051', 'reviewer_name': 'Vagner', 'comments': 'Super indico! Santa Teresa se trouve à environs 30min de l’aéroport de Rio, 20-25min de Copacabana et Ipanema et à 5min de Lapa, quartier animé (vendredi et samedi) le soir avec des restaurants et des bars très sympas. [{'_id': '332517824', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 10, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '26110157', 'reviewer_id': '3670333', 'reviewer_name': 'Martin', 'comments': 'What a great apartment.  Location is excellent (right in a the heart of Copacabana and very close to the beach). Lots of supermarkets nearby if you like to cook. 

The apartment looks like the photos.   It’s quite big, especially the bedroom. There is a small foyer near the door where an extra person can sleep on the sofa (with doors that close for privacy).

The kitchen is basic with some plates and cutlery. There is also a small fridge and microwave. 

The bedroom is really big and spacious.  It has a huge window that opens up to let in a nice breeze.  There is also an AC unit that cools down the place wonderfully. 

Strong WiFi (it never cut out). The building also has a doorman for extra security. 

This apartment is professionally run so you collect the keys from their Ipanema office (about a $3 Uber ride away). 

Excellent value for money and a great location.'}, {'_id': '401903829', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 16, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '26110157', 'reviewer_id': '233199103', 'reviewer_name': 'Fernanda', 'comments': 'Deben leer y coordinar bien la entrada, ya que el anfitrión nunca estuvo presente . Ni respondió los mensajes. Llegue con mi familia y esperamos más de 30 min para recién saber que debíamos ir a una agencia a retirar las llaves. Nadie conoce Mario en el edificio. Falta preocupación por la ventilación , ya que con el calor y humedad al comienzo no olía muy bien el apartamento . Eso para mejorar. El departamento es tal cual se ve en La foto. Tiene excelente ubicación  y es cómodo , los artefactos funcionan bien y no tuve problemas con el internet.'}]

A Paula foi muito atenciosa desde o momento da reserva.
Não precisamos solicitá-la para nada durante a estadia, porque o apartamento realmente tinha tudo o que precisávamos e estava tudo conforme combinado.
Como descrito no anúncio, o apartamento é pequeno e acomoda bem 4 pessoas. Eu acredito que até 5 ficariam sem nenhum problema, se o intuito for passar mais tempo passeando.
É muito próximo da Praia de Copacabana, um quarteirão, o que facilita tudo, transporte, alimentação e etc.
O apartamento está muito novo, com tudo funcionando perfeitamente, ar condicionado, ventiladores, chuveiro, TV, microondas, luzes, secador de cabelo.
A Paula disponibiliza roupas de cama e banho, travesseiros, talheres, copos, tudo em excelente qualidade.
A única coisa que não gostei muito foi do sofá-cama. Mas estava dentro do padrão, é um pouco duro, levaria um colchonete pra colocar por cima. Colocamos o edredom e deu pra dormir tranquilamente.
Super silencioso, dormimos bem.
Quanto a segurança, nos sentimos muito seguros, apesar de estarmos no fim de semana do Rock in Rio e terem ocorridos vários arrastões. Nós tivemos sorte e não vimos nada.
Enfim, super recomendado! [{'_id': '11570548', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 4, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '9815497', 'reviewer_name': 'Clovis', 'comments': 'This place is really nice! I needed a relaxing weekend and that`s really what I got.

A fridge with some water and beers. Rodrigo said I could use anything that's in the apartment! (OK, I replenished the water, but it was great to have it there to begin with). 

He even left his longboard and said I could use it whenever I want for rides along the beaches (which are a very short walk by the way). 

Other cool things:
- TV has cable as well as an Apple TV box with a Netflix. House of cards season 3 was just released when I was here and was able to see it all in a weekend binge. 
- A portable speaker to play music
- etc etc

It just seems like Rodrigo is the rare AirBnb host that not only wants to make money off of his property but actually cares for people to have a good time. I had a great experience here and love this place. In fact, I'm writing this review from within the apartment - I extended my booking by another week (and then have to leave).

I would recommend this apartment to any of my friends who might visit Rio! Rodrigo helped us feel right at home. :)'}, {'_id': '39743033', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '5923686', 'reviewer_name': 'May', 'comments': "I absolutely loved staying here! It was home for about 8 days to my mom and myself and we both were very comfortable and happy here. Rodrigo is an amazing host. He is always attentive to your needs and has in place so many amenities that you will not find elsewhere. From the decor to the snacks he leaves to welcome guests, Rodrigo really works hard to provide the most welcoming and cozy experience for his guests. The bed is very comfortable and easily sleeps two. If you feel like watching TV while you rest, Rodrigo also has tons of options for you to watch what you want (cable, AppleTV, Chromecast - all of which we used at one point or another lol). We were there in July, so it was even cool enough not to need the A/C. We kept the window open and the fan on at night and during the day and we still felt very cool. The location of the studio is also ideal. We walked every day less than 10 minutes each way to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches and the walks were always very pleasant. Getting transportation around town was also a breeze! There are so many taxis and buses that pass by even just across the street and the metro station is very close-by as well. On top of that there are tons of little shops, restaurants and farmers' markets, all again within walking distance. I HIGHLY recommend this place if you want to be in a nice, quiet neighborhood, close to the beach. I already know I will be back here the next time I go to Rio :)  "}, {'_id': '42295051', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '3509669', 'reviewer_name': 'Fally', 'comments': "Seriously this appartment is perfect. The host is perfect as well. Rodrigo made us feel at home in his cozy flat. He send us PLENTY of informations regardings nearby tours and functionning of the appartment. The check in was smooth. Rodrigo has accomodated us when my flight was cancelled and offered to stay and extra night for us not to loose our money. The appartment itself was very located. Two steps aways from the metro and with a bunch of buses passing right in front. The neighborhood is very safe and 2 steps away from the beach. The flat was super clean and had everything you needed inside. Upon our arrival the fridge was full of snack, drinks and water bottles, which is a major perk after a 20 hours trip from Canada! :) I've travelled a lot with airbnb and this experience is without a doubt one of the best. Don't hesitate! BOOK NOW! Thank you again Roddy for everything! You truly are a SUPERHOST!"}, {'_id': '44304330', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '398465', 'reviewer_name': 'Eckhard', 'comments': 'Das Quartier zwischen Ipanema und Copacabana ist ideal gelegen und bietet alle Möglichkeiten, Rio zu erkunden. Rodrigo ist ein aufmerksamer und immer sofort antwortender Gastgeber, der mit persönlichen Gruß und vielen Tipps für alles sorgt. Das Apartment ist mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht. Besser hätten wir es nicht treffen können.
Wir waren eine knappe Woche hier und haben uns von "unserem" Apartment und dieser wunderbaren Stadt nur schwer getrennt. 
Eine Empfehlung für alle Besucher, uneingeschränkt!
Fam. Richter, Berlin, Deutschland

The neighborhood between Ipanema and Copacabana is ideally located and offers all the opportunities to explore Rio. Rodrigo is an attentive and always immediately responding host who makes personal greeting and has many tips for everything. The apartment is equipped with everything you need. Better we could not have it.
We were almost a week here and now it's hard to leave "our" apartment and this wonderful city.
A real recommendation for all visitors!
Fam. Richter, Berlin, Germany'}, {'_id': '49877752', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '5388796', 'reviewer_name': 'Frederic', 'comments': 'Everything was done perfectly, all infos given by Rodrigo were very helpfull. Situated close to both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches we could enjoy quickly the ocean.
We highly recommand this place.
Little remark about very little kitchen, difficult to cook dinners but doable with some imaginations, eh eh.
Thanks to Rodrigo, wonderfull host.
'}, {'_id': '51551078', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '6269996', 'reviewer_name': 'Andrea', 'comments': "Great stay in Rio, the apartment is in a perfect location Copacabana beach and buses to Corcovado and Pao de Acucar. Roddy is a wonderful host providing us everything we could need during our stay.
When I come back to Rio that's the place where I'd like to be."}, {'_id': '52423451', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '23933678', 'reviewer_name': 'Julien', 'comments': "Roddy is an amazing host. The apartment is exactly like described, in a very secured building (1 or 2 doormen always there).

The studio was clean, organized and it seemed like Rod had literally thought of everything that one might need. The kitchen was stocked and ready for the arrival of thirsty travelers, there were M&Ms in a jar to snack on, the bathroom had cute soaps and nice-smelling shampoo. He had written clear instructions on how to use the AC and safe, and we were very happy with the electronic lock on the front door (no need to worry about keys!). He even had longboards and kangas waiting for us in case we wanted to head straight to the beach! The attention to detail in his studio was impressive and everything was done in a way that would make our life easy. He also gave us great tips about local restaurants and bars, many of which we visited. The neighborhood was probably one of the best places to stay in Rio, with bars, restos and two beaches within walking distance. Rodrigo was very responsive the whole time, just a great host altogether! Thanks for having us, we would love to stay with you again when we are in Rio, Rod! You are an exemplary host and and we will recommend your studio to everyone we know :)'}, {'_id': '229775732', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 1, 25, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '147343384', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariano Darío', 'comments': 'Después de haber pasado 14 días en el departamento queremos destacar que el lugar es muy acogedor y nos mejoró aún más unas vacaciones increíblemente hermosas. 
Nos parece importante resaltar varios puntos: *La ubicación es muy buena porque permite un acceso súper directo y seguro hacia las playas de Copacabana, Ipanema y Arpoador. Al estar a algo menos de dos cuadras de la avenida Nuestra Señora de Copacabana es muy silencioso y no se escucha el tránsito de estas grandes avenidas. Por otra parte, el barrio es muy seguro por la noche y hay lugares fantásticos muy cerca para comer casi a cualquier hora. *El edificio es silencioso, los vecinos son muy respetuosos y dentro del departamento no se sienten olores de la cocina de otros habitantes ni que provengan del exterior. *El interior es muy acogedor, está súper equipado, tiene aire acondicionado, ventilador, calentador de toallas, heladera, un anafe eléctrico para cocinar, microondas, cafetera, minipimer, pava eléctrica y una batería de cocina súper completa. La única crítica que se le puede hacer a la cocina es que es un poco chiquita y a veces resulta complejo moverse ahí dentro. *Tiene una cama muy cómoda que está bien ubicada frente a un TV alucinante donde se puede reposar después de un día de playa. *Dispusimos siempre de juegos de sábanas y toallas nuevos y limpios. *El baño tiene mampara, espejos y bidet. *Pudimos salir sin llaves y totalmente tranquilos gracias al sistema de seguridad de la puerta. *Recargamos la tarjeta del metro que nos dejaste y nos desplazamos sin problemas. *Todo funciona correctamente, no tuvimos ningún contratiempo. *Por último, Rodrigo nos respondió con toda amabilidad antes de contratar, luego de la reserva y estuvo disponible también durante nuestra estadía, lo que nos dio mucha tranquilidad.
Desde el primer minuto hasta el último disfrutamos de dos semanas de placer en este departamento impecable y bien decorado, como se ve en las fotos, lo que nos hizo sentir como en casa. Y una vez allá descubrimos que podríamos haber ido solo con malla, ojotas y algo de ropa, porque encontramos todo lo demás: secador de pelo, paraguas, pareos, sombreros, plancha e incluso algunos artículos de perfumería.
Para quienes vayan a Río, les contamos que hay wifi gratis en el aeropuerto Galeao y se pueden pedir un Uber que cuesta unos 45 reales hasta el departamento o bien pueden tomarse el bus 2018 (también llamado Frescao) por 15 reales por persona, en la puerta misma del aeropuerto, que los deja a media cuadra del departamento.
Por todo esto, la próxima vez que vayamos a Río ya tenemos elegido el lugar de nuestra estadía. ¡Esperamos que sea pronto! '}, {'_id': '233399652', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '86321303', 'reviewer_name': 'Damien', 'comments': 'Great host.'}, {'_id': '238910602', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '107063204', 'reviewer_name': 'Giovanni', 'comments': "Staying at Rodrigo's place was amazing !!! First off, it's in between two of the cities most major beaches (Copacabana - 5 min walk) and (Ipanema - 10 min walk). The living space is great. There is nice sized bed with comfy sheets and pillows. A great air conditioner that can have the whole apartment cool in a  few minutes. A smart TV with easy access to Netflix and Youtube. An ironing board and iron are on hand. Also a convenient tea and coffee maker. The refrigerator has a filtered water pitcher you can use. The bathroom is also good with a nice shower that can have hot water in the switch of a button. I am an adventurer and I went to many of the cities museums, surfing, mountain climbing and exploring in general. I suggest uber as the best way to get around. Rodrigo's central location makes this perfect. The most expensive uber I paid for was from the airport. This came up to 45 reals which is equivalent to about $15 dollars (Not bad). The place in itself, its popular surroundings and central location was great, but so was Rodrigo. He was so helpful with the pdf emails he sent out about the apartment and the popular destinations nearby. He also has a handy map in the apartment that shows you these destinations if you want  a more hands on approach. Also, although Rodrigo was at work he always responded to my messages fast, like when I could not find the iron, or spare towels in the apartment. Not to mention my flight arrived at 10 in the morning and Rodrigo let me check in early so I did not have to wait until 3pm. Overall Rodrigo was a great host and I truly enjoyed my stay at his home. I would recommend anyone to Rodrigo's place if they want to have a great stay in Rio."}, {'_id': '243618543', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 3, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '167633617', 'reviewer_name': 'Santiago', 'comments': 'Nos hospedamos 9 días y nuestra estadía fue realmente inmejorable. La ubicación es perfecta para aquellos que no se deciden entre copacabana e ipanema ya que ambas playas están cerca (recomiendo ipanema). Rodrigo fue muy amable y atento en todo momento y nos brindó información local muy util. Fue un placer. Lo super recomendamos!'}, {'_id': '247751984', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 3, 29, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '151902032', 'reviewer_name': 'Carito', 'comments': 'Quiero contarles que el studio de Roddy es GENIAL, cada rincón  y cada detalle  del mismo  hacen una estadia maravillosa. You can’t beat Rodrigo’s place for location, ambiance, and convenience. He’s a very friendly, completely reliable guy. The apartment is very safe with a doorman, combination door lock (no keys to keep up with) and a safe. It’s also got everything you need as far as cooking is concerned. More things I like about the place; high ceilings, great urban view, Netflix, close grocery store.'}, {'_id': '275107040', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 6, 10, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2683147', 'reviewer_id': '6950586', 'reviewer_name': 'Jenn', 'comments': 'Great location—close to the beach, and the breakfast at the grocery store nearby was easy and affordable. [{'_id': '14991130', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2851471', 'reviewer_id': '12534138', 'reviewer_name': 'Elias', 'comments': "Nous étions 5 hommes chez Deborah, pour la coupe du monde 2014. L'appartement était très joli, propre, plus spacieux encore que sur les photos et très fonctionnel (magnifique tv, climatisation, cuisine, lave linge...). Nous avons été accueillis à l'heure, et Daniela était à notre disposition en cas de question.
L'appartement est bien placé, à quelques centaines de mètres de la mer, de bars très sympas (jobi, stuzzi,...), supermarchés, banques, ou restaurants parmi les plus côtés de la ville. Le quartier est très sécurisé.
Attention aux toilettes, qui, comme partout au Brésil, se bouchent facilement.

 We received the house in excellent conditions through Deborah's sister Rosana, and the whole process was really smooth. 
Deborah is a great host, she was from day one worried about every detail, replying super fast to our inquiries and providing great information about places to go/eat. Deborah, muito obrigada for everything! We felt like home at your place.  I recommend this place 100% and would definitely stay here again. "}, {'_id': '51983747', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2851471', 'reviewer_id': '4280526', 'reviewer_name': 'Dilan', 'comments': "If you're looking for a place away from the action of Ipanema and far away from the gritty tourist beach of Copacabana, this Leblon location will fit the bill.
 
Overall this is a very lovely apartment in the quiet and chic Leblon neighborhood, adjacent to Ipanema. However the location is aprox 20mins walk from the beach and the apartment is located up a very steep hill. Personally I am fond of hiking so this was fine for me. You can cab it up the hill but you'll have to hail a cab for a quick pickup which can be tough during rush hour. There is also a garage should you want to rent a car while you are there however several Carioca's suggested against due to crazy traffic and regular DUI stops. 

Deborah is very responsive to texts. Deborah manages the listing remotely and has Rosana directly manage the apartment. Rosanna was wonderful and always immediately responds to texts. The apartment truly felt like home and was well maintained. It's perfect for a couple.  

The Internet worked very well as well as all the appliances and there is a great big fridge for all your Brahma beer. The door men were always courteous and kept a close eye on everything.  "}, {'_id': '52669899', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2851471', 'reviewer_id': '9735731', 'reviewer_name': 'Bruno', 'comments': 'The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. Tivemos alguns pontos negativos que pelo que pude ver acredito ser pontual. O ar do quarto principal faz um barulho muito alto e não tem condições de ligar. Esperávamos chegar e ter uma casa de casal e um beliche como mas fotos, mas nesse segundo só havia um colchão, e por estarmos em três, tivemos que dormir junto na cama de casal. Por último, no airbnb está descrito que o checkout é até as 20:00 mas fomos comunicados na noite anterior que teríamos que sair até as 12:00. Adiantamos o voo e fomos embora, sem problema. Como falei, acredito que seja "problemas" pontuais. No mais, o apartamento está em ótimo estado e recomendo. Débora é rápida e atenciosa. O apartamento é ótimo, muito funcional e charmoso, com instalações e equipamentos ótimos. Mesmo a subida a partir do canal do leblon, que de fato é puxada, tem seu lado positivo, pois a vista de cima dá uma sensação de estar meio fora do movimento lá de baixo. Sendo que descendo, em 5 minutos você está no agito da Dias Ferreira e a praia é logo ali. [{'_id': '229591499', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 1, 24, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2858519', 'reviewer_id': '36139757', 'reviewer_name': 'Lorena', 'comments': 'Lo mejor del departamento es la ubicación, frente a una playa hermosa, tranquila y familiar y a una cuadra de la Av. Olegario Maciel, muy popular, con restaurantes, bares y tiendas, muy concurrida.
El edificio es muy lindo tiene una piscina templada que a los niños les encanto, sobretodo porque no es profunda y podían jugar.
El departamento tiene una sala y cocina muy amplia, los cuartos son pequeños, lo mejor es que tiene 5 baños y con muy buena presión de agua y temperatura ( nos bañábamos en todos a la vez sin problema).
Tiene un lindo balcón con vista al mar ( con una red de seguridad que arruina un poco la vista)
El departamento no es de lujosa decoración, es exactamente lo que muestran las fotografías, es básico, con muebles un tanto viejos y con mezcla de estilos.
Los aires andaban mal, pero Frank fue muy servicial y solucionó momentáneamente el problema.
Eramos 11 personas, yo lo recomiendo para 8 o máximo 9 ya que estábamos un poco apretados.
Recomendable para los que no buscan grandes lujos pero si buenos servicios y ubicación.'}, {'_id': '246907096', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 3, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2858519', 'reviewer_id': '54408585', 'reviewer_name': 'Nicolas', 'comments': 'El departamento es muy grande y cómodo, la ubicación inmejorable. Justo en frente de la playa y a pocas cuadras del centro de Barra Da Tijuca. Yo lo recomiendo.'}, {'_id': '249995976', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 4, 3, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2858519', 'reviewer_id': '62441369', 'reviewer_name': 'Miguel', 'comments': 'Fuimos de viaje con amigos , el departamento tiene una ubicación óptima , al frente de la playa , con una gran vista , además caminando puedes ir a Olegario Maciel , calle con comercio y vida nocturna (bares y restaurantes ) 
El departamento es amplio , sin embargo, los muebles y artefactos están descuidados y son antiguos

[{'_id': '14521926', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2949309', 'reviewer_id': '15920102', 'reviewer_name': 'Carlos', 'comments': 'Tessa (amiga de Guilherme) nos trato muy bien y nos informo de todas las cosas de la casa, así como de los lugares donde comer y visitar en el  vecindario y ciudad.
Estuvimos hospedados durante la primera semana del mundial 2014, y aunque no pasamos mucho tiempo en el apartamento la estancia estuvo bien.
El vecindario esta bastante bien, tiene un centro comercial debajo,  la estación de metro cerca, y la playa de copacabana a unos 800 mts.'}, {'_id': '24862742', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '2949309', 'reviewer_id': '756108', 'reviewer_name': 'Akila', 'comments': "We loved this apartment.  It is very convenient, directly above a shopping mall that has a supermarket, an ATM/bank, numerous small juice stands and pastry shops, and a drug store.  It is located within a 1 minute walk to the Siquiera Campos metro station and about 10 minutes to the beach.  The apartment feels very safe because there is a police station right next door to the shopping center, though we would still recommend not walking and only taking taxis after around 9:00-10:00 p.m.  It was perfect for Reveillon (New Year's Eve), because we were able to grab some champagne at one of the stores downstairs, and then walk down to the Copacabana Beach.

The neighborhood is also really lovely.  There is a large playground for children within a 3 minute walk and the whole neighborhood feels very green and family friendly.  On Wednesdays, there is a fruit and vegetable market in that same park area.  We preferred staying back a little, away from the main busy stretch on Avenida Atlantica.  

The apartment itself is large and very comfortable.  The main room has a side view of Christ the Redeemer, two comfortable couches, and a dining area.  The kitchen is small but perfect for making small meals, like breakfasts and lunch, and there is also a washing machine and drying rack that works great.  The bathroom has a deep bathtub which is a very unusual find in Brazil.  The bedroom was large enough for the bed plus we were able to keep our daughter's crib in the other side of the room.  The air conditioning works great in both of the rooms and the bedroom stays very dark because there are metal retractable shades.  The Internet was fast and reliable and we were even able to stream videos, which was a surprise since Internet can often be slow in South America.

It does get noisy at night, but we have a white noise machine that we use for our daughter whenever she is sleeping and that blocked out all of the exterior noise.  Also, our one recommendation for Guilherme and Tessa is to put window shades/curtains in front of the living room's windows because it gets very hot in the middle of the day in that room and the exterior lights would make it difficult to sleep at night in the living room.  Until they put in shades/curtains, I don't think the living room would be that comfortable to sleep in.

But, that's a minor point.  We would have loved to stay here much longer, especially since it is such a great value!  My brother and sister-in-law were staying at the Marriott for $375/night and their whole room was about 1/3 of the size of this fantastic apartment.  I particularly recommend this apartment for families but, no matter what your situation is, you won't regret booking here.  It's a great spot!  "}, {'_id': '95964741', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '2949309', 'reviewer_id': '57002123', 'reviewer_name': 'Pancho', 'comments': 'Excelente!  Desde el primer día Guilherme  estuvo completamente a disposición nuestra para que nuestra estadía fuera excelente, es mas, incluso un día a las 23hs tuvimos un inconveniente con la cerradura y a los 10 min de notificado se hizo presente en el departamento y soluciono nuestro problema.  La ubicación del departamento es inmejorable, a 1 cuadra del metro y con varios bares y restaurantes. 


'}]

[{'_id': '1683313', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 7, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '2453609', 'reviewer_name': 'Markus', 'comments': 'We attended a conference at Windsor Barra Hotel and the apartment was perfect for this. Only 5 minutes walk to the conference location. Very nice apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (each with shower).Very nice beach just 5 minutes walk away. I would recommend that location to my friends, if they ever visit Rio. Gus is really helpful and a perfect host. Thank you very much.'}, {'_id': '4570564', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 5, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '4031169', 'reviewer_name': 'Simone', 'comments': "Casa spaziosa, pulita e dotata di tutti i confort come da foto e da informazioni sul sito. Presente il servizio di pulizie dal lunedì al venerdì e la WIFI gratuita (ottima!).
Presente anche lavanderia, piscina, sauna e palestra all'interno del condominio. Un po' distante dal mare (in realtà in linea d'aria è vicinissimo ma c'è necessità di attraversare un canale) e Gus mette a disposizione le card per l'uso gratuito del battello per attraversare il canale e arrivare in spiaggia (dalle 7.00 alle 21.00 tutti i giorni). Gus e la sorella sono stati ospitali fin dal primo giorno, quando nonostante fossi arrivato molto presto con l'aereo, si sono fatti trovare pronti per consegnarmi le chiavi e mostrarmi la casa e i servizi. 
E' un posto che consiglierei, soprattutto per viaggi di lavoro essendo vicino a molti Business Centre, in una zona molto tranquilla di Rio, anche se un po' distante per chi è qui per turismo."}, {'_id': '4924054', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 6, 2, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '4031169', 'reviewer_name': 'Simone', 'comments': 'I stayed in this apartment about 2 months. It is perfect and good located if you work in Barra. It is fully equipped and functional. 2 big rooms, wifi available and 2 bathroom. 
It is not distant from the beach and Gus provided to me a card to use the boat in front of the apartment to pass the canal. In the condo there are also swimming pool and sauna (I use it only one time), and laundry (useful and not expensive). The maid service is perfectly performed each day (holiday and weekend excluded). I will book this apartment if I will return in Rio for work. Thanks Gus!'}, {'_id': '5041208', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 6, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '4031169', 'reviewer_name': 'Simone', 'comments': "Casa spettacolare. Sarò ripetitivo ma per il prezzo e la posizione e i servizi offerti è veramente il meglio che si può volere.
Ne ho provate altre di case a Rio ma tornando scelgo sempre questa. Tutto ottimo, posizione, servizi, efficienza della casa e dotazioni. 
Inoltre Gus ti tratta veramente al meglio.
Positivo per chi lavora la lavanderia nel condominio e la pulizia girnaliera dell'appartamento.
Grazie ancora una volta Gus per l'ospitalità"}, {'_id': '5157462', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 6, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '5355132', 'reviewer_name': 'Justin', 'comments': "We were very very happy with our stay at Gustavo's place! We had lots of room for 4 people. It's in a safe neighborhood and only take 5 minutes to walk to an incredible beach. The maid service was great too. It was like staying in our own private hotel!

And, Gustavo is a great host! He made sure to reach out before our trip to make sure we had all of our questions answered. When we arrived, he personally met us at the place and showed us the important things - like how to get to the beach using the ferry, how to use the laundry, how to connect to the free wifi, and how to turn the TV to english speaking stations :)

If you're looking for a place to stay in Rio, I highly recommend staying here. 

Pros: close to the beach, air conditioning, wifi, satellite tv, secure building in a safe neighborhood, 2 full bathrooms, & maid service"}, {'_id': '27665363', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '7035085', 'reviewer_name': 'Gastón', 'comments': 'The apartment is perfect. Gustavo and is sister are excellent hosts.'}, {'_id': '28615522', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '4031169', 'reviewer_name': 'Simone', 'comments': 'Super consigliato per la disponibilità di Gus, per la pulizia e i servizi offerti. Gustavo y su hermana se preocupan por que la estadía sea perfecta.'}, {'_id': '86063632', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 7, 14, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '49425618', 'reviewer_name': 'Emily', 'comments': "I stayed in this apartment for almost 3 months and had a great experience. The apartment is in one of the more upper-class neighborhoods, is located near many different shopping malls and restaurants, and is very safe.  While it isn't centrally located near the main tourist attractions, a taxi is easy to get.  If you don't feel like going far, Barra Beach is the longest beach in Rio and is only a 5 minute walk away.  Overall a great apartment!"}, {'_id': '96110710', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '296910', 'reviewer_id': '28301179', 'reviewer_name': 'Linda', 'comments': "This was a perfect place for 2 couples to stay during the Olympics. [{'_id': '2771132', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '297908', 'reviewer_id': '3592039', 'reviewer_name': 'Holly', 'comments': 'A beautiful retreat in an energetic, exciting city, Eduardo and Raimundo were the hosts that dreams are made of. '}, {'_id': '10599265', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '297908', 'reviewer_id': '3227887', 'reviewer_name': 'David', 'comments': 'Eduardo and Raimundo are very friendly and nice guys. I would have liked to have more time to talk with Eduardo and Raimundo and a tour of their beautiful house. Maybe next time.
Thank you guys!'}, {'_id': '14460743', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '297908', 'reviewer_id': '10190121', 'reviewer_name': 'Dawn', 'comments': "Eduardo & Raimundo are the perfect hosts in every way.  Communication, prior to and during our stay was excellent.  Nothing was too much trouble for them and they made sure that our stay was as comfortable as possible.  They are also very passionate about the local community and it's fantastic culture.  They provide us with lots of useful information and recommendations about places to visit based on our discussions with them (we managed to communicate easily despite our limited Portuguese). 

The apartment has been decorated and furnished in an imaginative way, making very good use of the space available and is very comfortable and light.  We felt very much at home immediately.  The hosts also added little touches which made us feel very welcome, including some provisions e.g. fresh fruit and drinks.  There is also a large external terrace area where you can sit and relax, with great views of Santa Teresa and the surrounding area.

The accommodation is located on a quiet street within 5 minutes walk of both the centre of Santa Teresa and Lapa, which both have plentiful bars, restaurants, galleries and other cultural sights that can be explored.  Public transport, both bus and metro, is easily accessible in Lapa, as too are taxis.  

We felt very safe within the area and would recommend the studio as a great base for exploring Rio.  

If we return to Rio, we would definitely stay at the studio and we will stay in contact with Eduardo & Raimundo, who are exceptionally generous hosts, who we now regard as friends. 

"}, {'_id': '14809285', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '297908', 'reviewer_id': '7943052', 'reviewer_name': 'Harryy', 'comments': 'Eduardo and Raimundo provided us with the best hospitality we had in the whole 2 weeks of being in Brasil for the world cup!

It has a very quiet washing machine which was really helpful. '}, {'_id': '39953875', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3013098', 'reviewer_id': '14697619', 'reviewer_name': 'Luiz', 'comments': 'Delicioso, confortável, muito bem cuidado são alguns adjetivos que posso usar para descrever o apartamento de Melina. Es incluso más lindo cuando se lo ve personalmente que en las fotos. 
Nos recibió con el apartamento en un estado impecable de limpieza, y con todas las cosas que necesitábamos para estar cómodas. Está muy bien pensado para los visitantes, ya que hay de todo! Hasta paraguas! 

El barrio es muy lindo, la ubicación es perfecta, porque no sólo está a dos cuadras de la Playa de Copacabana, sino que está a unos metros de la Rua Nossa Senhora de Copabana, donde se pueden encontrar todo tipo de tiendas, farmacias y supermercados. Hay un Starbucks que abre las 24 horas a tres cuadras del apartamento, lo cual también es muy bueno y una tienda de alimentos gourmet en la esquina (se llama Santa Marta Gourmet). 

Melina siempre estuvo disponible para las consultas que tuviéramos sobre el apartamento, que realmente fueron pocas, ya que estaba todo muy bien. Siempre responde a los mensajes de forma rápida y amable, además de hacer que todo el proceso sea muy fácil, incluso para nosotras que llegamos muy temprano en la madrugada. Leo, el portero del edificio está siempre ahí para ayudar en lo que los visitantes necesiten y también es una persona muy amable y bien dispuesta. 

Realmente, todas vamos a recomendar este apartamento porque tuvimos una experiencia inmejorable. Air-conditioning is a useful benefit when temperatures are high. There is a wide variety of good restaurants within easy walking distance and some, including a few close to the apartment have samba music on the weekends. Noise can be a challenge if early sleep is a prerequisite!  John tries hard to be a helpful host, seems to know Rio quite well and has created a useful advisory on local restaurants and tourist destinations in and around the city as well travel alternatives for visitors. John lives in California and this was the first time we had rented from a landlord who lives abroad. When something needs attention, as will be the case from time to time, it is harder to reach him, being in another country. However, he is attentive through his intermediaries when he becomes aware of an issue. The condo is on the seventh floor of an older building with two elevators which are not always reliable. We had an unfortunate and stressful experience through being stuck in the main elevator for almost 90 minutes. It is now out of commission for repairs, so hopefully the problem we experienced will not occur again with any residents or future guests. We had to use the service elevator at the rear of the building for a part of our stay. It is also old and, based on our experience, we naturally wondered about its reliability and maintenance record. Thankfully, it didn’t give us any difficulties. 
Putting aside a few unfortunate experiences with this rental, we enjoyed the apartment and the location and appreciated how responsive John tried to be as a caring airbnb host.

Here's the slightly longer version:

Dennis and his property manager Will do a great job welcoming guests.  Moreover they were very responsive whenever I had a question or an issue.  The apartment is furnished with everything I needed and a whole lot more.  The neighborhood is lively, which in my opinion makes it a safe place - I never had any problems walking around at all hours of the night.  The location is outstanding, with metro access a few blocks away and bus/van access to routes that will get you all over Rio no more than a block away.

Highly recommended, and like I said, I'd happily stay here again."}, {'_id': '2150314', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 8, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '310233', 'reviewer_id': '2741875', 'reviewer_name': 'Claudio', 'comments': "Perfect place for us to crash during our stay in Rio de Janeiro. Excellent location, 24 hour access, and everything we needed close by.  You could walk or take transit anywhere, but we rented a car to visit friends and we even found relatively cheap or even free overnight parking nearby.  In Rio that's in short supply!
A couple of minor maintenance problems were taken care of promptly by property manager while we were out, so no hardship there. It's right on a major street so you wake to Rio traffic waking up, but that was part of the charm for us and a push to go out & get our morning coffee.
Seriously, my only real complaint is that there wasn't more dresser space for clothes!  We would certainly want to re-book when we come back.  Thanks to Dennis & Will, great place."}, {'_id': '2822499', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 11, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '310233', 'reviewer_id': '2921582', 'reviewer_name': 'Daniel', 'comments': 'The apartment was very nice and in a good, central location. Taxi  pick up zone across street and a metro station a couple of blocks away. Beach a block away and restaurants and bars of all price levels in close proximity. Dennis was a very solicitous host and emailed a couple of times during my stay to make sure everything was okay.

Having stayed in Copa before I was a little concerned about the security situation but I neednt have been. The difference between now and 2 years ago is like night and day.  I never once felt uncomfortable and can honestly say I felt safer in the busy, bustling neighborhood around this apartment than I do back home in Las Vegas. 

I would not hesitate to recommend the place to friends or family members. If you are looking for a more "authentic" travel experience in Rio then skip the overpriced hotels and rent an apartment like this one.

One quibble:  The coffee maker is on its last legs. I like to have a big pot of Brazilian coffee in the morning and it never let me down  but its getting close to retirement age.

In short, I fully recommend this apartment.
