[{'_id': '366321065', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '31123905', 'reviewer_id': '40530223', 'reviewer_name': 'Rupert', 'comments': '2 Brazilian friends and I decided to go to Rio for Réveillon. We came across this posting for Edilberto’s accommodations and reached out. He was very responsive and very helpful. The apartment was spacious, clean, with all the amenities needed for our 3 day stay. It is in a safe area, which is key in Rio, and literally walking distance from the subway which was perfect to get around. On Sundays there is a farmers market which is right outside, bringing local fruits, vegetables, and meats. In addition there are supermarkets along with sit down and fast food restaurants within walking distance. Also an Uber makes anything accessible. I would definitely stay with Edilberto again. I found him pleasant, friendly, and accommodating. 

Eu e mais dois amigos brasileiros decidimos ir para o Rio de Janeiro passar o Réveillon. Encontramos este apartamento do Edilberto. Um apartamento espaçoso, limpo e com todas as comodidades necessárias para a nossa estadia de 3 dias. Situado na Tijuca em uma área residencial segura, o que é fundamental no Rio, e com a conveniência do metrô acessível 3 quadras do endereço. Aos domingos, acontece uma feira de produtores na rua logo em frente, com frutas, verduras, legumes e carnes... Além disso, existem supermercados, padarias e restaurantes a uma curta distância. O Uber também faz qualquer lugar acessível. Eu definitivamente ficaria hospedado no apartamento do Edilberto novamente. Um anfitrião agradável, amigável e complacente.'}, {'_id': '401655628', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 15, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '31123905', 'reviewer_id': '72910913', 'reviewer_name': 'Inayê', 'comments': 'Lugar mto agradável em todos os sentidos.. o bairro em si, a localização, o apartamento, os cômodos, a facilidade de acesso pelos dois aeroportos, local estratégico pra quem, como eu e minha família, gosta de ir nos lugares com os melhores sambas do RJ!!!
Amamos e sempre que voltarmos ao RJ, tentaremos nos hospedar no apê do Edilberto novamente..'}, {'_id': '403248120', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '31123905', 'reviewer_id': '113537959', 'reviewer_name': 'Ana Paula', 'comments': 'Sr. Edilberto foi muito simpático e solícito. [{'_id': '1037302', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 3, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '1793799', 'reviewer_name': 'Artem', 'comments': 'Отличное место!! Огромное Спасибо Levy за организованный отдых и предоставленные советы и всяческую помощь!'}, {'_id': '1558144', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 6, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '2466032', 'reviewer_name': 'Emmanuel', 'comments': 'We had a good time in Rio, in this apartment that is very well located in Ipanema. Ipanema is a safe area, the apartment is 1 block away the metro station and 2 blocks from the beach.

Levy assisted us when we had a problem with the hot water, and recommended a lot of places to go, including a quick sightseeing around the neighbourood in order to show supermarket, restaurant, bus stations...

Recommended for your stay in Rio'}, {'_id': '2078015', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 8, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '3284183', 'reviewer_name': 'Pedro', 'comments': "We had the luck and pleasure to spend 4 nights in Levy's amazing apartment at Ipanema. The place has everything one can need: fully equipped kitchen, living room area, very confortable huge bed, big closet and nice bathrooms; everything decorated in a very stylish modern way, with brand new furniture and topped up with flat screen TV's in pretty much every room and AC :)! 
However, the best part of the whole experience was Levy himself, one of the most helpfull and dedicated hosts I have ever met. FIrst of all he really help us out at the time of finding accomodation since we only started looking for it one day before our arrival to Rio. When we did the chek-in at his place he gave us a full master class about Rio, the different areas and things we could do to make the most out of our stay. He filled us up with all kinds of info about buses, metro, prices and so on. Also, he was kind enough to take us out for a walk around the neighbourhood, including a really interesting visit to a nearby favela. 
To anyone thinking about staying at this one or any other of Levy's appartments I would suggest not to hesitate too much and book it at once, before it's too late and somebody else does ;)"}, {'_id': '2513129', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '3469211', 'reviewer_name': 'Roberto', 'comments': "Apartment was clean, well equipped and perfectly located for my work-trip-but-I-still-want-know-Rio plans.

However, if you're visiting Rio for the first time, the best reason to get this apartment is the host.

Senhor Levy is extremely nice and helpful, showing around and recommending plans."}, {'_id': '3015481', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '4039992', 'reviewer_name': 'Ricardo', 'comments': 'O Levy é extremamente atencioso, e o apartamento é muito bem localizado.  recomendo definitivamente!'}, {'_id': '3078418', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 12, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '1473515', 'reviewer_name': 'Carl', 'comments': 'I travel to Brazil with some frequency and rent apartments there.  If you are going to Rio you should be prepared to receive less for your money than you might expect. 
This apartment is definitely well above average.  The location is excellent in terms of access to the beach, the metro, groceries, and restaurants, bars, etc.  The little park across the street hosts a number of interesting fairs during the week as well. It is in Ipanema proper, not Copa or Arpoador, and should command a higher price. The furnishings are well above average for Brazil.  There is relatively a lot of space, and the bedroom is separate and has a nice AC.  The kitchen/living room is well equipped as well.   This area cannot be cooled well because the windows cannot be closed.  Levy says this is a Brazilian regulation because of the gas water heater and stove, and this sounds about right for Brazil.  There is a washer, and a small clothes drying rack above, and a second toilet.  Everything works well in the kitchen.  All this is very good.
On the downside the sofa is possibly the most uncomfortable I have ever sat in. It is hard and  if you lean back it wants to unfold into a bed.  The TV receives no English channels, although occasionally you might find one show in English.  No sports either.  There is no outside view, but the windows allow good light.
Levy himself is very helpful and ready to provide you with helpful advice and guidance for the area.  He wants you to enjoy your stay.  Believe me, this is a rarity.
I also recommend the BnB structure which allows you to pay by credit card.  Almost all apartment owners in Rio want you to pay in cash in advance with American dollars or Euros.  You have little recourse if you have problems, and the rental agencies will almost always side with the owners because that is how they make money.  Be very careful!  Scams are common.
All in all, I would say this is one of the best values I have received in Rio in my many travels.  I would stay there again, and I recommend this owner highly.  4 stars is a high rating for me.  I don't think I have ever experienced "excellence" in Brazil in terms of lodging, even at much higher prices or in hotels.  This apartment is pretty close to as good as it gets, at least in anything remotely close to this price.'}, {'_id': '3425608', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 1, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '4264821', 'reviewer_name': 'Giovanni', 'comments': 'Apartamento ótimo, com móveis novos, cama e sofá cama muito confortaveis e espaçosos, roupa de cama e toalhas limpos e em perfeita condição, banheiro excelente, wifi e TVs muito bons e tudo funcionando. Tivemos pequenos problemas, que foram prontamente resolvidos pelo proprietário (cortina e cheiro de cigarro), que nos apresentou a cidade, deu diversas dicas e respondeu sempre de imediato quando contactado.  O bairro é excelente e o apartamento é muito bem localizado (próximo a mercados, metrô, ponto de táxi, bares, e a 2 quadras da praia). O apartamento fica bastante próximo à entrada da favela do cantagalo, mas como ela está pacificada é muito tranquilo (andamos, inclusive, durante a madrugada). Um problema é que as janelas dos banheiros ficam viradas para dentro da casa, e não para (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficarei no apartamento novamente quando voltar ao Rio.'}, {'_id': '3741634', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 3, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '1621007', 'reviewer_name': 'Rudolf', 'comments': 'When we arrived from the airport it was raining cats and dogs in Rio. The landlord was waiting for us and helped us with an umbrella to get our luggage into the house and the appartment which is on the first floor (the house has an elevator).
The appartment has about 40 sqm with a double bed bedroom and another small room with a sofa which can be converted to an additional bed for 1 (exceptionally 2) persons.
There are 2 toilets, a bathroom, a kitchen and a washing machine in the appartment (all seems to be very new).
The airbnb process with the landlord was very friendly and reliable. The price is fair for Rio because the hotels in Rio have a very bad price/service relation. 
Only the view out of the appartment was not very attractive but this is not important if you are out all day long.

---> recommandable'}, {'_id': '3856500', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 3, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '2845378', 'reviewer_name': 'Heather', 'comments': "Hi - Levy's place was perfect for what we were looking for - great location in Ipanema, comfortable bed and nice bathrooms. Levy was a wonderful host as well, showing us around the neighborhood and pointing us to a few places we needed to go. We'd definitely stay here again. Thanks, Levy!
"}, {'_id': '3960259', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 3, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '4782220', 'reviewer_name': 'Tatiana', 'comments': "Minha sogra esteve hospedada com sua mãe no apartamento do Sr Levy. Primeiramente, o Sr Levy é uma pessoa maravilhosa, muito atencioso e solícito. Não tivemos problema algum com checkin ou checkout. O apartamento é ótimo, conservado, praticamente novo, a internet funciona perfeitamente e tudo estava exatamente como nas fotos! Pertíssimo da praia e bem estruturado, não temos do que reclamar! Obrigada Sr Levy!
The apartment is fantastic, clean, well equiped, with internet, close to the beach, exactly like the pictures showed. Mr Levy is a very nice person and we did'nt have any problem with the check in and check out! "}, {'_id': '4085282', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 4, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '522157', 'reviewer_name': 'Danielle', 'comments': "Me and my boyfriend had to stay in Rio for business and the apartment was perfect for that. Wash Machine, Wi-Fi that works perfectly, very comfortable bed.. everything works like in a new house. And the location is so perfect that sometimes we forgot the business and enjoyed the city as tourists. That's also because Levy was such a great host that provided us an incredible list of to do's and to go's list!! "}, {'_id': '5784493', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 7, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '2984657', 'reviewer_name': 'Lih-Ming', 'comments': "This is a fantastic location in Ipanema. It is safe. It is close to public transport - buses and the metro (when it re-opens after renovations). There are many places to eat nearby - many of them are of good quality. Also, there are 2 super-markets within a stone's throw and 24hr juice and salgado bars. The beach is slightly further away but still an easy walk.

The apartment itself comfortably fit the two of us. There are two toilets which is handy. Having a clothes washing machine is handy for longer stays. You can hear the neighbours talking as the apartments are set closely together but we did not have any troubles sleeping. The place is more utilitarian rather than luxurious but you are saving money compared to the hotels. The plumbing is older so you can't flush toilet paper down the toilet.

Levy was there to check us in and check us out. He has a wealth of information for visitors, bus routes, places to eat and even took us on a mini tour of the local area."}, {'_id': '5988800', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 7, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '4348295', 'reviewer_name': 'Katherine', 'comments': "Levy was a wonderful host! He waited to let us in an hour later due to a delayed flight (at 10pm). Upon arrival he gave us a very thorough description of the apartment. The apartment is very well located (2 blocks from the beach, great juice bars on every corner, bars nearby, Starbucks down the street for the occasional guilty pleasure). He was an incredible host and always replied to our questions within 24 hours. Would definitely recommend to others that are looking for an apartment to rent in this area.

Some things to note: make sure to ask for the safe code so that you can put your valuables in it. The closest subway stop is currently under construction and it's a bit inconvenient, but the busses are super cheap and reliable. The outside room doesn't have air conditioning so if you have people staying out there, keep the master room open to get the air flowing.  "}, {'_id': '6321466', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 8, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '4882082', 'reviewer_name': 'Kurt', 'comments': "As the previous reviews have stated the location of this apartment is fantastic, right in the heart of Ipanema and only 2 blocks from the beach. We stayed for 5 nights and found it very easy to get around and loved being so close to so many restaurants, cafes, juice bars and supermarkets. The apartment is a good size for 2 people, with 1.5 bathrooms, but i can imagine it would be a bit tight if you had extra people staying in the living room. The building and apartment feels secure and we did not feel unsafe at all when walking around the area, even at night.

Probably the only downside to the apartment is that since there is only one window (in the bedroom) that opens onto the neighbouring apartment's balcony there is not much natural light in the rest of the apartment. The AC and fans work well but we found it a bit difficult to dry clothes and towels during the day, as we did not want to leave the windows open when we left the apartment.

Levy is an incredibly friendly host who went out of his way to give us a tour when we first arrived and also lots of advice on restaurants, buses, sights and other useful information. This personal touch was really valuable and is one of the reasons we were attracted to this apartment and continue to book through airbnb. Overall we had a great stay and would definitely recommend staying here."}, {'_id': '6709803', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 8, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '3048948', 'reviewer_name': 'Julian', 'comments': 'Our flight to Rio arrived 4 hours late but there was no problem, Levy waited for us at the apartment.
The place is super nice and extremely well located. There are 2 supermarkets, a fancy one across the street and another bigger one at the corner.
Restaurants, bars and the most beautiful beach are just a couple  blocks away.
Copacabana is also close-by, you can either walk 20 mins or take public transportation.
The subway is just half a block away but at the moment the Ipanema/osorio station is closed for expansion.
The apartment is fully equipped with everything. You only need to bring soap, shampoo, and food.
I will definitely come back to rio and (hopefully) find this apartment available for rent.

'}, {'_id': '7232265', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 9, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '3805621', 'reviewer_name': 'Christian', 'comments': "One of the best places to rent in Ipanema !!! We originally had some problems with the pillows, which we emailed him about and it took not even an hour for him to call us and replace the pillows the same day. He even walked us and our luggage to the hotel from which we were picked up for our onward trip and offered us to leave our luggage at his private place on our last day which would have been very helpful due to our late night flight departure. 
The flat in Ipanema was very central to everything. Only minor thing to note was that it is in a short one way street, that many taxis don't bother driving into and rather drop you at the corner with the main street. Since there is a favela in the near vicinity that made us a little uncomfortable at night sometimes. 
"}, {'_id': '8601244', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 11, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '9268268', 'reviewer_name': 'Märta', 'comments': "The apt is at a great spot if you like to stay in ipanema. You can even walk to cantagalo metrostation (closest which is running) in 15-20min to take the metro to centre (which with the traffic in rio is suggested).

 Quiet apartment, Leyv answered quickly, no problems with the organisation. GREAT bed!!better then mine at home!clean apartment, but as always smaller than the pictures would suggest.but fitted our family of 2 adults and 2 kids perfect (they slept in a bed for babies we brought and a inflate madress Levy left for us since the kids like to sleep in our room-thank you levy.) otherwise the sofa is possible to make a bed-but the area in the livingroom will then be very cramped if the sofa is folded out-would need to stow it away every day if you want to use the table etc.) never used the TV, but stove, fridge and washmachine worked fine. Small kitchen, but regular as always abroad... Good hot water! Great location, lovely clean apartment."}, {'_id': '28830498', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '9705268', 'reviewer_name': 'Lauana', 'comments': 'Accurate listing. Close to beach. Clean. Friendly and accommodating host. Would stay here again. Good times during my last week in Ipanema!'}, {'_id': '29681343', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 4, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '29129902', 'reviewer_name': 'Florencia', 'comments': 'Estuvimos alojados por seis noches en el apartamento del Sr. Levy de la calle Teixeira de Melo en Ipanema. Llegamos en el horario previsto y Levy estaba esperándonos en la puerta del edificio. Nos mostró el deparamento y nos dio muchas sugerencias acerca de los lugares que podíamos visitar y cómo llegar a cada uno de ellos. Muy cordial y dispuesto, nos llevó al “Mirante da Paz” que está a 50 mts del departamento, una construcción nueva que provee una vista privilegiada de la zona de Ipanema.

El edificio tiene un encargado (portero) y está ubicado a media cuadra de la Plaza Gral Osorio, que es el nodo de transporte de Ipanema por dónde pasa el 50% de los buses de Rio; además tiene la cabecera de la Línea 1 de metro; y próximamente la de la Línea 4 que irá hasta Barra de Tijuca; lo cual lo pone en una situación privilegiada con respecto al transporte. En cada una de las esquinas hay un supermercado (Zona Sul y Hortifruti) y al estar a 50 mts de Vizconde de Pirayá (el eje comercial de Ipanema) existe una infinita variedad de lugares para comer, asi como comercios en general. La playa de Ipanema está a dos cuadras y  a un máximo de seis cuadras la de Copacabana.

En cuanto al equipamiento, el departamento consta de un dormitorio grande con una cama matrimonial; dos baños; comedor diario y cocina completa. Todos los ambientes con aire acondicionado y ventilador de techo; conexión wifi inalámbrica;  dos Smart TV con cable básico de Sky; vajilla, utensillos y cubiertos en perfecto estado. Todos los electrodomésticos necesarios para una estadía de vacaciones (cafetera, sandwichera, tostadora, microondas, dispenser de agua, etc). la única mejora que haría sería la de agregar sillas de playa y una sombrilla para lelvara  la playa.

La comunicación con Levy fue excelente durante toda la estadía. Un anfitrión para recomendar y volver a visitar nuevamente.'}, {'_id': '35141483', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '5410313', 'reviewer_name': 'David', 'comments': 'As all other reviews have suggested Levi was a great host. La próxima vuelta a Rio sin dudas serán con Levy!'}, {'_id': '50702382', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '313223', 'reviewer_id': '4630173', 'reviewer_name': 'Chris', 'comments': 'Levy was a terrific host. He arranged to meet me at the entrance to the apartment and arrived on time. He not only showed me the apartment, but took the additional time to provide a tour of the local area and pointed out some places to eat, where the safe ATMs were located, pointers about the culture, and details on how I could explore the local attractions economically. He also arranged for a taxi to take me to the airport on my return, which was very convenient.
The apartment was quite clean and as described on AirBnb. The pictures are accurate. The shower had plenty of hot water and good pressure, and there is filtered water for drinking as well. The wifi worked great. I felt safe in the neighborhood, and enjoyed feeling like I was a part of the local culture moreso than if I had stayed in a hotel.
For my first time in Rio, this was a great place to stay for an affordable price. It provided everything we needed as guests: a comfortable bed, hot water, refrigerator, dishes, and wifi. The location was nearly perfect. Within two blocks, everything you need is available, including cafes, restaurants, bars, markets, and shopping. Ipanema beach was within a quick and safe three block walk. During my stay he advised me where I should eat, where I should go, and where I should stay away from. He even advised me that I should wait to get to Rio before I took out money for my trip because the currency exchange in Rio would be much better. The apartment was perfect!  It was clean and in the perfect location.  It was about 2 blocks away from the beach and very close to restaurants and supermarkets and the bank.  I really enjoyed my stay and will be staying in the apartment again.

Thank you again Mr. Levy for your hospitality!!

Obrigado

O atendimento do Levy foi fantástico, pois respondeu a todas as dúvidas e indicou o melhor apartamento que seria adequado ao meu caso.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo a metrô, ponto de táxi, paradas de ônibus, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e bancos. Tudo isso e a dois quarteirões da praia. Entretanto, é muito sossegado, pois fica num trecho de rua sem muito movimento e é de fundos.
A cama é confortável, o banheiro é espaçoso, o apartamento possui Internet de boa velocidade, TV a cabo com os canais principais.

[{'_id': '15982166', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3155979', 'reviewer_id': '7968822', 'reviewer_name': 'Richard', 'comments': "Wow the place is brand new! New everything and a really great place, great location next to the metro station and minutes from the amazing party's in lapa, I'd recommend this place as great value and very clean comfortable apartment. I payed double for another place nearby and it wasn't half as good as this place, I only wish I found this place before! Not one thing to complain about I'd say this place is perfect."}, {'_id': '16232294', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3155979', 'reviewer_id': '8377519', 'reviewer_name': 'Jackie', 'comments': "Luiz was an excellent host! As soon as I booked the apartment, he contacted me and scheduled the arrangement. We had a minor set back due to the previous guest who had a late check out so I couldn't check in on time but Luiz communicated with me the information with time. I had no problem with the late check in and I hope that if I needed the late check out, it could be offered. He is flexible and I appreciate that as a traveler. His apartment was so clean and so central to everything! The Cinelandia metro station was close by and there are numerous buses that pass by. You have the national theater, the national library and other museums near by. You also have the Feira Uruguaiana close by to shop for all the things you want to take back home. It is a safe location and very close to Lapa (the night life). It is a great central point to branch out and see so many different things in Rio. When I was leaving, Luiz was kind enough to help me find a cab to take me to the airport. Super friendly and helpful. I would totally stay there again! For those who are not familiar with Rio they may find the surrounding area to be intimidating as its the downtown core, but there really is nothing to fear.  One block away is the state assembly, municipal theatre, national library, and many dazzling examples of architecture for which Rio was once famously called "Paris of South America".  There are several nice restaurants where you can enjoy a wonderful evening sipping cold beer and people watching.  
For me the most convenient aspect of this apartment was its proximity to the US Consulate...the reason for my visit.  If you have anything to do in the downtown area this apartment is well located and convenient...including a short taxi ride from the local municipal airport - Santos Dumont.  
Also just one block away is the metro station where you can easily go to the famous beaches of Rio/Copacabana/Ipanema for only R$3.5 per person.  
The apartment was completely renovated and in excellent condition...something you do not find very often in Brasil.  The bed was comfortable and stocked with extra blankets & pillows.  Because we were traveling in winter we didn't need to use the a/c...being on the 18th floor we were up high enough to get a nice refreshing breeze. Sou carioca e aluguei o apartamento por 10 dias pois moro distante dos principais pontos turísticos e estava recebendo a visita do meu namorado alemão. Portanto, posso afirmar com propriedade que ao levar em conta a localização, custo-benefício e conforto não existe melhor opção do que esse apartamento. O imóvel é exatamente como nas fotos!!! A cozinha é muito bem equipada, o cooktop funciona perfeitamente e você encontra todos os utensílios necessários para cozinhar. O box do banheiro é super espaçoso, com blindex e um chuveiro elétrico muito bom! Você também irá encontrar suportes super funcionais dentro do box para estender a sua roupa molhada. A ventilação do apartamento é ótima, fato que nos levou a usar o ar-condicionado apenas uma vez. O mesmo atende maravilhosamente todo o espaço e não é barulhento. O frigobar é mais espaçoso do que aparenta a foto, e tanto o sofá-cama como o colchão da cama principal são super confortáveis! Recebemos o apto limpo com toalhas e roupa de cama. Havia toalhas, roupa de cama e dois travesseiros extras à disposição. O wi-fi funcionou bem durante toda a nossa estadia. O fato do prédio ser comercial é um plus super positivo, pois há porteiros 24h além de circuito interno de câmeras em todos os andares e nos elevadores, que são modernos e espaçosos. O prédio também é muito silencioso, não tivemos nenhum problema com relação a isso. Ao redor do prédio você encontra várias opções de bares, restaurantes, padarias, bancos, e lojas em geral. Depois de visitar todos os pontos turísticos que o Centro da Cidade oferece, você poderá explorar facilmente os demais bairros como Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon, Lagoa, Jardim Botânico e adjacências através do metrô que fica a uma quadra de distância. Já o bairro da Lapa e Santa Teresa são facilmente acessados a pé. Pegamos táxi apenas 2 vezes por uma questão de comodidade e utilizamos um aplicativo. Ambos chegaram em menos de 5 min. Mas na porta do prédio também é possível pegar facilmente um táxi a qualquer hora. Até mesmo ao enfrentar uma frente fria no Rio, fomos surpreendidos com um guarda-chuva à nossa disposição dentro do armário de produtos de limpeza na cozinha, ou seja, não faltou nada mesmo!!! Fiquei muito satisfeito. A localização muito boa.
Encontrei o Apartamento 100% limpo. E mais, tem todos os utensílios necessários para quem quer uma boa temporada. Permanecei no Ap durante 12 dias. A internet tem boa velocidade.
Duas vezes precisei contatar com o Luiz e ele de pronto me atendeu.
Recomendo como uma boa opção, tanto pelo preço, pela boa acomodação, pelo local(centro) e etc.
Cesar Augusto Guimarães (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)'}, {'_id': '72564282', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 3, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3155979', 'reviewer_id': '4401053', 'reviewer_name': 'Vincent', 'comments': "Luiz is a very friendly, helpful guy.  He let me check in a little early since I had an early flight in, and check out late afternoon since I had an evening flight out and the apartment wasn't rented that day.  He also promptly fixed the shower when there was no hot water and when the toilet wouldn't stop flushing.

The apartment is well located in Centro, just 400 meters from the Cinelandia Metro station and the Municipal Theater, and lots of nearby restaurants, although most of them are closed on the weekends.  The apartment is fairly small but comfortable enough for one or two people; the bed is very comfortable, and the small refrigerator is adequate.  The kitchen is very small but sufficient to heat up something on the stove or in the microwave.  The bathroom is fine, with a good shower, and some racks to dry any washing you may have done.

There are three issues with the apartment, which could range from just irritating to a serious negative, depending on how important they are to a prospective renter:
1) The apartment is on, and the window faces, Rua Evaristo da Veiga, a very busy, noisy street, with lots of bus and car traffic.  Even though the apartment is on the 18th floor, you can hear some noise, even with the window shutter closed, at all hours, although the air conditioner drowns out most of it when it is on;
2) The TV is old and there are no international channels, only local Brazilian channels, half of which cannot be seen because of bad reception and none of which are of any interest to a non-Brazilian, so you will not be watching much TV if you are a foreigner;
3) Given the TV situation, good Wi-Fi is even more important; however, the W-Fi in the apartment, while good when it is working, shuts down and restores itself at random, which was frustrating, and sometimes the router had to be manually turned off and back on again when the Wi-Fi didn't restore itself.  Luiz is aware of the problem but apparently nothing can be done about it.

Given the location, the apartment features, and the price, I would definitely stay here again and can recommend staying here if the issues described above are not important to a potential renter."}, {'_id': '76008385', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3155979', 'reviewer_id': '69516484', 'reviewer_name': 'Luis Alberto', 'comments': 'Tudo Ok, aproveitamos bem nossa estadia. O apto fica a dois minutos da estação de metrô (Cinelândia), com  vários restaurantes, bares e um mercado por perto. Um único porém, que não chega a ser um incômodo muito grande, é que há um barulho constante nos arredores, visto que o centro do Rio é uma região bem movimentada. [{'_id': '96432872', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3208863', 'reviewer_id': '28052547', 'reviewer_name': 'Randie', 'comments': "The listing on the description was accurate and as advertised. The downside was that there was not much in the area as far as restaurants and nightlife.  a small grocery store next door and a pharmacy for basic needs.  Getting from the airport was trying since little is translated to English and I found transportation tough to navigate.  A lot of volume at the airport that Rio just didn't know what to do with due to the Olympics.  Fabio did work to connect me with local services and did provide a nice welcoming at the apartment.  This was very convenient for the Olympics but the open swear system and lack of nightlife would lead me to look else where if I ever return to Rio."}, {'_id': '199305132', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 10, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3208863', 'reviewer_id': '147433632', 'reviewer_name': 'Aline', 'comments': 'O apartamento é novo, o condomínio é bom e fica numa boa localização! '}, {'_id': '93667304', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3210248', 'reviewer_id': '28403109', 'reviewer_name': 'Jacqueline', 'comments': 'Nossa estadia no apartamento do Bruno foi ótima, por ser um apartamento prático, com tudo o que se precisa para passar uns dias fora de casa.
Está muito bem localizado, junto a farmácia, supermercados, shopping centers, a 3 minutos da estação do BRT e próximo dos principais eventos das Olimpíadas Rio 2016.
Oferece uma bela vista, é bem ventilado, bem iluminado e bem limpo, o que eu considero um fator bastante importante. 
Internet e TV funcionam muito bem, a cama é bem confortável e o guarda-roupas está livre e com cabides.
O Bruno esteve muito atento às nossas necessidades e nos passou todas as informações antes mesmo de chegarmos ao Rio, o que facilitou bastante os nossos dias.
Meu marido e eu gostamos e sem dúvidas ficaríamos lá novamente.

'}, {'_id': '96081245', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3210248', 'reviewer_id': '32998554', 'reviewer_name': 'Jennifer', 'comments': 'The apartment is just as described - the bed was fabulous! It would have been helpful to know you go down the side street prior to the address to gain access to the building.  It was perfect for us as we were attending the Olympics and even managed a walk to the beach not far away.
Thanks very much Bruno'}, {'_id': '104424304', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 9, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3210248', 'reviewer_id': '12324648', 'reviewer_name': 'Thiago', 'comments': 'Muito obrigado por tudo bruno! a champagne na próxima vez eu tomo! muito boa a localização!'}, {'_id': '120069909', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3210248', 'reviewer_id': '51935799', 'reviewer_name': 'Agatha', 'comments': 'O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo à mercado, farmácia, padaria, restaurantes e shopping (da para fazer tudo isso à pé).

[{'_id': '28381224', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3220673', 'reviewer_id': '2213671', 'reviewer_name': 'Idalia', 'comments': 'Felipe was absolutely wonderful and his apartment was perfect for our stay in Rio! '}, {'_id': '32436878', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3220673', 'reviewer_id': '9315273', 'reviewer_name': 'Edouard', 'comments': 'O apartamento é muito bom e bem localizado. [{'_id': '9583103', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '323213', 'reviewer_id': '4688864', 'reviewer_name': 'James', 'comments': "We stayed with Carlos in his apartment for four nights ov (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) New Year. Carlos, his wife and two dogs were perfect hosts inviting us to join them for New Year celebrations which was a lot of fun.

I would highly recommend renting Carlos' apartment to anyone looking for a little slice of Rio life."}, {'_id': '10837908', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 3, 10, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '323213', 'reviewer_id': '8396090', 'reviewer_name': 'Jenna', 'comments': 'My friend Kristina and I stayed in Rio for 10 days during Carnaval and felt we stayed in the best place possible. '}, {'_id': '129376853', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 30, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '323213', 'reviewer_id': '5129934', 'reviewer_name': 'Nicolas', 'comments': 'GIane is a wonderfull & charming  hostess: she made everything to make me feel at home.

i defenitvely recommand it place for a trip in rio !!!'}, {'_id': '134986056', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '323213', 'reviewer_id': '97364135', 'reviewer_name': 'Emelia', 'comments': 'Giane is a very lovely and social person who will happily show you her favourite spots and night life around Ipanema. The 2 dogs are gorgeous & the house was well equipped for all my needs & in the perfect location for the metro, shops & beach, while still being far enough away from the busy strip of Ipanema main. I would happily stay with Giane again.'}, {'_id': '234622686', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '323213', 'reviewer_id': '12787983', 'reviewer_name': 'Debra', 'comments': "Giane is a lovely person, but she has two dogs living full time in her tiny apartment.  One is very old, sick and can't walk so toilet issues are a problem.  I discovered that she had showered the dog in the same shower as I was using (only one shower) to wash off faeces and urine.  As they don't go outside to toilet, the smell was an issue, as poo and pee would sit on the newspaper all day.  The mattress had blood and sweat stains, so slept with my sarong over the sheet.  I think these issues need to be addressed before she continues to do Airbnb.  As I said, she is. lovely person, but I only stayed four out of the seven nights I booked, as preferred to stay with friends rather than sleep on the mattress."}]

[{'_id': '2767637', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '1315870', 'reviewer_name': 'Dyci', 'comments': "Great price. Great location. Great people. When you're ready to leave the beach and see more of the city, Axel's place is a great place to do that. Great host and he lives with great people that really open their home to you. Be ready for a little hike up the stairs/hill to the house :-P"}, {'_id': '2818873', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 11, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '3999674', 'reviewer_name': 'Bastian', 'comments': 'The stay with Axel was great. His house is very nice and at the top of a calm and safe favela. From the terrace you have a great view over Rio with the sugar loaf in front of you. The house is not far away from the restaurants and bars of Santa Theresa. To Copacabana it is about half an hour by bus.  Axel is also very friendly and helpful. I can definitely recommend this place.'}, {'_id': '3133203', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 22, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '1938990', 'reviewer_name': 'Johannes', 'comments': 'Living there (I stayed for 5 weeks in the front corner room, second floor) was such a wonderful experience!

The view is beyond amazing. The life in/on top of a favela was very interesting and really something special (experiencing the day to day life around you etc) and never in any way dangerous.

The house, the place is full of life. You´ll meet wonderful people, maybe find yourself in the middle of a samba party or will be able to experience many cool Rio things the owners of the place will bring you along with.

The owners are very nice, very concerned about your well-being, about making this place your home. They will assist you if you need help or some cool tips where to go to, what to do in Rio.

Of course, this is not the Hilton (thank God!): There may come a day when it´s a little loud (music in the house or some party in the favela), or when the kitchen may be a little all over the place - but this is temporary and makes it all feel even more like living together with friends instead of staying anonymously in one of the hotel towers in Copacabana. I personally never felt unhappy with conditions or situations.

Best proof of my happiness at Casa48: I´ll come back next year :-)'}, {'_id': '3170219', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '3924414', 'reviewer_name': 'Rob', 'comments': 'Axel and Rafael were great hosts! The place was clean, the service was very good (ie: breakfast) and the view was stunning. The area they live in (on top of a little favela, but easily accessible by road passing by the top) felt very safe and secure, and most of all friendly. We would definitely stay there again!'}, {'_id': '3187205', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 30, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '4134878', 'reviewer_name': 'Lina', 'comments': "Axel is an awesome host! When making the reservation, I made a mistake on the days that we were going to be there but Axel was extremely flexible and was able to move some things around in order to accommodate us on dates close to NYE when reservations have already been secured. He also made sure to check in with me before the trip to ensure that all my questions were answered. 

When we got there, Axel made sure we were comfortable and provided us breakfast which we didn't expect, so that was a great surprise! Since he's also a tour guide, he gave us great tips on places to go and check out. He also took us to check out the local Brazilian samba party scene and introduced us to his visiting friends. I also had 2 friends who stayed longer that didn't have a reservation, but Axel was able to help them secure a place to stay! 

Overall, I would definitely recommend his place to stay - great view, good location, and awesome host! "}, {'_id': '3274639', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 1, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '3732622', 'reviewer_name': 'Charlotta', 'comments': 'Axel and Rafael are both really great hosts. Many good tips on where and how to go to different places in Rio, we got invited to parties (most amazing New Years Eve in a favela nere Leme), sama school practice and nice BBQ:s french/brazilian style. :) The house is great but a bit dirty, the view is fantastic and the fact that it is situated in a favela in Santa Teresa is absolutely nothing to worry about! Me and my two friends had a great time at Axels & Rafaels Casa 48. I would recommend it!'}, {'_id': '3446003', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 1, 31, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '3866166', 'reviewer_name': 'Luisa', 'comments': 'The view from Axels place is amazing,I loved Santa Theresa aswell. Axel picked us up from the airport and made us feel welcome,he has good knowledge of Rio.He was in the process of changing roof when we stayed and excessive rain had held up progress,however once the roof is finished the place is perfect for people looking for a relaxed beautiful place quiet away from centre, basic accomodation,beautiful views and lovely host
Best wishes to Axel and his friends

'}, {'_id': '3531809', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '3755975', 'reviewer_name': 'Helina', 'comments': "We had a great stay at Axel's.... If you want to see Rio in a different light.... then this is your place!  The view, of course,  is incredible and staying here is an experience we won't forget! Basic accomodation but perfect for the young adventurous traveller! Axel was very helpful with informing us on what to do in the city and how to get around. He also helped us with Carnvale tickets and took us to some great parties which we really appreciated. The place was full when we stayed which created a really nice atmosphere, would definately recommend to anyone visiting Rio! :) "}, {'_id': '3611333', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '2361059', 'reviewer_name': 'Melinda', 'comments': "Wow! Axel's casa is located in the beautiful Santa Teresa, with the most amazing views of Rio, day and night.  Axel is a wonderful host, particularly as I caused a few problems in arriving late and then being the victim of a robbery - Axel, unasked, loaned me money while I got myself sorted out, and was very caring.  His casa is only a hair-raising, death-defying 10 minute bus ride from the centre of Rio, so perfectly located.  The streets of Santa Teresa are beautiful, well worth walking around, and Axel's casa is within easy travelling distance of the tourist attractions of Cristo Redentor, Copacabana beach and all the city buildings.  Sadly, many of the buildings are closed for repair for World Cup 2014 and the Olympic Games 2016, but there is still plenty to see.

A little warning: Axel is currently undertaking renovations at his casa, so you must be prepared for some building work to go on around you - but all the guys are really friendly.  If you need 5-star quiet, your own everything and cleanliness - Axel's is not the place.  If, however, you want to see the real Rio, live in a favela (safety is not a problem), have a wonderful host and meet lots of people of all different nationalities (there were 5 different languages being spoken a few nights ago!!), then you will love Axel's casa.  Thank you Axel for a wonderful 10 days - I think your casa is fantastic and it will be absolutely wonderful when you have finished your renovation.  Melinda, Olinda, Australia"}, {'_id': '3770784', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 3, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '4104225', 'reviewer_name': 'Sandra', 'comments': "D'abord, la maison d'Axel est idéalement située. Dans les hauteurs de la ville (il faut aimer marcher!), après une journée dans la chaleur, la foule et le bruit, il est bon de s'y poser, au frais et au calme, avec une vue SPLENDIDE.
Un bémol toutefois: il faut s'habituer au survol des avions!
Ensuite, Axel est un hôte prévenant, à l'écoute et attentif à ce qu'on lui demande. En plus d'être un gentil hôte, il est également guide, et ses compétences professionnelles valent la peine d'être utilisées pour découvrir Rio autrement.
Nous précisons que nous sommes la première famille à aller passer un séjour chez lui. Nos enfants de 9 et 10 ans ont adoré, tout comme nous, ces réveils et ces soirées sur cette belle terrasse et dans cette pièce lumineuse et spacieuse, où colibris, papillons divers et même toucan - promis! passent de temps en temps.
Nous n'avons jamais eu peur ni ne nous sommes sentis en insécurité, ni chez Axel ni dans la favela!
Bref, c'est une adresse que nous recommandons à tout ceux qui aiment la nature... "}, {'_id': '3794607', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 3, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '4136408', 'reviewer_name': 'Marianne&Nicolas', 'comments': '"If you want to live something different and more authentic.." 
The first words of the apartment description perfectly describe our short stay in the casa 48.
The place is very well located, in Santa Teresa and the view is breathtaking.
Axel is a great host, with an excellent knowledge of Rio and he is always here to help you.
Highly recommended.
'}, {'_id': '3867503', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 3, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '4333875', 'reviewer_name': 'Malte', 'comments': "We had a very good time at Axel's Casa!

Besides, we had the opportunity to do a tour of two different favelas with him, and on another day he brought us to a beautiful, wild and natural beach in Rio from where we watched then an amazing sunset.  
I highly recommend to stay at the Casa 48, you will definitely not regret it. Staying in a favela was such an interesting and positive experience. We enjoyed living in an authentic way, close to local people, in the lovely Santa Teresa.

"}, {'_id': '4055388', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 4, 6, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '1749218', 'reviewer_name': 'Charlotte', 'comments': 'The other references just say it already!cant add anything, our stay at axels place was just perfect!!!cant imagine anything better...the most wonderful view of rio!!thanks so much axel!!'}, {'_id': '4087786', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 4, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '1284424', 'reviewer_name': 'Rebecca', 'comments': 'remarkable place. Très bonne ambiance entre les locataires, accueil impeccable et chaleureux. Loin de la plage mais excellentes liaisons de bus vers tout autre partie de la ville, aussi la nuit. Merci, Axel!!"}, {'_id': '4630577', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 5, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '5247314', 'reviewer_name': 'Sandra', 'comments': "It's a absolutely stunning view and a safe favela. '}, {'_id': '5883530', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 7, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '6196185', 'reviewer_name': 'Florence', 'comments': "Casa 48 est un lieu à part. Merci pour ces super moments et quand il y aura la piscine , pas sûr que l'on voudra en partir !"}, {'_id': '6781745', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 8, 25, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '221992', 'reviewer_name': 'Stephanie', 'comments': 'Hi Everyone!

First time in Rio and start my first days at the casa 48 was the best decision ever! Axel is a very kind ans sweet host. The view from the Casa 48 is so amazing! 
Axel always gives you very good and helpful tips to visit and spend good nights listening brazilian music, dancing and so on.... 
The favela is safe, I was feeling so good and people are very nice.

You have absolutely to visit  "Projetto Morrinho"! You can go from Axel House in the favela and also test the curry club organised by Tom (one of the roomates of Axel)  every wednesday at the Casa 48.

To sum up from a french woman who lives in Paris : not going to Axel House in Rio is the same as not going to visit Eiffel Tower or The Louvre Museum when you go to Paris!

So enjoy your stay guys! 

Pour nos compatriotes Français : merci l'émission Thalassa du 14/06/13!!!'}, {'_id': '7361041', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 9, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '451865', 'reviewer_name': 'Ourania', 'comments': "This was one of the best places I have ever stayed in, the view never disappoints and the apartment is really cool and spacious. Seriously if you're looking to stay and do something a little different than the usual touristy things stay here!! You'll gain some cool new experiences and be surrounded by great company. Axel provides us with heaps of cool info about the city and where to go what to do etc. santa Teresa it's self is a really beautiful suburb to stay In as well.

"}, {'_id': '7733704', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 10, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '4032638', 'reviewer_name': 'Pascal', 'comments': 'We spent an amazing week at Axel Home . The view from the apartment is even more beautiful than pictures. In addition, Axel allowed us to experience the real life of favelas. The apartment is ideally located for visiting Rio. Buses for center run every 10 minutes. Interaction and meetings with people passing by casa for a drink made the success of our stay. If you are looking for an idyllic place with all the comfort and tranquility, look for elsewhere. This house is coherent with its environment. If you want to feel a little "carioca", this is the right place.'}, {'_id': '8564144', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 11, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '8972522', 'reviewer_name': 'Ashleigh', 'comments': "I'm unsure how best to review this property. We really enjoyed our stay with Axel, him and the other housemates are very friendly and helpful, the view from the house was amazing and the favela it's in is very safe. However, we were disappointed to find out upon arrival that there was a lot of building work going on. Axel said he was unable to tell us as the internet wasn't working two days prior to our arrival but I don't understand why we were not told around the time we made the booking, we exchanged several emails and it was never mentioned. There was quite a lot of work going on so I doubt they expected it all to be finished. The building work meant that we were unable to use the main floor of the property or enjoy the terrace (we were allowed but it wasn't that enjoyable being surrounded by building tools and with the sounds of drilling or hammering in the background). It would have been nice to have been warned in advance or even to have been offerd a slight discount as it probably wasn't worth full rate in that condition. Otherwise though, the house was great, I'm sure it will be amazing when all the work is done. Our room was lovely, We especially enjoyed the full length window in front of the shower in the ensuite with the view over the city. The kitchen was quite basic and I saw a few mice but we were able to cook just fine, and they had most appliances we needed. Some mornings Axel made us breakfast which was a lovely touch. I would recommend this property but I would urge you to check that there is no building work going on first as I'm not sure if we would have stayed if we had known."}, {'_id': '8721238', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 11, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '9717224', 'reviewer_name': 'Sonia', 'comments': "Hôte super accueillant, disponible et de très bon conseils pour les visites. Vue imprenable sur Rio et le Pain de Sucre ! Quartier très sympa ! Très bonne caïpi d'accueil et confort de l'appartement (propre, spacieux, pratique ...) !
Le cocktail parfait pour un super séjour à Rio !"}, {'_id': '9079042', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 12, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '8385019', 'reviewer_name': 'Damien', 'comments': 'Bonjour chers futurs hôtes de la casa 48 (je l'espère pour vous), vous êtes en recherche d'une grande expérience carioca? Une expérience où quand vous rentrerez chez vous, vous en parlerez pendant des heures à vos amis? En y postant sur (Hidden by Airbnb) des photos incroyables? Et bien vous ne serez pas déçu par la Casa 48, où j'y ai passé 5 nuits très agréables. Je ne suis absolument pas d'accord avec les commentaires négatifs précédents, c'est sûr qu'en venant en haut d'une favela à un tel prix, il ne faut pas s'attendre à avoir un petit déjeuner 4 étoiles, sinon aller au Copacabana Palace. Celui était très correct, tout comme les sanitaires et la cuisine fonctionnelle. La WiFi fonctionne même mieux que chez moi. J'y ai passé un séjour très agréable, les travaux étaient minimes, l'accueil était chaleureux et sincère, Axel m'a donné pleins de bons plans et m'a permis de vivre une expérience inoubliable à Rio, grâce à ses conseils. Il s'est montré très disponible et toujours de bonne humeur. En plus, on y rencontre d'autres touristes et locaux, on y partage ses expériences. La vue est splendide sur le Pain de Sucre, l'accès est simple, le quartier est vivant - c'est le vrai Rio, loin du côté superficiel qu'offre d'autres quartiers - bien situé (bus en bas de la favela, ensuite 15 min de copacabana). Une expérience à vivre absolument ici, en toute humilité et simplicité. Vous ne serez pas déçu. Obrigado axel !

Hello dear future hosts of the casa 48 (hopefully for you) , are you ready for a great carioca's experience? An experience where when you get home , you talk for hours to your friends? By posting amazing pictures on (Hidden by Airbnb) ? Well, you will not be disappointed by the Casa 48 , where I spent 5 nights very pleasant. I'm not absolutely agree with the previous negative reviews, it is certain that from the top of a favela at this price , don't expect to have a "breakfast 4 stars" , otherwise go at the "Copacabana Palace" ! . He was very correct, like bathroom and kitchen. WiFi works even better than my home. I spend nice holidays here, build was very minimal, the welcome was warm and sincere , Axel gave me a lot of goods plans and allowed me to live an unforgettable experience in Rio , thanks to his advice. He was very helpful and always cheerful . In addition , we meet other tourists and locals , there sharing his experiences. Great views of the Pao Acuçar, access is simple. This is the real Rio , away from the side surface offered other neighborhoods - location ( bus down the favela then 15 minutes from copacabana ) . Absolutely an experience here , in all humility and simplicity. You will not be disappointed. Obrigado Axel !'}, {'_id': '9635768', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '707631', 'reviewer_name': 'Gerald', 'comments': 'The view in Axels hostel hostel was amazing! 
We loved the familiar atmosphere too!'}, {'_id': '10019534', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '8980809', 'reviewer_name': 'Anna', 'comments': "Casa 48 was exactly what I was looking for when searching a place to stay in Rio through airbnb. I lived ten days in Axel's place and had a great time. The house and the view (!) were exactly like in pictures. Axel and his housemates were friendly and helpful. The neighborhood was really nice and safe. Even as a single female traveller I never felt unsafety while walking down to the downtown (Laranjeiras district) through the favela. I cannot understand why so many travel guides recommend turist areas like Copacabana when you have options like this!"}, {'_id': '10089410', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 1, 30, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '6339137', 'reviewer_name': 'Michael', 'comments': "Staying at Axel's is a generational thing. As a Boomer, I was the oldest person in what I'd characterize as a youth hostel. If a hotel room cleaned by a maid, air conditioning, and personal privacy is your thing, Axel's casa probably isn't your gig.

However, the young people there couldn't have been nicer. Six or seven of us strolled down the street to a terrific restaurant in the Santa Teresa neighborhood. I would never have gone there own my own. I also took the public bus downtown, truly an experience not to be missed.

But the highlight was Valentin and one of the guests taking me down the steep hill into the favela. I felt perfectly safe, but for travelers who are skittish about poor neighborhoods, this may not be your preference. 

All in all, Axel's place is for hearty travelers who don't mind some inconveniences. If that's you, look forward to a great time. 



"}, {'_id': '11564067', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 4, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '332150', 'reviewer_id': '7723930', 'reviewer_name': 'Mélanie', 'comments': 'Beautiful point of view of Rio, in a relaxed and welcoming athmosphere. Casa 48 is indeed more than just a view. The ambiance is very relaxed and your can share great moments with the hosts and other guests if you want. Finally, Axel is an excellent guide who knows the city like the back of his hand and you will learn a lot if you decide to go on a tour with him. 

Overall a great experience for your stay in Rio. [{'_id': '1024960', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 3, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '1861557', 'reviewer_name': 'Luiz', 'comments': 'Great place!! Spectacular postcard view of Sugar Loaf Botafogo beach.The apartment is newly-renovated and air-conditioned .There is a shopping mall ,grocery stores,a great independent  movie theater, bookstores, and great cafes minutes from the building. The metro station is located just a few blocks away. Copacabana and Ipanema beaches are just a few stops away by bus or metro. You can actually walk to Copacabana and Urca ! Ana Amelia was  so responsive and worked with me to create a vacation with everything.She is very prompt on responding to requests and is extremely helpful.
'}, {'_id': '2483356', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 2, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '2636543', 'reviewer_name': 'Sophia', 'comments': 'Estou muito satisfeita com o atendimento e transparência com que fui tratada, tanto pela anfitriã ANA AMÉLIA como pelo site AIRBNB.
Tive inúmeros imprevistos durante a reserva do Flat, incluindo a necessidade de mudar a data de chegada até o cancelamento definitivo da minha viagem. Em todos eles, fui atendida com muito atencão, flexibilidade e consideracão por ambas as (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza indico!!! 
É nas horas em que as coisas não saem como planejamos que percebemos o quanto é importante tratar com pessoas competentes e honestas.
Muito Obrigada por tudo! E espero em breve fechar outras reservas!
Sophia'}, {'_id': '2600555', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '1420434', 'reviewer_name': 'K', 'comments': 'Ana was nice as well as Patricia, and the space is incredible.  Clean, bright, airy...with an absolutely perfect view.'}, {'_id': '2621712', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 10, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '3280378', 'reviewer_name': 'Beniamino', 'comments': 'This apartment is just incredible: it has a breathtaking view on the "pao de azucar", and even an hammock on which you can lay and watch the panorama. It is really as it seems on the photos, and probably even better. Moreover, Ana has been very kind, taking care of all my needs/requests. If I will ever come back to Rio, I hope I can stay here again.'}, {'_id': '2950195', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 11, 24, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '3634442', 'reviewer_name': 'Jacqueline', 'comments': "The apartment is charming and really does have a spectacular view from the 12th floor, is safe and does have very good air-conditioning!

The location in Botafogo was perfect for my trip which was for work so the easy access to the Metro and numerous buses was really helpful as we needed to be all over the city each day for meetings.

I was very impressed with Ana Amelia's efficiency in responding to my booking and various enquiries - this was appreciated. Also, Patricia her assistant was punctual for the handover of the keys despite the lateness of my arrival and she was also very helpful when I had any questions. Also, the reception staff were extremely nice and helpful too!

I really enjoyed my stay and have recommended it to a number of friends.

However, as it is important to provide a truthful review, it is fair to say that my only negative comment about the apartment is that the noise levels from the street below are very high due to the many lanes of traffic in front of the building but most significantly the windows are of extremely poor quality so there was never a quiet moment - the flat really does need secondary glazing.

Finally, many thanks for hosting us - it was a memorable trip!





"}, {'_id': '3042914', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '4148065', 'reviewer_name': 'Daniela', 'comments': "I spent a wonderful time in Ana's apartment. The view is really spectacular!  It is near the shopping,,10 minutes from Copacabana and 15 from Ipanema. You have every transportation you want at your door or pretty near.
Amelia and her assistant Patricia were really nice and cosy and if something is missing or if you need anything they  are very helpful."}, {'_id': '3117584', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 12, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '2703235', 'reviewer_name': 'Matt', 'comments': "We spent 11 days at Ana's apartment and agree it has to be the best view in Rio!  The location is great, especially if you want to spend time both in the south (at the famous beaches and Lagoa) and further north in the city centre seeing some of the cultural bits, as Botafogo is mid-way between them. In fact we did lots of walking (as far afield as the Jardim Botanico and to Urca for the Sugar Loaf cable car) and relied on the nearby Metro for our transport needs.

The apartment was clean, modern, safe and had all the facilities we needed including a great big fridge/freezer, coffee percolator, washing machine, huge wet-room style shower, wireless internet, and effective air conditioning which was especially welcome.  I'd agree about the noise of the 11 lanes of traffic, but the earplugs we brought with us meant we weren't disturbed.

Ana's list of local suggestions of shops, restaurants etc was a big help.  Highlights of our trip included a day trip by ferry to Niteroi, an afternoon at the brilliant exhibitions in the Paço Imperial, cycling round the Lagoa, a swish lunch at Confeitaria Colombo in town, the Saturday antiques market at Praça XV de Novembro (much better than the Sunday craft fair at Ipanema General Osorio) and of course plenty of relaxation with agua de coco and caipirinhas at Copacabana and Ipanema!

If we go back to Rio (which I hope we will) I'd be very happy to stay at Ana's place again."}, {'_id': '3537713', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '3684434', 'reviewer_name': 'Angela Maria', 'comments': 'Me encanto el apartamento, realmente una vista magnífica al pao de acucar! The apartment was well equipped but not at all cluttered - I hope we will be able to return in future years."}, {'_id': '5799297', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 7, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '6848418', 'reviewer_name': 'Chris', 'comments': 'The reservation was canceled 341 days before arrival. It's just what I needed. 

The apartment is very well equipped and I was able to cook and do everything else. The living room area is really nice and the cable television has channels in English available. The kitchen is easy to cook in and the oven, etc, work perfectly. The washing machine was also very helpful!

Ana's assistant greeted me when I arrived because Ana wasn't available. She explained everything and was always available by phone in case of a problem. 

I would definitely book this place without hesitating if I have to go back to Rio again! "}, {'_id': '8825358', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 11, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '9865643', 'reviewer_name': 'Juan', 'comments': 'We stayed in this apartment 6 days and, summarizing, it was better than we expected.

A vista das janelas é maravilhosa e a localização é perfeita: o bairro não é muito lindo, mas tem mercados, botecos, a praia é em frente e é facilmente acessível. Passamos um fim de semana muito lindo. Obrigada por tudo Amelia Ana e Patricia! Esperamos voltar em breve.'}, {'_id': '13830183', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 5, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '4287471', 'reviewer_name': 'Marine', 'comments': "The flat is spacious, with a beautiful view indeed. It is ideally located for those who want to see more than Rio's beaches, with good transport links anywhere in town and the airports. Being so central, the flat is a bit noisy; I was pleasantly surprised to see how quickly I got used to the city hum. Thanks very much !"}, {'_id': '14155707', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 6, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '15194205', 'reviewer_name': 'Jaime', 'comments': 'Even though I didn´t meet Ana, she was always in communication with us through Paty, her assistant; they were very accommodating with us and Paty gave us some great advices about the city.

The apartment is nice and it was very clean, you have everything you need. The best thing about this place is the view, it is really amazing. If I come back to Rio, I definitely will consider this place to stay again.

¡I recommend this place to anyone that want to visit Rio!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Aunque no conocí a Ana, ella siempre estaba en comunicación con nosotros a través de Paty, su asistente; ellas siempre estuvieron al pendiente de nosotros y Paty nos dio buenos consejos sobre la ciudad. 

El apartamento es agradable y estaba muy limpio, tiene todo lo que necesita. Lo mejor de este lugar es la vista, es realmente increíble. Si regreso a Río, definitivamente consideraré este lugar para quedarme de nuevo. 

¡Recomiendo este lugar a cualquiera que quiera visitar Rio!'}, {'_id': '15391589', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 8, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '13320557', 'reviewer_name': 'Jane', 'comments': 'This apartment has a gorgeous view,  but it is located right above a very busy road. Beware of constant noise, day and night. Place is cute and conveniently located. It was easy to grab a taxi and close to metro.  Unfortunately Ana Amelia was away. Her helper, the girl who opened the flat for us, did not speak English and was not helpful at all. The TV did not work and we could not reach her for any assistance for 5 days.'}, {'_id': '15946939', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '11833290', 'reviewer_name': 'Shura', 'comments': "The apartment has great views! Whilst a lot of the previous comments provided by other tenants mentioned the noise issue, my husband and I were not too disturbed by the noise. The apartment is also very spacious which was definitely a plus point! 

Upon our arrival we were greeted by Anna's assistant, Laura. Whilst Laura was very helpful, she did not speak English too well so there were a lot of things about the apartment that was left unexplained. 

Our stay was generally great with some water interruption occurring towards the end. Notwithstanding, Anna was always prompt in replying to is when there were interruptions. Furthermore, Anna kindly compensated the shortcomings by provisioning the taxi transport to the airport (which was a very nice gesture!)

In summary, my husband and I were in Rio for 8 days and thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Anna's apartment.

"}, {'_id': '16151099', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '5437333', 'reviewer_name': 'Laure', 'comments': "One Word: LOCATION!
The flat is in a very central and nice area of Rio and the view is even more incredible than in the pictures.
As some other visitors mentioned, it is a bit noisy (because of the cars) day & night... so bring your earplugs!
But honestly, the view is really worth it!
We haven't met Ana Amelia but Laura for check in / check out. No problems with that, it all went smoothly at the times that were planned.

Overall, very good flat for a stay in Rio with everything you will need (and even a very nice juice bar downstairs)! "}, {'_id': '20160474', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 9, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '7289216', 'reviewer_name': 'Fiona', 'comments': "Ana's apartment indeed has a breathtaking view - and this is a source of constant pleasure. The sun rise is particularly stunning!  It is a bit noisy - the road outside is really busy most of the day and night - but it was surprising how quickly one gets used to it with the windows shut. The place was beautifully clean and equipped with anything you could want. The bed is comfortable and the shower powerful and large.  There is A/C and a fan and good wireless. Ana and her assistant Laura could not have been more helpful, and were quick to respond to questions. The juice bar on the corner beneath the apartment is a must - try the Mango juice but remember to ask for no sugar!"}, {'_id': '21301256', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 10, 14, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '3412387', 'reviewer_name': 'Anna', 'comments': "Ana Amelia's apartment is very nice and modern and, as promised in the description, it really is the most beautiful view in Rio. It's easy to get metro, bus, taxi from there. "}, {'_id': '22482798', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '12325736', 'reviewer_name': 'Julie', 'comments': "Arrived at the apartment and greeted by the lovely Ana and her assistant Lara. Yes there is traffic noise but ear plugs did the job and we got used to it after a few days. Ideal position for the metro and buses, but taxi rides really cheap so used those at night for safety. Shopping mall close by and great restaurants. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this apartment."}, {'_id': '22926923', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 17, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '22839133', 'reviewer_name': 'Vinicius', 'comments': 'Um belo apartamento, bem localizado, simples, funcional e confortável. '}, {'_id': '23402926', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 11, 30, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '19640441', 'reviewer_name': 'Anil', 'comments': 'Ana Amelia`s apartment was really great. Everthing was ready in the aparment for us to stay in comfort. The location was great. Very easy to reach by public transportation. Close to Lapa and Beaches as well. Don`t think twice this apartment is simply great and  will meet your expectation in every aspects. Thanks Ana and Lara.'}, {'_id': '24620274', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 31, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '2694418', 'reviewer_name': 'Emmanuel', 'comments': 'Exceptional flat with an incredible view over the famous "Pão de Açúcar". Very bright and clean . A nice vintage deck chair, from which you see only the Pao de Acucar. Aircondition works very well.
What a pity you cannot swim in the sea from the nice Botofago beach in front of the house, which is poluted and that you have to take a bus or taxi to go to Cocapabana.
Food shop is a little too far (15mn walk), even for bying a bottle of water. Very few restaurants in the aera. Nevertheless a very nice place to spend a few days.'}, {'_id': '25034884', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 1, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '2801332', 'reviewer_name': 'Michelle', 'comments': 'Ótimo apartamento. Bem localizado, boas acomodações, limpo e atendimento muito receptivo. A vista merece um comentário à parte, pois é realmente uma das mais bonitas do Rio de Janeiro. Super indico.'}, {'_id': '26310044', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '25908457', 'reviewer_name': 'Felipe', 'comments': 'I will break this review into three items - the unit, location, and assistance.  

The Unit:
The view is amazing, the unit is very spacious, the bed is comfortable, the AC works great, and all appliances work well - it has everything you will need (pots, pans, glasses, silverware, etc.). 
The noisy traffic outside did not bother specially after closing the  windows. 

Location:
The location is great, just outside the entrance there are two juice bars and a "padaria" (deli).  It's also close to banks and a 3-minute walk to the Botafogo Praia Shopping.  
It's about a 5-10 minute walk to the subway, there is a bus stop nearby, and there are cabs driving by all the time (to get an idea there are 33,000+ cabs in Rio which is more than twice the number of cabs in NYC).

Assistance:
I had a few questions while I was there and Ana always responded promptly and ready to help.   Laura (the assistant that met with us to turn in the keys) was very nice and always on time - for getting us the key she was in the apartment at least 30 minutes earlier, and to turn in the apartment she was 10 minutes early. 

Overall, I strongly recommend to anyone that wants to visit Rio!

'}, {'_id': '26816434', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '24400038', 'reviewer_name': 'Shamini', 'comments': 'Host was very welcoming. When we come back next year will definitely stay here again! ☺️'}, {'_id': '28433523', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '28934933', 'reviewer_name': 'Niklas', 'comments': 'The apartment was as indicated in the app, clean, modern, and tastefully decorated. Équipement sommaire mais le nécessaire est là (draps, serviettes de toilette, ustensiles de cuisine, eau).
La vue sur le pain de sucre est saisissante et vaut à elle seule que l'on choisisse cet appartement.
Seul bémol: le bruit (important trafic au pied de l'immeuble)= boules quies obligatoires, à prévoir.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Ana Amelia durant notre séjour, les check in et check out ont été réalisés par deux jeunes filles très gentilles mais dont l'une ne parlait pas anglais.
Immeuble sécurisé (gardien 24h/24).
Emplacement idéal (moins de 10min à pied du métro, arrêt de bus au pied de l'immeuble, quartier populaire très agréable).
En somme, très bon séjour, appartement à recommander.
"}, {'_id': '56440747', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 13, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '336569', 'reviewer_id': '12242731', 'reviewer_name': 'Niles', 'comments': 'The host was accommodating and the description was accurate.

Obrigada por nos confiar seu espaço. Essa é a segunda vez que ficamos lá e, por ser tão perto dos Arcos da Lapa, é super prático ficar no apartamento. Vamos voltar sempre que precisarmos ficar pelo Centro. Muito obrigada.'}, {'_id': '352509297', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 11, 25, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3374964', 'reviewer_id': '199881035', 'reviewer_name': 'Boteco', 'comments': 'Ótima localização, o apartamento tem o necessário para uma estadía confortável, e uma boa relação calidade preço.'}, {'_id': '366856830', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3374964', 'reviewer_id': '49259646', 'reviewer_name': 'Camila', 'comments': 'Havíamos fechado a hospedagem para o Réveillon em Março, então tínhamos uma grande expectativa quanto à essa viagem. 
O apartamento não parecia que tinha sido limpo, haviam muitas formigas em cima da geladeira e o congelador estava muito sujo. No banheiro não havia luz e na sala também não. 
As paredes do quarto maior estavam muito sujas, não dava vontade de encostar na parede pra dormir. O colchão de casal estava manchado, amarelado. O mesmo aconteceu com os travesseiros. 
Várias tomadas estavam folgadas e não conectavam direito. 
Mas o ponto alto do descontentamento foi a máquina de lavar. No anúncio consta a possibilidade de lavar roupas, o que se torna um grande atrativo para um grupo de 5 pessoas. Mas a máquina estava suja, completamente preta por dentro. Havia resto de sabão e água. 
Fiquei bastante surpresa com estes problemas pois não havia nenhuma reclamação deste tipo nas avaliações. O apartamento precisa de limpeza e de algumas reformas.'}]

She also provided me with tourist guide which had all the details of the places to visit in Rio along with the best way to explore each one of them. Atlantica), at posto 4, it is so convenient for beach, jogging, restaurants, bars and super markets. Can pretty much walk anywhere in Copacabana neighborhood from the place.
As other reviewers pointed out, the guest has a separate bathroom (not en-suite), so never had conflict using toilet or shower.
Ane allowed me to use the kitchen where I cooked my breakfast and some dinner during my stay. It's also very helpful that I could use the washer, otherwise I could've ran out of clothes in a few days due to either the heat or the rain.
There were two things to watch out: 1. The internet speed is slow, less than 1M I think. Can do web surfing and (Hidden by Airbnb) , but big download or video streaming is almost impossible. 2. The air con makes all kinds of noise, light sleepers need ear plugs for sure.
"}, {'_id': '65119429', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '369336', 'reviewer_id': '61696431', 'reviewer_name': 'Fernando', 'comments': 'Realmente muito tranquilo e acolhedor o apartamento da Ane.
