This was not a problem though and I got in to the apartment quickly. The place is nice and clean and just like the photos. Great location. I stated three people were staying but only received two towels. This was fixed after a couple of days though.'}, {'_id': '75580513', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 5, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3800450', 'reviewer_id': '14927861', 'reviewer_name': 'Persival', 'comments': 'Everything was good, great location, good service and a clean place'}, {'_id': '80007492', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3800450', 'reviewer_id': '34004223', 'reviewer_name': 'Joel', 'comments': 'If you are looking for a very clean and functional apartment in a location near to the beach, restaurants, the Hippie Fair, and the metro and bus stations, you cannot possibly find a better one that this apartment.  It is exactly as described online and as shown in the photographs.  I have rented several apartments in the Ipanema area and this was by far the best one with the greatest location.  It is within a few steps of all public transportation and a myriad of great and reasonably priced restaurants.  Best of all, the owner, Carolina, is extraordinarily gracious and responsive.  Any small issue will be resolved to your satisfaction immediately.  I already have rebooked for next year at this time.  The only mistake you could make with this apartment is not renting it if you want a place in Ipanema for 2 or 3 people   It has a queen size bed in the bedroom and a sofa that pulls out into a separate bed in the living room.  Most importantly for someone like me, the wifi is particular fast and strong and always working.  You can walk to the beach in less than three minutes.  There is a supermarket about 200 meters away.  The Hippie Fair in General Osorio Square is directly across the street.  But there is absolutely no street noise as the apartment faces towards the sea and not the Square.  There is no security concern because the apartment is in a condominium building with a reception desk that is staffed 24 hours per day.  And while none of these folks speaks one word of English, they try their best to be of assistance in the rare situation where you might need something.   In addition, this apartment offers the unique plus of having daily maid service during the weekdays.  These people are extremely nice and efficient.  They clean the bathroom, throw out the garbage, and mop the floors and make the bed.  A really nice convenience!  Trust me, if you stay here you will love it.  '}, {'_id': '85413937', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 7, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3800450', 'reviewer_id': '6653771', 'reviewer_name': 'Alfredo Mariano', 'comments': 'Excelente estadía. Disfruté mucho éste viaje a Rio.

The apartment itself was very comfortable, and we enjoyed the space.  The communication with Fabi was excellent, thanks again for hosting us!"}, {'_id': '368201782', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 6, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3800450', 'reviewer_id': '1132121', 'reviewer_name': 'Robert', 'comments': "This was absolutely the worst Airbnb I have ever experienced -- it was a complete horror story. As someone who has stayed at many Airbnbs, all over the world, without any issues, and as a former Airbnb Superhost, I would strongly discourage people from staying here unless significant remediations are made. Even though there are many positive reviews, it's just not worth the risk.

- Security issues. A friend, who could have been anyone, walked up to the building's front desk, said the apartment number (without providing my or his name), and was handed my apartment key, no questions asked. The front desk did not ask for ID or try to contact me. When I told the host about this incident, she responded by suggesting I was lying. It was extremely concerning and uncomfortable, especially given the crime in Rio.

- Safety issues. The elevator broke down while I was inside it (coincidentally, only hours before midnight on New Year's Eve). We called for help using the in-phone elevator only to be connected with the front desk staff that was unable to provide any comprehensible instructions for how to exit. This was not a language issue; they just couldn’t say anything other than “a call was made to the elevator company.”  After several minutes, I was able to figure out, without their help, how to open a manual latch hidden above the door and jump up to safety (elevator was stuck mid-floor). Throughout my stay, one of the two elevators was often out of service. I have photos that show this. After my stay, rather than offer any refund, the host complained about needing to replace the elevator phone, which was broken out of panic, but not by me, but by someone else in the broken elevator during the incident (there is video evidence of this).

- Water issues. Only two of us were staying at the Airbnb, yet we regularly ran out of hot water when taking showers. The host responded by saying, since it's hot in Rio, people don't take showers with hot water.” This is not only false (friends staying at other Airbnbs had hot water just fine), but also totally unacceptable for an Airbnb at this price.

- AC issues. The bedroom air conditioner does not properly modulate temperature, so it is either extremely cold or extremely hot (despite changing the temperature on the remote control). When I told the host about this issue, she responded just by saying the AC was new and that couldn’t be the case.

- Linen issues. Several linens were soiled when I arrived. The mattress cover had rips and stains, the mattress was dirty, and there were no pillow protectors. I have photos that show this. When I told the host, she responded by telling me I was lying and that I caused these problems.

- Other minor nuisances (that I normally wouldn’t even bother to mention, and would still give 5 stars in spite of, but will note in the context of the other above problems): Electrical issues - multiple outlets did not work properly. The hair dryer broke after 10 seconds of use. Wi-fi went down during my stay. Given all of the other major issues and the rude and unhelpful responses from the host, I did not even bother bringing these other issues to her attention.

- Host. It should now go without saying that the host was both rude and unhelpful. Rather than offer any level of refund, apologize, or even just offer helpful solutions, the host generally responded to my concerns by claiming I was lying.

I strongly discourage you from staying here. There are other Airbnbs in the area that are safer and have significantly better value. Again, it's just not worth the risk."}, {'_id': '400256149', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3800450', 'reviewer_id': '111729612', 'reviewer_name': 'Gonzalo', 'comments': 'Excelente lugar, cómodo, súper limpio y cerca de todo. La disposición del espacio es óptima y cuentan con servicio de limpieza'}, {'_id': '405658518', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3800450', 'reviewer_id': '50404584', 'reviewer_name': 'German', 'comments': 'Very good apartment. Safe, clean, quiet and cozy. It has everything you’ll need for the every day life.
WiFi is very good!
Will be considered whenever I come back to Rio'}]

[{'_id': '21908142', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 10, 26, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '1283202', 'reviewer_name': 'Tomas', 'comments': 'Muy bueno todo! Jan muy buen anfitrión! :)'}, {'_id': '24080705', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '54968', 'reviewer_name': 'Natalie', 'comments': "This apartment is amazing!  It is very modern and extremely clean.  The bed is super comfortable, the bathroom is large and ultra luxe, the wifi as fast as we anything we have in our own apartment in NYC, and the kitchen / dining area much bigger than it looks in the photos.  

The location is absolutely perfect, right in the hippest part of Ipanema -- 2 blocks from the best part of the beach, surrounded by amazing shopping (the Louis Vuitton store is 1/2 block away along with plenty of more within-reach brands), with both a large grocery store and fabulous bodega (try the baked goods!) on the corner, and only a 5 min walk to the metro & main square at General Osorio not to mention plenty of fast city bus lines running right in front.  Oh -- and the apartment has a view of the Christ statue!  

For city & beach lovers, this place really couldn't be more perfect. 

Plus, the owners were super helpful to us through the entire process.  Jan was out of town when we visited, but his colleague Pedro couldn't have been lovelier.  Our shuttle into town got stuck in horrible traffic, forcing Pedro to wait almost two hours for us.  But he was upbeat and gracious and so welcoming.  Then when we accidentally locked our valuables in the safe (be sure to press the reset button - doh) he made two separate trips to the apartment to work out the master key.  

Seriously, this apartment is like a luxury hotel, for a fraction of the price.  I can't recommend it enough.  Thank you, Pedro & Jan!!"}, {'_id': '24225579', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '6621874', 'reviewer_name': 'Philippe', 'comments': "Accueil très chaleureux de notre hôte qui s'est rendu disponible, d'autant que nous sommes arrivés à l'appartement plus tôt que prévu, ayant récupéré très rapidement nos bagages à l'aéroport et n'ayant pas eu de trafic sur le chemin nous menant de l'aéroport à Ipanéma.
L'appartement est très confortable et idéalement situé, à la fois dans une artère commerçante et à 5 minutes à pied de la plage d'Ipanéma.
La description sur le site correspond exactement à la réalité."}, {'_id': '24821420', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '22455186', 'reviewer_name': 'Luís', 'comments': "We loved staying at Pedro's place. '}, {'_id': '31871367', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '26130557', 'reviewer_name': 'Stephanie', 'comments': 'This studio was perfect.  Jan was out of town so Lordes met us upon arrival. While there was a bit of a language barrier everything worked out, she was super sweet and tried her best explaining things with our limited portuguese.   Despite Jan being out of town, he was quick to respond to all our messages and inquiries about our stay.  We were able to do a late check out on the day we were leaving which was nice since our flight did not leave until 9pm.    

The studio was exactly as pictured on the website.  The location could not have been better.  The building and location felt very safe at all times.  The 24 hour doorman was nice.  There were tons of restaurants, bars, shops, etc. within walking distance.  The metro was just a few blocks away, we only took it once to the Centro but it was nice to have it so close.   We went to the fruit/veggie market and the sunday Hippie market, both awesome.  Tried Nectar for breakfast/lunch, delicious lunch plates.  One of our favs was on the beach, Posto 9 at the Uruguay flag, the carne sandwich, so good.  

I can not wait to visit Rio again, it was such an amazing city.  I would def stay at this studio apartment again if it is available!  '}, {'_id': '32263323', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '12366239', 'reviewer_name': 'Mehdi', 'comments': 'Jan was always available and answered to my emails very quickly. The flat is very well located. The flat is perfect, modern and clear. Plus, there is a guard at the entrance of the building for more safety.'}, {'_id': '34051115', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 4, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '10535482', 'reviewer_name': 'Adrianna', 'comments': "Had a great stay at this wonderful apartment in Ipanema.

Check-in went absolutely smoothly with both Jan and Pedro being at the apartment to let us in, show us around, and give recommendations on what to eat and where to go. They are wonderful people! 

The location is absolutely perfect - on busy Rua Visconde de Piraja with tons of shops and trendy restaurants and cafes around. The best part of Ipanema beach is 2 blocks away. The area is very safe and there is a 24 hour doorman (at least one of whom speaks English, if you need help and aren't great with Portuguese) around. 

The apartment itself is clean and modern and has everything you could need!

Would stay here again when I visit Rio next! Highly recommend!"}, {'_id': '34702756', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '23499938', 'reviewer_name': 'Marcelo', 'comments': 'A experiência no RJ foi incrível, grande parte pela localização do apartamento. Existe toda a infra-estrutura ao redor com supermercado, padaria, farmácia, etc e vc faz tudo a pé na região. 

Fomos a  praia de Ipanema e a lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas varias vezes e nos sentimos bem seguros.

Definitivamente voltaríamos a nos hospedar neste apartamento.'}, {'_id': '35774131', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '1617563', 'reviewer_name': 'Flávia', 'comments': 'Adoramos o apartamento em todos os sentidos.

Muitas coisas é possível se fazer andando e caso precise de transporte público, não tem o que reclamar também.
 O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos (até maior do que esperávamos): confortável, limpo e super aconchegante. 
Há porteiro 24 horas.
O Jan é uma simpatia de anfitrião, tanto ele como o Pedro (que iria nos receber mas devido a atrasos de voos, não tivemos a oportunidade de conhecê-lo ao vivo). Foram muito solícitos e atenderam todos os nossos pedidos.

O apartamento está muito sujo. Não sujeira aparente, mas falta mais ventilação e arejamento. Eu e minha esposa tivemos muitos problemas alérgicos por conta dos travesseiros, roupa de cama e colchão. A cozinha cheirava a urina. Não poder utilizar o A/C quando o chuveiro estivesse ligado também não constava da informação prévia. Só se descobre estando no apartamento. Numa cidade quente como o Rio, esse ponto ganha importância.'}, {'_id': '37495732', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '832489', 'reviewer_name': 'Julio', 'comments': 'We love, love, loved our trip to Rio! The apt. even has a great view of the Cristo, we were so surprised, looks beautiful lit up at night. :) Jan was a great host & very responsive, he even provided great advice on all types of activities. We love Rio, listened to live music & danced every night. We will definitely be coming back! Thanks for making this such a great experience Jan! '}, {'_id': '40075724', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 28, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '3971325', 'reviewer_id': '6083110', 'reviewer_name': 'Carlos', 'comments': "What a place! Apos entregar o apartamento, assim que saiu, ocorreu um curto circuito no apartamento e ficamos sem energia por quase 6hrs até tudo se reestabelecer, infelizmente acabei perdendo meu compromisso aguardando resolução do problema. Após isso, passamos por 2 dias mais frios e nublados no RJ e infelizmente o chuveiro (que funciona de acordo com aquecimento central por caldeira) não esquentava (tivemos que tomar banho beem frio nesses dois dias). Contatei o Pedro perguntando sobre a possibilidade de fazer uso do chuveiro eletrico e o mesmo me afirmou que este não funcionava, que nunca ninguem havia falado sobre o chuveiro não esquentar (mesmo tendo mais de 2 hospedes abordando isso nas avaliações) e novamente foi rude falando que o chuveiro poderia não estar tão quente quanto eu gostaria (a agua estava gelada!).
Enfim, o apartamento tem uma localização excelente, porteiros muuito simpáticos. [{'_id': '364801098', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 12, 31, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4074453', 'reviewer_id': '183358458', 'reviewer_name': 'Shantell', 'comments': 'Hilda’s place looks just like the pictures! So cute and well decorated. You can tell they took the time when remodeling. Check in process was fairly easy. Hilda’s husband was there to show us how everything works, get papers signed, and collect the R $500 security deposit. The only downside to this place was the bed. It was very hard and uncomfortable. Luckily my boyfriend is in the military and is used to sleeping on the ground so he took the bed and I took the futon. The futon wasn’t good for 2 people either, but was fine for just me. There were plenty of towels and pillows for us. The location was outstanding!! We ate breakfast lunch and dinner every day at a different restaurant, all within walking distance. And the famous colorful tile steps you see online are also only a couple blocks away! That made it easy to get there early and get some pics before the crowds showed up. Security in the building was good. We never felt unsafe. Lapa is a party town! The streets get noisy at night but we were able to tune it out or would just go join the party! If you wanna be in the happening spot, look no further!'}]

[{'_id': '96343826', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 22, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4088691', 'reviewer_id': '23214817', 'reviewer_name': 'Olga', 'comments': "We stayed in Francesco's apartment for 20 days in August with my colleague during Olympic Games 2016 in Rio. I still feel that we were really lucky to stay at his place because:
- great apartment, very cozy, comfortable and clean, with enough space for two people to live and have rest together or separated, independent bathrooms and bedrooms 
- good neighborhood - just 6 mins from Copacabana and at the same time out of touristic crowds and noise, quite family building 
- in addition in the same building we found local supermarket where from the early morning you can buy fresh baked bread, croissants, orange juice and whatever
- Francesco was always in touch with us in case of questions, fast in replies and speaking fluent English which is important in Brazil)
- Francesco recommended us interesting places around and surfing instructor which made our staying much better
- of course, hammock forever)

Although it lacked face-to-face contact we felt welkome and at home."}, {'_id': '58164825', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 1, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4773338', 'reviewer_id': '9602007', 'reviewer_name': 'Vanessa', 'comments': "Well-located and safe flat. Friendly host that we met after our arrival. However, a few major disappointments related to the flat's features. 
The flat is stated to be for 6 people, however it is fit for no more than 4 people. There is one double bedroom with no mattress (and very hard bedspring). A second room can be made out of the living room by closing a metallic partition and consists of a couch which extends to two single mattresses on different levels. 2 additional people are supposed to sleep in a minuscule room the size of a closet, with barely enough space for two extremely unhealthy mattresses on the floor. This place is set apart from the rest of the apartment, accessible behind the kitchen, and more likely to be a laundry room than a bedroom.
We were 5, and one of us was obliged to sleep on the couch and to buy a fan for the nights (no AC in the living room once the partition is closed).

Moreover, as soon as it started raining, the open areas from the ACs began to leak inside the house"}, {'_id': '61997334', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4773338', 'reviewer_id': '35493233', 'reviewer_name': 'Kátia', 'comments': 'A localização do apartamento é muito boa. [{'_id': '61461612', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '52505691', 'reviewer_name': 'Bruna', 'comments': 'This apartment is awsome! It is perfect for a couple! Cozy, clean and functional.
The location is also great: you can go to Copacabana Beach or Ipanema walking, the metro station is also a few blocks away, there are plenty of restaurants, bars, supermarkets and drugstores around.
And finnaly, the owners, Fabio and Lianne are super cool people!'}, {'_id': '67216519', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '470675', 'reviewer_name': 'Edna Luise', 'comments': "This apartment is at a great location and very homey. Perfect for our four night stay and awesome starting point for various city walks into different directions! We haven't met Lianne or Fabio in person but they were super responsive and we felt very well taken care of before and during our stay."}, {'_id': '70433064', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 4, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '3083553', 'reviewer_name': 'Nacarino', 'comments': 'My stay in this apartment was really great! The place makes you feel at home. it has a great energy, a lot of light, windows, and of course, the location is perfect! Its a few blocks from both beaches: Copacabana and Ipanema, and close to the metro as well. Fabio and Lianne were very helpful and very responsive, great hosts. I really enjoyed my time there and would love to go back and spend more time!'}, {'_id': '79056988', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '4805396', 'reviewer_name': 'Tim', 'comments': "Lianne and Fábio are super responsive and welcoming. They have a great local guidebook and are located in the heart of Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. Literally a two block walk to a morning swim!

Their place is super cute, bright with light, spacious, and quiet as it faces away from the street. And, it's a REAL home with soft lighting (not some harsh overhead fluorescent).

I love to eat out when traveling but sometimes it's nice just to stay in and cook. There are multiple grocery stores within three blocks; two Zona Sul supermarkets and a bodega just around the corner.

The neighborhood feels super safe, there are a lot of people, old and young alike, and it's about six blocks to the subway which will take you to downtown in 30m--faster and cheaper than a taxi or uber in Rio's crazy traffic.

Overall their place is a great value in a beautiful location and a wonderful home with awesome hosts. 

Definitely recommending them!"}, {'_id': '80309029', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '4805396', 'reviewer_name': 'Tim', 'comments': 'So good, we booked it again as our travels evolved!'}, {'_id': '125382160', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '1997619', 'reviewer_name': 'Antonio', 'comments': "We had a lovely time at Fabio and Lianne's flat. The flat couldn't be better located, 2 blocks from Copacabana beach and 5 blocks from Ipanema beach. Loads of nice restaurants and shops around. They were very good at communicating and were great hosts. Highly recommended. "}, {'_id': '148415999', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 4, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4776811', 'reviewer_id': '48781056', 'reviewer_name': 'Maia', 'comments': "Lianne and Fabio are amazing hosts, communication couldn’t have been easier! The listing is exactly as described, and the flat is beautiful, light, and clean. It's literally in the middle of Copacabana/Ipanema and a stone's throw away to amazing beaches. The neighborhood is calm but there are a lot of restaurants/ grocery stores/ bars around too. (They also have have great guidebooks available for guests). The flat feels like a real home, faces away from the street, and is a great place to stay. It has all the amenities you might need for a vacation or business trip. Loved my stay here and definitely recommend it!"}]

[{'_id': '26738016', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 18, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4790136', 'reviewer_id': '18477340', 'reviewer_name': 'Carolina', 'comments': 'A Beth é uma ótima anfitriã. Super simpática, acessível e preocupada.
O apartamento é muito bom. Está localizado na melhor região do Leblon (baixo Leblon) ao lado de restaurantes, bares famosos (Jobi, Veloso, Pizzaria Guanabara) e padaria (Talho Capixaba).
Fica a duas quadras da praia, na altura do Posto 12.
O apartamento é reformado, bem decorado e tem ar condicionado em todos os cômodos.
Uma experiência maravilhosa. Unit was as shown in picture.'}, {'_id': '33004288', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4790136', 'reviewer_id': '32038842', 'reviewer_name': 'Dayane', 'comments': 'Recomendo mesmo se hospedar neste apto no Leblon. Roupas de cama e banho limpas e perfumadas. A localização é excelente, bem perto de ótimo comércio, restaurantes e bares tradicionais como Pizzaria Guanabara, Jobi e Diagonal. Muito perto de um trecho da praia que é tranquilo, limpo e seguro. 
Realmente foram dias especiais com minha família, e todos já falam em voltar em breve. 
Como carioca, que mora em outro estado, posso garantir que o apartamento e a localização são ideais para quem quer a experiência de viver o melhor do Rio. 
E a Beth é ótima, sempre disponível, solícita e simpática. Foi muito gentil em deixar uma cesta com coisas gostosas para o lanche e também um bolo delicioso, pois sabia que era aniversário da minha filha. Adoramos esta delicadeza. '}, {'_id': '124958689', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4790136', 'reviewer_id': '3219266', 'reviewer_name': 'Rocio', 'comments': 'El departamento está muy bien ubicado, a dos cuadras del puesto 12 en la playa de Leblon y a menos de 50 mts de la calle principal (donde se encuentran los restaurantes y bares más lindos de la zona). 
Tiene una cocina muy bien equipada, con todo lo necesario para cocinar. Dos baños, un lavadero y dos habitaciones. Todo el departamento tiene aire acondicionado y wifi funcionando a la perfección. 
Cuando llegamos teníamos armado en el baño shampoo, jabón, cepillos de dientes y pasta dental y en La Cocina nos habían dejado snacks y cosas dulces.
Las camas son muy cómodas y está todo muy limpio y confortable. 
Nos recibió Eliomar, el portero del edificio, quien fue muy amable y estuvo a nuestra disposición todo el tiempo. 
Beth fue una excelente anfitriona, nos comunicamos mucho por (Hidden by Airbnb) y siempre estuvo dispuesta a ayudarnos en lo que necesitáramos. 
Sin duda volvería! Bem localizado: bares, restaurantes, farmácia, praia, ciclo via, shopping, tudo a pé.
Excelente para solteiros e família. 
Recomendo muito. Todas as estrelas.'}, {'_id': '224146626', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 1, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4790136', 'reviewer_id': '9892273', 'reviewer_name': 'Amanda', 'comments': "Do yourself a favor and stay here, honestly. Here's why:

1) The location of this apartment is one of the best in Rio. It is close to fabulous restaurants, bars, and one of the most beautiful beaches in the city. It is also very safe, walkable, and family-friendly. On top of all of this, it is only a short (~7min) walk to the metro. I cannot imagine staying in a better location!

2) The apartment is beautiful, spacious, and has everything you need! Beth went above and beyond to make sure we had additional amenities like snacks, toiletries, linens, and towels. We were incredibly comfortable and were even able to do laundry during our stay.

3) Beth is an extremely attentive host and does everything she can to make her guests feel comfortable and prepared. She always responded immediately to my messages and accommodated our request for a late check-out. The building manager met us upon our arrival and helped us carry our bags to the apartment. He also gave us a tour and told us what we needed to know to fully utilize the space. 

In summary, it was a five-star hotel experience!

I truly cannot recommend staying here enough. I've stayed at Air BnB's all over the place and this was my best experience yet! [{'_id': '124269969', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 1, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4798749', 'reviewer_id': '72949325', 'reviewer_name': 'Hadama', 'comments': 'Nosso anfitrião que no caso foi a Roberta e sua mãe, foram ótimas e atenciosas, nos recepcionaram super bem.
o apartamento era ótimo, melhor do que nas fotos .
No geral tudo perfeito. '}, {'_id': '132359847', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 2, 17, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4798749', 'reviewer_id': '19100223', 'reviewer_name': 'Frederico Maia', 'comments': 'O apartamento é amplo e arejado. Trabalho home office e o ar condicionado e WIFI, que eram muito importantes, funcionaram bem. Para um período mais longo a geladeira é pequena mas para curtas temporadas atende sem problemas. Sempre que precisamos os anfitriões foram bastante atenciosos para resolver quaisquer problemas. Não tivemos contato com a anfitriã Roberta, mas sua mãe foi bastante prestativa e no geral ocorreu tudo bem. '}, {'_id': '154222451', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 5, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4798749', 'reviewer_id': '81964645', 'reviewer_name': 'Carlos', 'comments': 'A estadia foi excelente. Local super tranquilo e estadia agradável. O atendimento da Roberta e sua mãe foi ótimo. Perto do metrô (550m). Perto do Centro do Rio e da Zona Sul. Recomendo.'}, {'_id': '220695246', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 12, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4798749', 'reviewer_id': '159889937', 'reviewer_name': 'Ricardo', 'comments': 'Um excelente custo-benefício!
Roberta sempre foi extremamente solícita e pronta, tentando resolver quaisquer problemas rapidamente, e bastante flexível. Consegui em larga medida fazer check-in e check-out exatamente nos horários que queria.
O apto realmente fica a 500m do metrô, o que é uma localização privilegiada para quem estuda ou trabalha e precisa ir e voltar todos os dias, mas parte do trajeto é em aclive, o que pode ser um pouco cansativo sobretudo quando se volta para casa carregando compras, por exemplo.
Os móveis e eletrodomésticos funcionam todos bem, algumas coisas mudaram um pouco em relação às fotos (de Dezembro): o armário do closet não existe mais, há um suporte que permite pendurar uma quantidade razoável de roupas, mas pode faltar espaço para alguém que traga roupas para passar várias semanas ou meses; o fogão foi substituído por um modelo levemente inferior porém que funciona bem; a TV do quarto não existe mais, porém a TV de tubo da sala vista nas fotos foi substituída por uma muito melhor e maior de LED; a escrivaninha do quarto não inclui computador nem cadeira; e a disposição dos móveis na sala melhorou bastante em relação às fotos, a sala agora está muito mais organizada.
O apto é subterrâneo (subsolo 2), mas surpreendentemente apesar disso é um dos mais bem iluminados que já visitei, o único porém é a incidência aumentada de insetos. O espaço de modo geral é simpático e organizado, faltam apenas cortinas mais grossas, a da sala é muito transparente e a do quarto não permite que se veja através dela mas não barra a luz matinal.
De um modo geral, é um bom apto com alguns problemas, com uma anfitriã responsável e um preço altamente competitivo.'}, {'_id': '233176072', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4798749', 'reviewer_id': '24109207', 'reviewer_name': 'Thiago', 'comments': 'Ótima comunicação com a Roberta e seus pais, que nao mediram esforços em ajudar prontamente com qualquer problema. O apto é no subsolo de um prédio muito tranquilo entre Glória e Santa Teresa, excelente localização. Apto espaçoso e confortável, otimo banheiro/chuveiro, cama, quarto com ar, TV plana e grande, wifi excelente e máquina de lavar. Obrigado Roberta pela hospitalidade!'}, {'_id': '235362297', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 2, 16, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4798749', 'reviewer_id': '70465316', 'reviewer_name': 'Mônica', 'comments': 'Ótimo lugar para ficar com segurança e tranquilidade. Espaço muito bom e um local de fácil acesso.'}]

En la oferta decía 7 cuartos y cuando llegamos eran 6 cuartos, y nos toco enviar a otros amigos a un cuarto que el anfitrión ofreció como compensación, Los baños no cuentan con el servicio adecuado, de hecho no pudimos utilizar una habitación, por el mal olor que tenia el baño.  Adicional por el precio que pagamos no corresponde al apto.

Quedamos muy inconformes, lamentamos informar a todos los interesados que este apartamento es muy malo y no recomendamos su alquiler.
'}, {'_id': '15269714', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 6, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '16146129', 'reviewer_name': 'Matt', 'comments': "Great location on prime street in Ipanema less than a block from the beach. Very safe and nice area. Bath amenities and souvenir Brazil flags left in each bedroom.  Everything was very clean and lovely maids made breakfast every morning with eggs and coffee and fresh fruit. Great wifi service and Sonos as well. Also very good air conditioning in each bedroom. 

That all said, the apartment in real life does not look nearly as nice as it does in the photos. Each bathroom is a hodgepodge of different plumbing fixtures. One shower has the boiler controls in the wall inside the shower.  Water in the front unit (with balcony) ran hot and cold which made showering interesting.  Also a toilet in one of the front bedrooms has an electric pump to help it flush.  This is fine, except it also had a water leak from the tank to the bowl so the pump was activated every few minutes and the noise made sleeping in the bedroom impossible. The whole place could use a professional paint job. Overall it's a nice space with great potential but all feels a little too unfinished for what they are charging."}, {'_id': '21332632', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 10, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '6499761', 'reviewer_name': 'John', 'comments': 'Lovely flat great location. Great experience and great service from Alex both prior and during our stay."}, {'_id': '26613843', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 16, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '25271266', 'reviewer_name': 'Marco', 'comments': "Alex was an amazing host and made us feel very welcome. "}, {'_id': '26940231', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 22, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '27074937', 'reviewer_name': 'Geor', 'comments': 'Nos hospedamos en el Penthouse de Alex con 7 amigas y la verdad fue una muy buena experiencia. Los desayunos son abundantes y riquisimos y el servicio de limpieza muy atento y predispuesto. El anfitrión también súper amable y ha respondido a todas nuestras inquietudes previas a la estadía. Súper recomendable, de viajar otra vez a Rio con amigas seguramente volveremos!'}, {'_id': '38592941', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '31349613', 'reviewer_name': 'Juan', 'comments': 'Nos fuimos a Rio con 9 amigos a festejar los 40 años, la verdad que el departamento fue una grata sorpresa!. Realmente no fue el caso, el departamento era todo lo que decía, los cuartos en suite estaban todos muy buenos.  La terraza del penthouse estaba increíble, tenía vista a la playa muy linda, y era todo muy cómodo. Hacíamos todo caminando: la playa esta a 40 mts, y los bares y supermercados están muy cerca. Gracias Marta por todo! Algún día volveremos!. Slds Juan'}, {'_id': '42199061', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 11, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '3787743', 'reviewer_name': 'Norman', 'comments': 'when we arrived we found the appartment easily. the place is not on the front beach but very close. the place look a lot bigger in the picture but in fact is a lot smaller especially the rooms that are small. the wifi did not work for the hole stay and the cleaning ladies that were supposed to come did not show up the next day of our arivals. they came on he next days. the bose system also did not work and the air conditionning was only functionning in some of the rooms. the water pressure was very low so we could not have proper showers. the palce was ok but a lot too pricy for what is was. we had difficulties to get answers from the hosts even thought they always responded after some time.'}, {'_id': '43996785', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 23, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '13246581', 'reviewer_name': 'Evgeny', 'comments': 'We rented the whole penthouse. Most unfortunately nobody was in apartment at the agreed time of check in, neither the host was available over the phone during whole first day (neither ever replied SMSs messages). Once woman picked up the phone, quickly said the host will call back and hung up, then never returned the call. We got into apartment only by pure luck - previous guest was leaving and left us the keys.
Half of the penthouse bedrooms were not made up. In my bedroom bed sheets were not changed (! - noticed right before going to bed).
Next morning housekeeping lady arrived and sorted out everything. We were extremely happy with her and her peer services. However first day and night was a disaster :(
The location and neighborhood was perfect for us. 
Most of the rooms have very poor sound isolation from the street noise, which was quite annoying beginning 6am.'}, {'_id': '47663317', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '38595055', 'reviewer_name': 'Violeta', 'comments': 'Muy buen alojamiento! I highly recommend staying here and would definitely return! "}, {'_id': '53322997', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '16350227', 'reviewer_name': 'Greg', 'comments': 'The only nice thing about this apartment is the location. Other than that, everything else was great.'}, {'_id': '63878469', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '31290246', 'reviewer_name': 'Bruno', 'comments': "O Alex e a Camille são simplesmente sensacionais. Não só como pessoas, mas também como anfitriões zelosos por seus hóspedes.
Só tenho elogios a fazer a eles e a simplesmente maravilhosa e paradisíaca mansão que com eles alugamos.
Graças ao tratamento que me deram antes, durante e depois da nossa estadia, posso dizer que foi um final de semana que jamais esquecerei e que, se Deus quiser, um dia não muito distante terei condições de repetir.
A mansão é linda, muito bem localizada, com ponto de taxi, farmácia, mercado e padaria no próprio quarteirão. Enorme, cheia de ótimos quartos e com uma área externa maravilhosa.
Alex e Camille, MUITO OBRIGADO. De verdade!


Alex and Camille are simply sensationals. Not only as individuals but also as zealous hosts for their guests.
I have only praise to give to them and simply wonderful and heavenly mansion with them rent.
Thanks to the treatment they gave me before, during and after our stay, I can say it was a weekend I will never forget and that, God willing, one day not too far I'll be able to repeat.

It is modern, relaxing, beautifully designed and comfortable, we felt like staying in a luxury hotel. 
My friends and I spent the most perfect holidays and we would never want to leave this place.

"}, {'_id': '80103630', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 6, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '48305', 'reviewer_id': '56248987', 'reviewer_name': 'Kat', 'comments': "We were Group of 12 and we really enjoyed our stay here, Alex and Camille were fantastic with great communication throughout, the penthouse is absolutely beautiful and the staff were always on hand to cater to our needs!  I would highly recommend this Penthouse to anyone and everyone. I will certainly be staying here again with family and friends. Thank you kindly Camille and Alex and your staff ! 

Nothing was too much trouble and Alex went above and beyond to make sure we were looked after, day and night.  The breakfast was also amazing - delivered freshly made to our door and prepared in our kitchenThe penthouse  is even better as it appears on the website and what a location, we were right on the Beach of Ipanema, steps away from our now new favorite brazilian restaurant Garota de Ipanema where I tasted one of the best steaks I ever had.

The only thing we missed was the nice weather during our stay as we came during a rainy week, however  we were able to watch movies in the living space on a projector screen which was pretty awesome!  There is a supermarket, bank, taxis, restaurants, metro station, ATM’s, Starbucks, Bar, and fast foods less than 5 minutes walk away and you must try ‘Polis Sucos’ just around the corner for the best fruit juices and Acai .
The other feedback is just to be clear about your expectations from the staff, they are happy to be working around your wishes and be present or absent depending on how you would like and plan your holiday, and it also comes down to the language barrier so just let Alex know what you would like when you arrive if you do not speak portuguese. We had a wonderful time and can't recommend the Alex or the Penthouse enough. The property is great. Large, bright, clean, well-equipped, and just great for families with children. It's a beautiful living space with comfortable bedrooms and a large living room. The penthouse terrace is lovely and allows for impressive views over the water at Copacobana and Ipanema. 
The best thing about this flat, however, is its location, which is just perfect for holidaymakers. It is 5 minutes to Copacabana beach and 5 minutes to Ipanema beach (by foot). There are loads of good restaurants within a stone's throw, several supermarkets, a metro station (Gen. Osorio) and plenty of shops. Being this close to the beaches, with easy access to the rest of the city (taxis available everywhere), was perfect for us.
Celia is a gracious, helpful and generous host and I can't rate her highly enough! She went well out of her way to make our stay special and those extra touches were really appreciated (especially the leftover carnaval costumes!) (oh yeah, and the delicious mountain cheese). She had plenty of good tips for restaurants and other activities in the neighbourhood.

Highly recommended!

I booked this apartment last-minute.  Celia responded extremely quickly, approving my request.  After my booking was accepted, Celia was very communicative regarding the arrival of my friend and me to ensure she would be there to greet us.  Unfortunately, I missed my flight to Rio but Celia took this in stride and made sure to meet my friend after seeking pertinent details about him.  

Once I arrived, I found an apartment that is beautiful, comfortable, well appointed, eclectically and artistically decorated, full of natural light, and centrally located between Copacabana and Ipanema.  The building feels secure with 24-hour doormen and is on a busy street.  The location is convenient to the beach, many restaurants, and markets.  The internet was fast and reliable.  The air-conditioning, appliances, and fixtures are all new and work well. 

Celia is a wonderful and warm person who handled an unusual situation with grace and aplomb.  Unfortunately, my flight leaving Rio was canceled after I checked out of Celia's home.  With no cell phone signal and non-existant wifi at Santos Dumont airport, my best solution was to go back to Celia's apartment hoping to rent it for another night.  Unfortunately, Celia and her family had moved back into the space making it unavailable to me.  Celia was very understanding of my situation and was helpful in finding a new accommodation for the evening.  Although I felt like I was intruding, Celia (and her daughter their pet dachshund) understood the necessity of my coming back could not have been more warm and kind.  

I would highly recommend renting this apartment and hope I am welcome to do so again.   Celia speaks excellent English and is a very interesting person who I sincerely hope to meet again."}, {'_id': '57531365', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '9937274', 'reviewer_name': 'Sonia', 'comments': "We spent a fantastic time at Celia and Ze's appartement; everything is perfect; it is clean, the location is good, there is AC which is important in Rio, the rooms are quiet (which is very rare in Rio!) the bathrooms are clean, well equipped and comfortable, and the terrasse is a big plus; we will come back for sure!!! Además de estar atenta a los detalles, nos ayudó con un taxi en nuestra llegada por ejemplo. Nos consiguió una pava para calentar agua rapidísimo y una tostadora. Ellas es muy agradable. Lástima que hubo algunas cosas en el departamento que no funcionaban y no pudo reparar: el agua de las duchas salía tibia y para los días frescos de invierno que nos tocaron no llegaba a estar lo suficientemente caliente. La habitación en suite en las fotos se veía blanca y al llegar nos encontramos con que las paredes estaban pintadas con dibujos hechos a mano que no eran muy agradables, de hecho nuestras hijas no se animaron a dormir ahí. Y en esa misma habitación había un vidrio roto en la ventana. Nosotros íbamos con dos nenas de 6 y 2 años, un peligro! El resto, el departamento es muy lindo, canchero, tiene un balcón precioso con lindas plantas y está muy bien ubicado.'}, {'_id': '92078021', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '2894133', 'reviewer_name': 'Kim', 'comments': 'This place is great value for money, perfect location, relaxed vibe, fantastic views and huge terrace with outdoor shower. E o fato de estarem no andar de baixo do apartamento também nos deu muita tranquilidade. foi nossa primeira experiência e nos causou uma boa impressão.'}, {'_id': '116322662', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 11, 29, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '38368930', 'reviewer_name': 'Kevin', 'comments': "Celia is a very gracious and attentive host. The building is located in great safe location between Ipanema and Copacabana beaches. Morning jogs/walks along Copacabana for the sunrise and evening jogs/walks along Ipanema for the sunset are just a left or right turn out of the front of the building. The apartment is clean, spacious and as seen in the photos. The beds and pillows are comfortable and clean. The showers are spacious (unlike many Rio apartments) A bonus is the tranquility of the balcony during the day or night. We often slept with the windows open, and left them open most of the day. Traffic noise was almost non-existent. I suggest not using the A/C for those not accustomed to the Rio heat, the temperature changes will only make you sick. Although I've traveled to Rio many times before and am very familiar with the area, Celia was still able to suggest different places for us to try. We would definitely recommend Celia as a host and would return for another stay at this apartment without hesitation."}, {'_id': '117191087', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '3500005', 'reviewer_name': 'Margriet', 'comments': 'Beautiful apartment! The apartment is very stylish decorated and had everything we needed including a fully equiped kitchen, laundry machine, very nice terrace, beach towels etc. Celia was very helpful and easy to reach as she is living in the same building. She recommended a lot of nice places as well to go out for coffee, diner, drinks etc. We really enjoyed our stay and would love to come back again one day!'}, {'_id': '121119345', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 12, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '6868673', 'reviewer_name': 'Nick', 'comments': "By far one of the coolest apartments (not just on airbnb) I have ever been to.  A gigantic collection of books and movies, along with cool decorations.  If Ernest Hemingway had been a Carioca, this is what his apartment would look like :)   

Celia was great.  I booked this apartment the day before I needed it, and only for a 2 day stay.  She met me there when I arrived, and went over everything.  I've been to Rio a lot so I know my way around, but if this is your first trip, this is the host to point you in the right direction.  I didn't really need anything from her during the stay, but she is in the same building and was responsive to all messages.  Check out was a breeze and she got the contact info of my Brazilian friend in case I forgot anything.  Really went the extra mile (or kilometer haha)

As she says in the listing, the building itself is from the 70s.  Compared to US standards, all apartment buildings in Zona Sul seem outdated and this one is no exception.  The building and apartment have quirks which obviously come with the territory.  Elevators are slow and you have to walk a few steps.  There were some issues with the AC working in the living room but it was a temporary problem that I'm sure future renters won't have.  Nothing negative or deal-breaking, but if you are the type that expects new, modern, and pristine, this isn't the place for you.  If you like vintage and eccentric, this is definitely the place.  There is also a giant outdoor patio.  Rio is meant to be explored but I will admit my days got started later than normal as I enjoyed laying around so much.  And when it was raining outside, being cooped up in here was perfection.  Kitchen has about every single cooking implement imaginable, preparing a meal here would be easy.

The doormen were great and even during my short stay, the ones I hadn't met asked for my name.  Celia gives you a list of their names also, and its obvious these are real doormen, not the standard fare of guys sitting there watching tv.  Location is great and is a couple of blocks away from grocery stores, restaurants etc, not to mention Copacabana and Ipanema 2 blocks in either direction.  There are tons of apartments on airbnb that have similar looks and pricing.  If you want something unique for a great price, I highly recommend this apartment and host!"}, {'_id': '124254906', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 1, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '81383874', 'reviewer_name': 'Christophe', 'comments': "Nous avons particulièrement apprécié d'une part le Penthouse de Célia parfaitement équipé, confortable, situé à moins de 5 minutes à pieds des plage de Copacabana et Ipanema et d'autre part du parfait fonctionnement des climatiseurs présents dans chaque pièce."}, {'_id': '125956435', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '484267', 'reviewer_id': '98827110', 'reviewer_name': 'Patricia', 'comments': 'A casa e a proprietária são ótimas. The apartment is perfectly clean. The two bedrooms have air conditioner, the beds are comfy, and the door-windows are on the great terrace (with a shower ! On the terrace !). 
We spent awesome late evenings on the terrace. When you look left, Copacabana ; right, Ipanema with sunset ! The apartment is on the last floor.
The bathrooms are really nice, with towels, shampoo, soap, toothpaste ...
We also loved the kitchen, the decoration is tasteful and useful ! There is a big fridge, a lot of kitchen tools, plenty of seeds and seasonings free to use, filtered water tap ...
Everywhere in this house, we felt good, at ease, at home.
The wifi is fast. Copacabana is 2 minutes by feet, Ipanema 5. Shops, bars and restaurants around. Down the block, a fresh juice shop perfect for breakfast ! Very secure area. Building guard 24h/24.
From the beginning of the reservation until after the stay, Celia was the nicest host. She always responded immediately ! She welcomed us warmly and even came to say goodbye. She was really nice and super helpful for a lot of things, and she gave us precious advices.

  The view is awesome too. It's a mountain in the back and there aren't any neighbours on top of you so you have privacy. 
  I had a couple of questions while I was staying there and Ricardo respond very quickly, he even helped me purchase a SIM card so I have access to (Hidden by Airbnb) . '}, {'_id': '60843247', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4875052', 'reviewer_id': '54105275', 'reviewer_name': 'Richard', 'comments': 'We really loved our stay, the apartment was amazing the bed was so comfortable to sleep on 10min walk to beach I will definitely be coming back '}, {'_id': '61439770', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4875052', 'reviewer_id': '11277334', 'reviewer_name': 'Eric', 'comments': 'The apartment looked exactly like the pictures.  It was very clean, comfortable, modern and chic inside.  All the appliances worked well, including the shower and air conditioners, which is very important if you are staying in Rio during the summer!  The host (Ricardo) was extremely helpful.  He arrived at the scheduled time, explained in detail how all the appliances and amenities (including Wi-Fi) worked, and the check-in and check-out process were very quick and efficient.  He also gave me some great recommendations and tips regarding Rio and the area.  The apartment is in a great location, close to the beach, restaurants, and shops in Copacabana and was a great value for the price.  You can walk to most of the places you want in Copacabana and it was also convenient to get a taxi from the apartment.  I would definitely recommend the apartment to other guests and would stay there again. '}, {'_id': '62491588', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 15, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4875052', 'reviewer_id': '47059820', 'reviewer_name': 'Alfredo', 'comments': 'O Ricardo foi um ótimo anfitrião. Sempre respondeu aos meus questionamentos rapidamente e foi super pontual no check in. O apartamento é exatamente como descrito no site. Localização muito boa, próximo da praia, de estação do metrô e com supermercados e muitos restaurantes e padarias próximos. Completamente reformado e com móveis e utensílios de alta qualidade. Cama ótima, TV com NET, ar condicionado e ventiladores, tanto na sala como no quarto. Me hospedaria novamente nesse apartamento com toda certeza. '}, {'_id': '63476473', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4875052', 'reviewer_id': '17732281', 'reviewer_name': 'Mark', 'comments': 'We stayed in Rio for 6 days and were very happy about having chosen Ricardo's place for this purpose! The apartment looks exactly as in the photos, while being even brighter in reality (in the bedroom there are several large windows which we did not see on the website before). It is located in plain Copacabana, two blocks from the beach and 5 minutes walking to the Metro - making it perfect for a first stay in the city. Also at night we felt safe in the neighborhood, even though regarding restaurants and bars there is not much around and one has to go to other areas by Taxi. Unfortunately, while the rest of the apartment could be easily sold as "Luxury 1 bedroom", the kitchen is not so much of a luxury place to stay in and is only very basically equipped. While it is possible to cook, it's not so much of a fun experience and we did not encounter any basics such as olive oil, salt or pepper. On the other hand, you have a washing machine with dryer which is especially helpful while traveling. Finally, Ricardo is a very attentive host and waited for us in the apartment upon arrival. Every time we contacted him before and during the stay, he responded immediately and seemed to be available 24/7. As this is not the rule on AirBnB, we were very happy to have him as a host! So overall, Ricardo's place is very recommendable and we'd always like to come back!'}, {'_id': '65042247', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4875052', 'reviewer_id': '19116010', 'reviewer_name': 'Michael', 'comments': 'Had a great time staying here. '}, {'_id': '53131748', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '490098', 'reviewer_id': '3809070', 'reviewer_name': 'Vaida', 'comments': "Amazingly cute apartment in the best location. Perfect size for a single occupancy or a couple, open plan and has everything that you need for a nice holiday stay. Very secure, has a porter in the building  during the day as well and so super close to the beach. It looked very pretty in the pictures and it was even better when I arrived. Modern and vintage chic combo! Beautifully decorated. It even has a cute mini bar! 
Renata was a joy to deal with, got all my pre-trip questions answered, info provided and details explained. She's only round the corner so I could always drop her a message if I needed something. I was also able to check in earlier (I arrived in the morning), which was really helpful.
I've been in Rio before but Renata had lots of useful tips/maps of Rio and general advice.
Leblon is the best place to stay in Rio if you want nice neighbourhood, beach, cute shops and restaurants, juice bars and above all, not too touristy. It's like Soho in New York and Chelsea in London.

Really highly recommended! "}, {'_id': '53682613', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '490098', 'reviewer_id': '26085033', 'reviewer_name': 'Anne', 'comments': "We had a phantastic stay at Renata's appartment! I was a little wary at first, but I must say, staying at this property was a wonderful first experience and really contributed to the success of our trip.  

Renata was out of town, so was unable to meet us, but her father was patiently waiting for us at the apartment even though our flight was delayed several hours.  Upon arrival, he showed us around the apartment and left us with the keys.

The description of this property, "Best location in Leblon" could not have been more accurate.  It was less than a 5 minute walk from the closest metro station, Antero de Quental, on the new Line 4.  This station is only a few stops from General Osorio station in Ipanema.  The area was lively and felt safe.

There were tons of restaurants and two shopping malls very near to the property.  All of our best meals came from Renata's recommendations, so I highly recommend taking a look at those. 

Would definitely stay here again and recommend this property! Pertíssimo de bares, padaria (as melhores do Rio! [{'_id': '62025537', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4902451', 'reviewer_id': '50227644', 'reviewer_name': 'Kaíke', 'comments': 'A descrição do anúncio é totalmente de acordo com o imóvel, superando todas as minhas expectativas! O imóvel possui todos os utensílios necessários para uma boa estadia, fora os mimos como raquete com bolinha, wi-fi etc. Ao chegar no local, Alfredo me recebeu super bem, primeiro me levando a um excelente lugar para deixar o carro de forma gratuita e segura, me apresentou a seguir o imóvel e passou todas as informações pertinentes. O apartamento estava perfeitamente limpo, toalhas e roupas de cama branquinhas. Alfredo é super simpático e atencioso, certamente poderá ajudar com qualquer dúvida ou sugestão. Pessoalmente acho o local o melhor do RJ, Dias Ferreira no Leblon é um luxo só, pode-se fazer tudo a pé e no bairro estão os melhores bares e restaurantes. Frente ao imóvel tem um supermercado, ponto de taxi, Sushi Leblon e a poucos passos o famoso Belmonte. [{'_id': '28260287', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 3, 21, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '21402874', 'reviewer_name': 'Alexandre', 'comments': 'Se você tiver a sorte de reservar e ficar no Bucolic Art House, vai com certeza compartilhar da minha opnião. A casa é maravilhosa, muito além do que imaginava. A localização atende a todas as necessidades de deslocamento, transporte e a rua é calma, aprazível e super segura. A suíte é confortável e a casa oferece uma área comum com toda infraestrutura para o hóspede. 
Os anfitriões são pessoas maravilhosas e nos fazem sentir muito a vontade na casa. Sempre dispostos a ajudar!!!!'}, {'_id': '41791292', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '29122280', 'reviewer_name': 'Victoria', 'comments': "This was a great place to stay. The location was great for being close to the city but not in the middle of it, with a backyard and pool. The room where I stayed felt like my own apartment because of the private entrance and bathroom, which was really appreciated. The walk to the bus stop is not bad at all, 5 mins, but coming back it's a lot uphill. Overall, I would definitely recommend this place to someone visiting the city. "}, {'_id': '43537759', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '2003199', 'reviewer_name': 'Kristel', 'comments': "Gloria est un hôte disponible, bienveillant et particulièrement arrangeant. Elle nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaires quand aux moyens de déplacements sur Rio ainsi que sur les bon plans dans son quartier. 
Polyglote, notre hôte nous mis de suite à l'aise dès notre arrivée à l'aéroport et ce jusqu'à notre départ. 
La maison est magnifique. Située dans un quartier très calme et bien desservi, on s'y sent rapidement à l'aise. Et pour tout voyageur étant seul, il y a souvent d'autres voyageurs chez Gloria avec lesquels on peut échanger.
Le seul point qui pourrait être considéré comme négatif serait la montée pour y parvenir mais vous trouverez toujours un taxi pour vous y amener.
En ce qui concerne la suite Portinari, elle est un peu isolée dès autres chambres donc plus commode pour un couple en ayant tout de même la possibilité de socialiser quand il y a du monde près de la piscine. 
Nous recommandons vivement cet hôte. "}, {'_id': '44177949', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '34034716', 'reviewer_name': 'Fabrizio', 'comments': 'estadia maravilhosa. anfitrião atencioso e simpático. casa muito bonita, num local tranquilo e bem localizado. muito bem equipada, organizada e limpa. '}, {'_id': '45158067', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '4127073', 'reviewer_name': 'Lotte', 'comments': "The neighborhood is lovely and the house is very nice. I had a good room and Pablo's mother was very nice. The only thing I didn't like were the neighbors dogs. I love dogs but these two where right under my window barking a lot specially at night....."}, {'_id': '49010657', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '13422522', 'reviewer_name': 'Fanny', 'comments': 'I have spent a month at Pablo’s mother house. I have never seen nor spoken to Pablo directly, so it is difficult for me to write this review. I intended not to write a comment, but if I had known about the downsides of staying at this property, I would have stayed somewhere else. I noticed Pablo’s mother was highly emotional and aggravated upon the first 5 minutes of my arrival, after politely asking her if the room she was showing me was the same I had booked (the rooms did not have the same name). After seeing her disproportionate reaction to my question, I wrote to Pablo so that I could meet with him and discuss the fact that I was feeling unwelcomed (with the intent of making arrangements to cancel my reservation). He responded that it was a misunderstanding and that I was welcomed, so I decided to move on and let it go (him and I finally never met). I should have trusted my inner voice because from there, things slowly went downhill. I am not going into the details of everything she said and done, but at the end of my stay, I reported Pablo’s mother to Airbnb for psychological harassment (that was a first - I do not feed off negativity and I did everything I could to stay at peace with everyone). Also, the host filed a claim against me for clogging her sewer drain with my used tampons, which was rejected. Long story short, Pablo’s mother tends to blame everybody for everything without acknowledging her own responsibility. I addition, she is not always truthful, not tolerant and does not seem to appreciate people staying at her house, which does not feel homey at all. My analysis of the situation is that her defensive attitude is related to her fear negative comments (because she keeps tab of everything and seems to play a game of chess, which I refuse to engage in). In retrospect, I believe none of that would have happened if Pablo’s mother had an Airbnb account of her own. I also do not appreciate how Pablo handled the situation (he let his mother deal directly with Airbnb and never communicated with me via e-mail, phone or face to face). If I did not have an office space that I could go to everyday and if I was a fragile individual, my stay in Rio would have been deeply affected by this experience (which is why I am writing this review). On a positive note, I recommend staying in Laranjeiras if safety is your first priority, but maybe closer to Rua da Laranjeiras and not as high up in the hills. I am thankful that this place was extremely affordable; otherwise the price for staying there would have been quite high. '}, {'_id': '52581482', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '36793026', 'reviewer_name': 'Marcelo', 'comments': 'Local muito agradável, quase dentro da floresta da Tijuca. O local tem facil acesso à onibus (10min a pé) e até metro (10min de onibus). Anfinitrões bastante atenciosos e compreensivos.  Há diversas regras na casa que devem ser respeitadas para que sua estadia transcorra de modo tranquilo, como higiene e respeito ao meio-ambiente, basta ter bom senso e dar uma boa lida nas regras antes. De resto,  o local é realmente abençoado,  uma rua sem saída, silenciosa e com comércio e facilidades a pouca distância. '}, {'_id': '52810330', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '11541614', 'reviewer_name': 'Getúlio', 'comments': 'Hospitable and kind hosts. The house is beautiful and has many common spaces like psicina and TV room . 
The Suite Cesanne that we stayed is spacious and cozy.
The neighborhood is resideincial , quiet and safe . Next to markets and pharmacies. Our stay was great. I recommend'}, {'_id': '53028596', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '21402874', 'reviewer_name': 'Alexandre', 'comments': 'That goes to all Aibnb comunity.  
Once again I had the privilege and lucky to be able to book a room and stay at the Bucolic Eco Art House.
I believe that was my third time with them and the experience continuos to get better!!!  
The Hosts are the most friendly, well educated and nice people that you could possible wish to deal with.
The other gests as well are in the same mood. Full respect and joy to  be there.

Also, the house is close to shops restaurants and on Saturdays the market works perfectly. The house is pleased with its purity, green garden (mangoes fall on the ground), comfortable hammock, a clean swimming pool (transparent every day),very nice shover near the pool, wi-fi very fast and strong signal, comfortable kitchen (blender, coffee grinder, juicer).Strong water cold and hot every wear in home. Plenty of space for relaxation and a quiet reading. The room with private bath is very clean and \xa0is equipped with air conditioning and a fan. We were very happy to spend our holiday in this house. The next time we are happy to stay in this house, and advise my friends!

\xa0

\xa0

Гостиприимный Дом в котором мы были счастливы провести две недели находиться в очень живописном и безопасном районе. Место у подножия гор утопает в зелени. Чистый воздух, тишина, пение птиц, изумительный вид. Район и сам дом очень безопасные и находятся под присмотром камер и охранны. Очень благоприятные люди живут по соседству. Также дом расположен рядом с магазинами ресторанами и по субботам работает прекрасный рынок. Дом порадовал своей чистотой, зеленым садом (плоды манго падают на землю), удобным гамаком, чистым бассейном, комфортабельной кухней ( блендер,кофемолка,соковыжималка). Много места для релаксации и спокойного чтения. Комната оснащена кондиционером и вентилятором. Мы были очень рады провести наш отдых иммено в этом доме. В следующий раз мы с удовольствием остановимся в этом доме и посоветуем друзьям! =)'}, {'_id': '58507801', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '43033867', 'reviewer_name': 'Estefania', 'comments': 'Nuestra experiencia fue breve y muy satisfactoria con la atención de pablo y su flia. Matias y Estefanía'}, {'_id': '61891441', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '22094246', 'reviewer_name': 'Olivia', 'comments': "Nous avons sejourné 10jours chez Gloria, Alexandre et Pablo. Le quartier est complètement sécurisé, nous avons pu profiter de la vie nocturne de Rio sans problèmes! L'emplacement est idéal, commerces à proximité, bus desservant les différents quartiers (centro, lapa, plages...) en 15min max. et métro Largo do Machado à 5min en bus. Logement tenu par des hôtes accueillants et chaleureux qui vieillent au bon déroulement de votre séjour ! Du petit guide pratique des alentours aux conseils pour visiter Rio, tout est fait ici pour que nous passions un bon séjour !

Logement fortement recommandé !

Merci à Gloria pour ses gentilles attention et son hospitalité !

Nous avons ADORÉ Rio !!
Olivia, Mélodie et Binta

But if you want an area very central to everything in Rio you should choose this place. There is a metro station around 2 kilometers from the house.From this station you can go everywhere in Rio. You can safely walk, take a bus , uber or a taxi to the station. Its an autentic eviroment here in laranjeiras and people are so nice here. 

About the house:
A house with a lovely pool and a romantic and artistic garden , very friendly hosts who respect privacy and at the same time always is ready to give advises too. They speak english.
There is wifi here ,which functions very well also. 
The rooms are cozy and clean and the kitchen area is outdoor . You can sit there in nice sofas enjoying the sun in the daytime or at night enjoy the silence and the sounds of abes and tropical birds.
The owners of the house are both artists and that is obvious when you enter the house. There is a sence for details in the house.
I really enjoyed staying here several times and i will for sure return again.
I recommand this place to others .
Its a good price for good quality.'}, {'_id': '150334529', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 5, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '4964534', 'reviewer_id': '113219831', 'reviewer_name': 'Maurício', 'comments': 'Meu cantinho no Rio. [{'_id': '1713534', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 7, 15, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '564564', 'reviewer_id': '2786624', 'reviewer_name': 'Katja', 'comments': 'A very nice experience, Rosanne and her family are lovely and very helpful. Good bus connections to all places of interest nearby and two blocks to the beach.'}, {'_id': '3458383', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '564564', 'reviewer_id': '4426472', 'reviewer_name': 'Catherine', 'comments': "Thank you Rosanne for being such a lovely host for my two weeks in copacabana! The apartment is in a fantastic location in copa, close to the Santa Clara area which has great shops and restaurants - as well as being just a block or two from the beach. I was very comfortable in my room and from the moment when I arrived in the middle of the night because of a delayed flight, Rosanne and her family made me feel very welcome. On a practical note, the apartment is great because as well as the excellent location, it has good wifi, a good shower with plenty of hot water and its up on the 9th floor so away from the busy road below. It's easy to get around by foot and is also close to the metro and plenty of buses. There is breakfast in the morning you even have your own little fridge in the room. Do not expect 5 star luxury - this is someone's home, not a hotel, but is all the better for it! There is no air con but the two fans worked perfectly well and overall Rosanne is very considerate and goes out of her way to make sure her guests are comfortable.

The other reason this is a great place to stay is that everyone in the building was so helpful and friendly - the doormen will always stop for a chat! Rosanne has two delightful children who are incredibly polite and thoughtful towards her guests, as well as being very sweet and fun to chat to. Altogether a very relaxed and fun family to stay with and a great way to experience staying in this wonderful city. Highly recommended!"}, {'_id': '3547102', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 15, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '564564', 'reviewer_id': '1662162', 'reviewer_name': 'Anja', 'comments': 'rosanna and her family were lovely hosts. she answered all our question about rio de janeiro. the room and the whole apartment was nice and clean. the location is perfect to walk around the area copacabana and ipanema. really just one block from the amazing copacabana beach with a lot of fresh coconuts and tasty caipirinhas...
i would definitly stay at rosannas place again. 
thank you very much for the great time in rio!
buena suerte!

Жилье просто идеальное: чисто, тихо, близко к пляжу Копакабана (2 минуты ходьбы), рядом много супермаркетов и кафе.

Rosanne, Bruna, and Marcos (her children) are so friendly and helpful and my stay in Rio would not be as wonderful if it weren't for them. I also loved her two dogs, her cat, and three birds! I initially got a small but functional room for a few days but then someone else arrived and I got moved to a bigger room. Both are very good for the price, especially given the location of the apartment (one block away from the beach and a 10 minute walk to the metro station).  Both rooms have a private fridge, a desk and TV with cable. Breakfast is also provided.
The host Rosanne is great and makes you feel at home. Her two kids are incredibly well behaved. The internet connection is good. 
You will share the apartment with a few more "residents." There are two dogs with which you want to be friends with when you arrive. There is also a very cute cat. The only thing that made me feel uncomfortable are the caged birds, maybe this is cultural, but it was somewhat unconformable being in the living room with caged animals. 
The people that work in the building are also very friendly and there is a guard in the building 24 hours a day.
Overall a great experience!'}, {'_id': '26833520', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 2, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '564578', 'reviewer_id': '26926080', 'reviewer_name': 'Henri', 'comments': "Rosanne est très relax et sympa. [{'_id': '35440041', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 18, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '29377513', 'reviewer_name': 'Vera', 'comments': ' Meu sobrinho, para quem reservei o imóvel, ficou encantado com o Loft e eufórico por dormir em um mezanino de teto espelhado. Achou D+, diferente, irado!  Não queria ir embora! Disse que é lá que quer morar!
A Mary é  super atenciosa, prestativa, muito querida, nos atendeu e superou nossas expectativas em todos os sentido.  Sobre o espaço, concordo com meu sobrinho, é incrível! Só tinha visto antes esse tipo de imóvel em capa de revista de decoração. Aliás fiquei sabendo que o imóvel foi destacado pelo excelente e diferenciado aproveitamento de espaço. No prédio é considerado o apartamento mais bonito.
Quanto a organização, limpeza e todo o resto, é  impecável!  A localização excelente! Local seguro, porteiros prestativos, um recanto silencioso, claro, bem servido de comércio, meios de transporte e muito, muito mesmo pertinho da praia. Há internet de alta velocidade (isso era prioridade para o meu sobrinho), TV a cabo e o apartamento super bem equipado, tudo novinho! Se estiver em dúvida, não pense duas vezes, esse é o local, perfeito, super-recomendo!
Muito obrigada por tudo.
Bjs, Vera'}, {'_id': '38062033', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 12, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '12794318', 'reviewer_name': 'Jessica', 'comments': 'Fiquei no loft da Marilene com meu namorado durante uma semana e nossa estadia foi perfeita! A localização é ótima: rua super segura, uma quadra da praia (se atravessar pelo mercado Zona Sul, que é bem em frente, é como se fosse na mesma quadra), comércio de todo tipo em volta... O condomínio tem portaria 24h, elevador, a vizinhança é super simpática. O apartamento é um sonho! Quando chegamos estava tudo incrivelmente limpo, cheiroso e organizado. A iluminação é linda e aconchegante, o sofá é grande e super confortável, o chuveiro é a gás, uma delícia! A cozinha é toda equipada com tudo bem novinho (fogão, microondas e louças foram inaugurados por nós!). Tem até máquina de lavar. Na sala tem um closet que dá pra colocar todas as roupas organizadas, espelho gigante, muitos cabides... E a melhor parte: a cama fica num mezanino com espelho no teto! Incrível! Além de uma ótima decoradora de ambientes a Marilene é um amor de pessoa, simpática e prestativa demais, nos deu dicas valiosas de onde ir, onde comer, o que fazer... Fomos recebidos bem demais, nossa estadia no loft foi perfeita e somos muito gratos à Marilene!'}, {'_id': '39541238', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '13192055', 'reviewer_name': 'Janaina', 'comments': 'A Marilene foi super atenciosa. 
O apartamento é confortavel, bem equipado e bem localizado, em um bairro tranquilo, bonito e muito próximo a praia. Toda a experiencia foi muito positiva.'}, {'_id': '39989261', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '6662927', 'reviewer_name': 'Thiago', 'comments': 'Marilene foi muita simpática, atenciosa e preocupada com a minha estadia. Sempre estava pronta para ajudar. O apartamento é super bem localizado, bem arejado, claro, limpo, e está próximo a tudo (padarias, supermercados, restaurantes, farmácias) e sem falar que está a poucos metros da praia. Adorei o loft e com certeza recomendo.'}, {'_id': '40505353', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 31, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '13302016', 'reviewer_name': 'Xavier', 'comments': 'Eu me chamo Vívian e por ser carioca, já conhecia o bairro e já havia me decepcionado com falsas promessas de outros anfitriões aqui mesmo no Airbnb.
Marilene é impecável e leal no que se propõe, e creio assim seja em todas as áreas e escolhas que fez e faz, em sua vida.
O apartamento é inenarravelmente amplo, embora pequenino em metros quadrados. O espaço é maravilhosamente aproveitado e tudo é limpo e funcional, e agradável como deveria ser um lar.
Ela se dispõe a ajudar ao recomendar  e sanar dúvidas, desde a restaurantes do mais alto gabarito, até um simples local pra tomar um café rápido, saboroso e barato.
Além de ficar radiante em poder executar o desejo de habitar por alguns dias este loft delicioso, e de conseguir surpreender meu marido, Xavier, que é um pouco avesso a espaços pequenos; fiquei ainda mais alegre em conhecer Marilene que se mostrou um ser de alma reluzente, dona de um papo envolvente e de uma energia leve e boa.
Agradeço mais uma vez o tratamento recebido por mim e meu marido.
Recomendamos o loft a qualquer um que queira contratar exatamente o que é mostrado em fotos e descrições.
E, claro, já planejamos nosso retorno!
'}, {'_id': '43518834', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 8, 20, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '27944635', 'reviewer_name': 'Marin', 'comments': "Eu aproveitei meu tempo no loft da Marilene! Recomendo para duas pessoas ou menos.

I enjoyed my stay in Marilene's loft! She helped me find my way in the city and any other thing I needed. The location is great: a block from the beach and next to a grocery store. Muito obrigada.'}, {'_id': '52221675', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 27, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '24734682', 'reviewer_name': 'Nádia', 'comments': 'Minha estadia no loft da Mari foi perfeita!
