'}, {'_id': '53290813', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '43972702', 'reviewer_name': 'Maria Fernanda', 'comments': 'Minha estadia foi ótima, tudo perfeito, supermercado, restaurantes e lojas por perto, praia linda e limpa, voltarei em breve.'}, {'_id': '55120040', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '13302016', 'reviewer_name': 'Xavier', 'comments': 'Apartamento espetacular!

'}, {'_id': '61761903', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '50982072', 'reviewer_name': 'Carlos', 'comments': 'Realicé una  una estadia en Rio por tres semanas  por motivos de trabajo. El departamento de Marilene se encuentra muy bien ubicado, en un sector tranquilo de Leme, con movilización directa para practicamente toda la ciudad. En el barrio se encuentran servicios básicos (supermercados, farmacias, cafe, restoranes, gimnasio, etc), asi como  la playa de Leme. Es notable el aprovechamiento del espacio interior del apartamento, ofreciendo un lugar confortable para una y máximo 2 personas. El apartamento cuenta con internet y elementos básicos para cocinar. También cuenta con lavadora y aire acondicionado. '}, {'_id': '62902683', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 18, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '6778993', 'reviewer_id': '6635179', 'reviewer_name': 'Sebastian', 'comments': 'Si bien el departamento es pequeño, el espacio esta increiblemente bien aprovechado. [{'_id': '2936839', 'date': datetime.datetime(2012, 11, 21, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '4000591', 'reviewer_name': 'Marinês', 'comments': 'Estive por 4 dias, na chegada fui super bem recebida pela pessoa indicada para fazer meu check in, quanto o apartamento é uma graça bem equipado e tudo bem alinhado com as especificações informadas.

I didn t meet Silvia because she is not living in Rio but she has a friend who is taking care of everything. It s Tania. So Tania welcomed us very nicely, she is a very warm person and she is not living far from the flat if you need anything. Silvia called me when we arrived to be sure that everything is fine.
SO I would really recomand this place, nice, clean, safe, well situated and nice people taking care of you!

'}, {'_id': '10227591', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '9355859', 'reviewer_name': 'Guillermo', 'comments': 'muy linda experiencia, el dpto tal cual estaba en las fotos muy limpio, ordenado cerca de todo muy bien ubicado, muy lindo todo, tiene todo lo que se necesita para pasar unos dias especiales.'}, {'_id': '10381226', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 2, 17, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '7978504', 'reviewer_name': 'Charlo', 'comments': "I left my heart in Rio. Thanks, Sylvia!"}, {'_id': '15809517', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 16, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '5823487', 'reviewer_name': 'Paul Philippe', 'comments': "We were met by Deborah on behalf of Silvia and given a wonderful tour of the apartment and building. The 24/7 security staff is courteous and professional. Would recommend Silvia's apartment for anyone visiting Rio de Janeiro."}, {'_id': '18814982', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 9, 1, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '3941888', 'reviewer_name': 'Mario A.', 'comments': 'La atención fue maravillosa, nos recibieron de forma oportuna y rápida. El servicio y seguridad del lugar son muy buenos. La ubicación es perfecta para disfrutar de la playa y del ambiente turístico. Tiene cerca muchos lugares para conocer y disfrutar de la ciudad. Fácil acceso a sistemas de transporte (Bus y Metro) y a supermercados, droguerías y cafés para disfrutar de lo mejor de Rio de Janeiro. El apartamento es muy cómodo y cuenta con todo lo necesario para disfrutar de unas vacaciones en la ciudad. Nos sentimos muy a gusto y cómodos durante nuestra estadía. Seguro que regresaremos a hospedarnos allá, cuando volvamos a Rio de Janeiro. Gracias por la oportunidad de acogernos.'}, {'_id': '38321231', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 14, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '4215910', 'reviewer_name': 'Alex', 'comments': 'The flat was perfect! This is an automated posting.'}, {'_id': '47490594', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 19, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '10271057', 'reviewer_name': 'Erika', 'comments': 'This is a great place to stay in Copacabana! The apartment has everything you need (including comfortable beds, a good shower and a well-equipped kitchen) and has a nice, cozy feel to it. The location is perfect: close to the beach, but in a (traffic-wise) quiet street. There are several bars and restaurants around, which make the neighborhood feel safe during the night. 

Sandra who received us was very nice and helpful, and easy to communicate with. 

We definitely recommend this place, and hope to stay here  again!'}, {'_id': '60687541', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '48496221', 'reviewer_name': 'Exequiel', 'comments': 'El departamento es excelente! Tal cual como se ve en las fotos, es amplio, limpio, bien equipado, y cuenta con todos los elementos necesarios para una óptima comodidad. Muy cercano a la playa, a supermercados, medios de transporte, y a la avenida principal de Copacabana. Rodeado de bares, restaurantes, y cafés. Nos recibió Sandra (amiga de Silvia) en el horario estipulado, ella es muy amable y nos dió consejos en todo momento durante nuestra estadía. Silvia siempre respondió nuestras inquietudes al instante. Sin duda si retornamos a Río de Janeiro, nos hospedaremos allí nuevamente. Muchas gracias por hacer nuestra estadía más placentera.'}, {'_id': '65804861', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 17, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '35998589', 'reviewer_name': 'Alexandra', 'comments': "Our stay was excellent, and the place is exactly as described! 

The location is ideal, especially for young people. The street is pretty lively with several happening bars. It gets a bit loud at night, which we actually liked, but that's something to be aware of. It's one block from the beach, the grocery store, a taxi stand, and many many restaurants and stores. The area felt safe, even walking around at night. Obviously, we used caution, but it felt safer and more populated than some other neighborhoods we visited. Doorman always there and always friendly. 

Check in and out were simple. Silvia was helpful via text, and her associate lives in the building and was always accessible for questions (in person or via phone). 

The apartment looks just like the pictures. We were worried that there weren't windows, but there are! Everything worked nicely and it was very, very clean. There is a door that separates the bedroom and the living room, which was great because then we could both have our own private space. We stayed for 12 days, so this was helpful. 

One tip is to bring adaptors for plugs. We bought them easily at a nearby bookstore, but the plugs are 2 prong, Brazilian style, so our American electronics needed adaptors. "}, {'_id': '127572532', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '108880619', 'reviewer_name': 'Soledad', 'comments': 'El departamento es tal cual lo descripto en las fotos, muy cómodo y muy bien distribuído y equipado con utensillos de cocina, electrodomésticos, tender, placard, aire acondicionado, ventiladores de techo en ambos ambientes, etc. En el sofá cama puede dormir una persona mayor o dos niños pequeños, pero el frío del aire no llega hasta ahí, solo el ventilador de techo. Lo mejor de este lugar es que está excelentemente ubicado, rodeado de supermercados, farmacias, restaurantes, bares, fastfood, buses, metro y el corazón de la playa de copacabana a una cuadra, en una zona muy segura de día y de noche. Silvia estuvo pendiente en todo momento aunque no pude conocerla en persona. Nos recibió y despidió Bruno con total amabilidad. Lo recomiendo 100%'}, {'_id': '128758546', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '10088803', 'reviewer_name': 'Carine', 'comments': 'A Silvia foi muita atenciosa durante todo o processo. Nos fomos recebidos pelo o Bruno que eh um amor de pessoa. O apartamento nos atendeu perfeitamente. Localizacao excelente em Copacabana. 1 bloco da praia. Amamos!!!'}, {'_id': '226572279', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 1, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '125715610', 'reviewer_name': 'Jesse', 'comments': "Ok, Silvia's place is exactly as described and how it appears.  The location is absolutely one of the best in Copacabana Beach.  It is close to the subway, one block from the beach, near plenty of restaurants, and has tons of places to go at night.  If you like to go to bed before 1030, you will need earplugs, as a live band will be playing across the street....not a problem for me.  Two supermarkets are within 2 blocks, the hot water is hot, and the WiFi is OK most days.  I had two periods of approximately 18 hours (in one month) where it slowed to almost unusable.  I'm sure it wasn't related to Silvia, but rather the provider or maintenance.  Otherwise, I could stream movies, sports and music just fine.  My girlfriend and I were there for NYE and it is in the center of that as well.  I've been traveling nonstop for 5 months and staying in Air BnB the entire time.  I'd return to Silvia's place any time, without question...."}, {'_id': '368641440', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 7, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '746187', 'reviewer_id': '159647939', 'reviewer_name': 'Daniela', 'comments': 'Excelente!! muy buena ubicacion a 1 cuadra de la playa, limpio y con todo los elementos necesarios para la estadia.'}]

[{'_id': '58894849', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '7970000', 'reviewer_id': '29472995', 'reviewer_name': 'Pilar', 'comments': 'el departamento es mas que hermoso, parece sacado de una revista de decoración, la ubicación es divina, se ve el cristo desde el ventanal del living. La zona es de las mas caras en Rio, es preciosa, pero si la idea es estar muy cerca de la playa no esta bueno, al menos si vas varios dias. Renata siempre fue muy atenta hasta que se abono el importe, luego de eso la comunicación fue casi nula a pesar de que yo necesite ayuda. Nunca se me dio la contraseña del wifi, y se corto la luz un par de veces, por ejemplo. Salvo eso, estuvo todo perfecto. Lo recomiendo!'}, {'_id': '92163498', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 7, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '7970000', 'reviewer_id': '55026899', 'reviewer_name': 'Regina', 'comments': 'Como falei ele a hospitalidade não foi boa, foi inconveniente uma pessoa ficar mandando mensagem para voce sair do apartamento muito antes do horario, não prestar assistência para os problemas relatados de valvula de descarga quebrada e a não verificação de elétrica doa apartamento ficamos com medo de ter um curto circuito que pode acontecer nesses casos. Como falei o chuveiro eletrico cai a chave toda hora e depois apagou a luz e ficamos sem luz até o dia seguinte e tivemos que tomar banho frio e sem luz. Uma coisa que me incomodou foi que ela enviou a mensagem falando que eu tinha locado o apartamento para duas pessoas sendo que registrei o nome das quatro pessoas que estiverão hosopedads no airbnb, confirmando a minha tese de que ela nem olhou quem iria se hospedar e não proporcionpu o conforto adequado. Let me first start about the home!
The home is situated in the best location in Rio, as an Indian solo traveler my most important demand was security and a clean place. Aracele's home is situated in the best place in Rio, Ipenema. Great security and walking distance to ipenema and copacabana beach! There is a park right opposite the building, this park transforms into something magical everyday! A flea market on a Sunday with amazing stuff to shop, fresh produce fruits;vegetables;Pork;meat and local foods on a Tuesday and on every other day it's a beautiful park to meet amazing Brazilian people and their dogs! 
There are great restaurants around the park and bars u can just have a drink! The central shopping for havainas (a must buy ) and so much more is all just a hop, skip and jump! 
The home is clean, warm and perfect! 

Aracele as a host is the best ive ever been with! There is a reason why she is a super host! I travelled with no plan, no list of places to visit! On my first day she helped me with a list of places to visit and foods to eat. She welcomed me and gave me the confidence to go out there and have the best holiday I could have in a strange but beautiful country where no one speaks English!  

Aracele was not a host for me but became family, it felt like home and this holiday was my best ever and will always be remembered for a lifetime. Its people like Aracele that make this big world  a loving place to live in! 

Watever the price! LOCATION: 
It is situated in the heart of Ipanema. Everything is walking distance from the building such as, subway system, ground transportations, restaurants, groceries, banks, cafes, bars, hair salon, shopping stores, laundry, etc. It is right in front of the famous General Osorio Square, where, the Sunday Hippie Fair takes place. I couldn't ask for anything more.

ROOM:
The room is spacious, clean and comfortable. It has a mini refrigerator and a queen-sized bed. It provides a personal space from Ipanema's beach neighborhood. There's an exclusive toilet for the guest. Shower room is shared with host. Wifi is dependable. In general, it is a beautiful and airy home. You get more than your money's worth. 

HOST:
I did not have much interactions with Cele because she's working everyday. But she was very responsive on my text messages and cheerful when she's at home."}, {'_id': '215944046', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 12, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '8043869', 'reviewer_id': '10833352', 'reviewer_name': 'Harriet', 'comments': "Cele's apartment really does have one of the best locations in Rio! I would highly recommend to anyone travelling to Rio and I know I'll be back soon to stay there again!"}, {'_id': '216563661', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 12, 4, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '8043869', 'reviewer_id': '55801829', 'reviewer_name': 'Nicolas', 'comments': "Appartement très bien situé, proche de beaucoup de petits commerces de proximité, de la place, et d'un marché pour y trouver des petits souvenirs"}, {'_id': '221393896', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 12, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '8043869', 'reviewer_id': '24094238', 'reviewer_name': 'Lei', 'comments': '1) About the location

Monica is probably the best host I've dealt with up to this point with Airbnb. Monica was very flexible with our early arrival and gave us accurate directions on how to get to the apartment's location. Monica introduced us to the apartment and all of its amenities. The best part; Monica took her time to explain all of Rio's amazing activities. She is well organized and showed us plenty of tourist maps, books and suggestion booklet on arrival. 

Location
Location is as A+ as the host. The apartment's location is right in the middle of everything. Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon are steps away (not to mention Arpoador). The metro station is downstairs which can take you from Lapa all the way to Barra da Tijuca. 

Apartment
This is my 6th trip to Rio. Rio apartments for the most part are small. Monica's apartment is a good size and has everything you need (6 days for me and my gf). It was clean and well organized when we arrived.

Luckily someone told us about airbnb.com so we decided to have a look for a nice apartment near both beaches with a kitchen and all the mod-cons.  We found exactly that! The apartment is on the 9th floor in a complex and only a few hundred yards from Ipanema beach, and a 5 minute walk from Copacabana. There is also a 24/7 supermarket opposite the apartment.  The kitchen is reasonable and clean, a nice big lounge with cable TV and a comfy little bedroom with cupboard space and A/C.  There is one queen size bed which is fine for 2-people sharing and a single bed with an extra pull-out for a 4th person.  However, i think the room is at max, best for 3 people (we are 3 big guys).  The best part is the hotel-standard en-suite bathroom and shower. very nice!  
Cadu and Lilian were extremely helpful and made our short stay really helpful, recommending all the best sites, prices and good times to visit.  They also came to change the linen and towels whilst we were out which was really nice.
At the time we stayed there was also another (very pleasant) girl living in her own room with her own bathroom so just keep that in mind in case you want big parties etc.
Wholeheartedly recommend this apartment, and will definitely be coming back the next time i visit Rio!
Thanks Lilian and Cadu! She has provided me with all the information regarding the apartment, as well as with the comprehensive guide on how to get to the apartment from the airport. Lilian and Cadu have kindly checked me in despite on my late arrival. The welcome to Rio chocolate gift was such a sweet touch!
Then, the apartment itself exceeded all my expectations - it was located very close to Ipanema beach (Posto 8, Aproador rock), as well as in 10 minutes from Copacabana beach. There are lots of different shops and restaurants in the area, bus stops and a metro station. The building was on a safe and quite street with 24/7 doorman. We could use living room and a private bedroom with en-suite bathroom, sharing the kitchen with a fridge, dishes, and a drinking water. Lilian was so nice to provide even the separate kitchen towel for us.
The bed was comfortable, aircon was working well, cable TV with various channels, and the room was overall very clean when I've arrived. Bed linens and towels provided to us were also of a good quality and condition. Apartment has everything you need to stay. 
Again, I can't fully describe how I feel happy to find this place during the high season of Carnival for such a great rate, but most of all I was blessed to meet such nice and talented persons like Lilian and Cadu.

The apartment was clean, full of all necessary equipment and I guess this is the best location, 'cause you can either get fast to Ipanema beach or Copacabana.  "}, {'_id': '32986877', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 5, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '9908686', 'reviewer_name': 'John', 'comments': 'The good:

Location is close to Ipanema. I liked going to the part of the beach closest to the apartment. It's very close to a grocery store as well.

The ok:

The main bed is decently comfortable, but it was too small for us ( a skinny and not that tall couple). The other bed in the master bedroom was extremely stiff.

The bad:

Hosts didn't really take ownership over issues that came up and didn't seem very experienced with airbnb hosting.

Specifically...

I was surprised to find an open bag of sugar in a cupboard, because in this part of Brazil, that results in tons of ants.

There was scheduled maintenance on the apartment that resulted in electricity being out for an entire day, which they did not know about and thus failed to mention. They didn't offer any compensation and considered it not their fault.

The kitchen sink barely drained, but "it was fine when they left"
'}, {'_id': '36673492', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 6, 30, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '32234754', 'reviewer_name': 'Emma', 'comments': "The apartment is perfectly located (right next to Ipanema beach, very close to the subway and many bus stops). It looks just like the photos and fit myself and 2 friends very comfortably. The apartment is located on a very safe block with a large security gate and 24hr friendly doormen. Lilian and Cadu have thought of every detail: fast wifi, kitchen water filter, etc. which makes for a very comfortable stay.

I arrived close to midnight on a Saturday and was met by Lilian and Cadu's niece, Luisa, who kindly showed me the details of the apartment.

Lilian was very responsive before and during my stay. 

I highly recommend the apartment!"}, {'_id': '38123199', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 7, 13, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '17894317', 'reviewer_name': 'Ann-Marie', 'comments': 'Our hosts, Lilian and Cadu, were waiting for us when we arrived from the airport. They accommodated our early arrival and we were truly grateful for this. If you need tips or advice, Lilian and Cadu have a great wealth of information. 

The apartment was clean and had everything we needed on our first day in Rio. The apartment was close to the beach and is located in a great neighborhood. Ipanema is a safe neighborhood and with a doorman on duty 24-hours, we always felt at ease coming in late a night. When I visit Rio again, I am definitely staying here. '}, {'_id': '46311652', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 9, 9, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '41760499', 'reviewer_name': 'M. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay'}, {'_id': '49774873', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 10, 6, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '38335679', 'reviewer_name': 'Clint', 'comments': 'Great/Safe location in Ipanema. Definitely enjoyed it!'}, {'_id': '53449945', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '15312488', 'reviewer_name': 'Pablo', 'comments': 'El departamento en Ipanema es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, amplio, luminoso,limpio y cómodo. Tiene todo los electrodomésticos, vajilla y soporte que existe en toda buena casa bien equipada. La ubicación del departamento es muy buena, ya que esta a tan solo una cuadra y media de la playa y los servicios que existen alrededor del departamento contemplan todas las demandas de las que un turista precisa para pasarla bien.  Fuimos atendidos por Cadu en primera instancia donde muy atentamente nos mostró todo el funcionamiento del departamento. Cuando nos retiramos le dejamos las llaves a Solange en virtúd de que Lilian y Cadu no estaban en Río de Janeiro. Nos sentimos muy cómodos. La experiencia fue extremadamente muy satisfactoria. No tenemos ninguna duda de que cuando volvamos a Río elejiremos el departamento de Lilian e Cadu. '}, {'_id': '57233093', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '35084894', 'reviewer_name': 'Lisa', 'comments': "Great location, a block and a half from Ipanema beach, last metro stop in Zona Sul, and good shopping and restaurants. The apartment matches the host description. It's not exciting, but it is comfortable for 1-2 singles or a couple with 1 or 2 young children. I enjoyed my stay of 2 1/2 weeks. "}, {'_id': '61319804', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '10923378', 'reviewer_name': 'Francis', 'comments': 'I had a awesome stay at this flat, location the best ever, near the beach, near restaurants (all kinds), near a 24 hour supermarket,around the corner from the subway station and many bus stops that's brings you anywhere you want in Rio. The flat has 2 bedrooms, one very small but with AC and American style bed - it is on the top floor with a nice breeze all the time, so it wasn't to hot inside the flat. The kitchen has everything you need, fridge, freezer, often, micro, ice cold water supply (in Brazil you shouldn't drink tap water) it is always good to have a water-filter installed, Cadu and Lilian had a special drinking water fountain. 2 TV set one at the bedroom and one at the main hall and most important for me a good internet connection (WIFI) that worked at every corner inside the flat. The building is quit, friendly people and a great staff - some of them don't know you at first so you have to say in Portuguese "apartamento NOVE ZERO DOIS" and show them the key, that's means flat 902 - next time I'm back in Rio for sure this will be my number one choice and I will recommend it to many friends and clients I meet - greetings to all from lovely Vienna  '}, {'_id': '62502008', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 15, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '50833194', 'reviewer_name': 'Andrés', 'comments': 'Lilian fue muy preocupada y hospitalaria durante la recepción. Recomendable'}, {'_id': '63787126', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 27, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '878307', 'reviewer_id': '47177283', 'reviewer_name': 'Francesco', 'comments': 'Siamo stati 10 giorni nella appartamento  di Lilian  e Cadu  di Ipanema. Très  bien équipé  en mobilier, télé, vidéo, musique, divers linges de maisons , équipements de cuisine..., tout est à disponibilité dans cet appartement. Tout est facilement accessible et simple d'utilisation!!! 
On se sent rapidement chez soi tant on est à l'aise ici. Je me suis rapidement senti à la maison !!! Les commerces sont au pied de l'immeuble, tout est à portée de main, très importants, on peut faire ses courses à pied, sans pertes de temps !!!
Je retournerai sans problèmes dans cet appartement, Paulo est une personne formidable, généreuse, il est présent quand on à besoin de lui . Je lui avais demandé une faveur, il me l'à accordée dans la minute même, j'ai fortement apprécié ceci !!! MERCI Paulo !!!
Vous pouvez louer cet appartement les yeux fermés, j'en garde un très bon souvenir, j'y reviendrai lors de mon prochain séjour.
Ipanema est un quartier tranquille, calme, excellent compromis , l'appartement est idéalement situé dans la rue Visconde de Piraja, multitudes de commerces, de boutiques où vous pourrez faire du shopping ...vous trouverez tout !!!
Pour conclure, bel appartement dans une résidence sympa, pour passer d'agréables moments dans ce beau quartier .

Os ar condicionados não são splits. O ar do quarto era bem barulhento e o da sala era portátil e quase não refrescava o ambiente. Além disso, o ventilador de teto não pode ser usado pq fazia um super barulho e estava sem um pedaço.
Todos os detalhes mencionados acima podem ser facilmente resolvidos. Isto feito, o apartamento pode ser considerado 5 estrelas.'}, {'_id': '230547609', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 1, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '880678', 'reviewer_id': '100829926', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariano', 'comments': 'Excelente departamento , muy accesible su llegada y gran atención de paulo . O quarto é muito aconchegante, com TV, ventilador, varanda, cama e um guarda-roupa que acomoda quem costuma levar bastante bagagem. A Renata é uma ótima anfitriã, muito atenciosa, cuidadosa e gentil. Responde às mensagens com muita agilidade, nunca nos deixando na mão. É, também, bastante flexível, o que nos faz sentir em casa. Aconselho o seu apartamento para todos que queiram ter uma experiência inesquecível no coração de copacabana, pertinho de tudo e com uma decoração que é uma verdadeira cena de novela! Fiquei encantada com o apartamento e com todo o carinho e conforto com que fui recebida. Obrigada Rê, por todos os dias!!! Você fez das minhas férias a melhor de todas!!! Beijo Grannnnde...'}]

[{'_id': '54816210', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 23, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9258101', 'reviewer_id': '49331821', 'reviewer_name': 'Renata', 'comments': 'Nossa primeira experiência dentro do Airbnb foi (com diria a anfitriã) sensacional, espetacular (kkk).

Vi o anúncio numa busca rápida e me apaixonei pelo cantinho aconchegante e acolhedor. Quando cheguei no local e fomos recepcionados calorosamente pela anfitriã e nos deparamos com o local exatamente como estava nas fotos, me fez sentirmos presenteados pelo destino.

Eu e meu marido não imaginávamos encontrar uma anfitriã que realmente se preocupasse com você nas mínimas coisas.
 
SUPER INDICO. Lugar pequeno e projetado para você se espalhar. A vista da janela então é encantadora e privilegiada. Ao sair do prédio, agente se encanta mais ainda com o local, pois acima de você está os pés do Cristo. Querida anfitriã, que "espetáculo".

Obrigada querida pelo carinho, a preocupação durante toda a estadia, por todas as ligações querendo saber se estava tudo bem e nos dando altas dicas de lazer e diversão. Adoramos que você abriu uma excessão e ter nos presenteado com a sua companhia num passeio inesquecível, onde conhecer um artista de mão cheia em Santa Teresa, chamado Getúlio, são pra poucos. 

Não esperaremos convites kkkk apareceremos em breve, com certeza!

Até a próxima ;)'}, {'_id': '55155394', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 11, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9258101', 'reviewer_id': '5231191', 'reviewer_name': 'Caio', 'comments': 'Tanto a Dani quanto o apartamento foram incríveis! Super atenciosa e amigável e com uma energia incrível. Me senti totalmente em casa desde o momento que cheguei até o momento que saí. O apartamento é maravilhoso e fica em uma localização perfeita! Rua silenciosa e amigável, com mercados, restaurantes, bares e posto 24h pertinho e o acesso é super fácil! O porteiro/funcionário do prédio, Henrique, foi um querido também e só contribuiu positivamente para a experiência.
Me hospedarei novamente com certeza! 

Both Dani and the apartment were amazing! The host was very welcoming and ready to help and assure the best experience possible. I felt at home from the moment I arrived to the moment I checked out. The apartment is incredible and in a perfect location! Silent, friendly street with supermarkets, restaurants, bars and a gas station with a great "7eleven" open 24/7 at walking distance. The access to the apartment is easy, with bus stops nearby to almost every part of the city. The doorman/janitor of the building was also lovely and contributed very positively to the whole experience. Will be coming back for sure! <3'}, {'_id': '55583752', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 2, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9258101', 'reviewer_id': '13168822', 'reviewer_name': 'Louise & Jean', 'comments': "SUPER BEL APPARTEMENT !!!!  Bien situé dans un beau quartier calme de Rio de Janeiro et sécuritaire,  cet appartement est le secret le mieux gardé de Rio de Janeiro.  Tout est fonctionnel,  rénové et bien pensé.   C'est SUPER PROPRE !!!  Et c'est près de tout: épiceries,  bus,  métro de surface (Estação Maria Angélica), restaurants, cafés et parcs, tout ça à quelques minutes de marche.  Les photos représentent bien l'appartement.  Dani m'a fait sentir chez moi.  J'ai posé plein de questions dont elle avait toutes les réponses.  Dani est une hôte charmante.  J'ai adoré resté à cet appartement.  Belle fenêtre avec vue sur les arbres.   La rue en avant c'est un cul-de-sac (rue sans issue),  c'est la raison pourquoi que c'est tranquille.  Si je retourne à Rio de Janeiro,  c'est certain que je reviendrais à cet appartement.  Merci pour tout / Obrigado por tudo Dani !!!"}, {'_id': '56157491', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 9, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9258101', 'reviewer_id': '50240696', 'reviewer_name': 'Eduardo', 'comments': 'O apartamento está ainda melhor que nas fotos. Se, nas imagens do site, vemos um charmosos local com cama suspensa e cozinha, na nossa estada experimentamos um local que cheira a novo, com pintura recente, utensílios de cozinha novíssimos, assim como toalhas e lençóis. Isso não é tudo. A Dani é uma anfitriã especialíssima, não só porque nos recebeu muito bem e ajudou a montar a nossa programação turística e cultural, mas, sobretudo, porque cuida pessoalmente de tudo. Assim, haverá muitas surpresas na casa, como as tocas de banho descartáveis sobre a pia do banheiro, sabonetes e shampoos, guarda-chuva no armário, espaços etiquetados com instruções para uso dos equipamentos e organização do imóvel. Por tudo isso, a nossa estada no Rio de Janeiro teve o melhor do conforto de um hotel com o melhor do aconchego de uma casa de amigo. Finalmente, vale dizer que o apartamento é muito bem localizado, bem próximo ao Parque Lage e ao Jardim Botânico e com fácil acesso a praias e ao centro (Website hidden by Airbnb)'}, {'_id': '56569092', 'date': datetime.datetime(2015, 12, 14, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9258101', 'reviewer_id': '4255729', 'reviewer_name': 'Maria Clara', 'comments': 'Dani is the perfect host. Highly recommended!'}, {'_id': '59504476', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9258101', 'reviewer_id': '30600062', 'reviewer_name': 'Daniel', 'comments': 'Dani foi uma ótima anfitriã. A minha comunicação com Dani foi ótima! Apesar de estar viajando Dani não deixou de se comunicar com os hospedes para saber se tudo estava bem. [{'_id': '3638493', 'date': datetime.datetime(2013, 2, 26, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '926669', 'reviewer_id': '5039654', 'reviewer_name': 'Francesco', 'comments': 'Great host, nice and cozy apartment! It's a great place in a great location.  The apt is rather large, has been newly renovated and is two short blocks from Copacabana beach.  My girlfriend and I also stayed at another one of Renata’s properties nearby and really liked the Copacabana area.  There are plenty of restaurants, shops and bars close by, and of course you have a world class beach just a couple blocks away which was the main attraction for us. We also did quite a bit of walking and this apt lends itself to a 20ish minute walk to Ipanema beach and a 40ish minute walk to Leblon.  I highly recommend making those walks as you end up on a series of world class beaches the vast majority of the time and views and beaches are stellar.

Working with Renata was a pleasure. She was flat out great and has been the best host and person I have come in contact with while using airbnb.  We had a change of plans and needed to make this reservation at the last minute and she was able to accommodate. Our flight also didn't leave Rio until the late evening and she was a huge help in locating a place where we could leave our bags for the day. 

We hope to make a trip to Rio again at some point and when we do we will definitely reach out to Renata.  Thanks again for all your accommodations, recommendations and help Renata.  It was all very much appreciated. "}, {'_id': '10795640', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 3, 8, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '926669', 'reviewer_id': '6258192', 'reviewer_name': 'Michael', 'comments': 'I recommend this accommodation of Renata. And renata has provided me with really good tips to explore rio."}, {'_id': '23529254', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '926669', 'reviewer_id': '23002133', 'reviewer_name': 'Areta', 'comments': 'We HIGHLY recommend Renata's studio and especially recommend her as a host as we know she has other properties in the area. We stayed in the Green Studio (I called it) one block from Copacabana beach post 6 for 8 wonderful nights. My husband and I had to go to Rio in Nov for business and since we did not know anyone there we thought of trying out Airbnb (which is very popular in SF were we live). We were attracted by the slogan "feel at home any part of the world" and thats exactly how we felt in Renata's apartment, at home. By the end of our trip, we where saying to each other "lets go home?" Hehe.
When we arrived we were greeted by Renata with so much attention and care. I felt like I was being received by a friend I'd known forever. She helped us with tips about the area, a list of restaurants and things do. When we needed her she was available and we felt so fortunate to have met her! 
The apartment was exactly as advertised! The bed is super comfortable, tons of closet space, easy to organize for long stays, there is a sweet little kitchen and laundry tank. The building is very clean and safe too! The 24hr doormen where all super sweet and attentive. The neighbors were friendly with us. We felt very safe in the building. We loved the neighborhood and the location and made a lot of friends there. We would walk to the beach and back several times per day. 
The location is prime, I would give a super high walk score, we walked everywhere! The supermarket was one block away, the pharmacy is on the corner, the post office, restaurants, bars, stores, shopping centers, and flea markets are all walkable. The taxis stop in front of the building and the bus runs on the streets above (to Leblon, Ipanema and Barra da Tijuca) and  below (Leme, Lapa and the city Center). Over all we were super satisfied with our stay! We will for sure come back and stay with Renata next time! Obrigada por tudo Renata!'}, {'_id': '24443575', 'date': datetime.datetime(2014, 12, 28, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '926669', 'reviewer_id': '24915405', 'reviewer_name': 'Desiré', 'comments': "We stayed in Renates studio for Christmas and we had a wunderful time. [{'_id': '58956038', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 5, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '9091460', 'reviewer_name': 'Mariana Satie', 'comments': 'Excelente acomodação, na rua da praia da Barra perto de tudo, mercado, restaurante, baladas. 
Praticamente pé na areia. 
Ao lado do Sheraton. 
Muito bom, adorei!'}, {'_id': '62097783', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '54453236', 'reviewer_name': 'Roberta', 'comments': 'Excelente localização em frente à praia e ótima recepção dos anfitriões!'}, {'_id': '95233599', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 8, 18, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '57663123', 'reviewer_name': 'Andrea', 'comments': 'Desde el primer momento de contratar y durante toda la estadía en Río,  Erika respondió amablemente todas mis consultas al instante, me asesoró en lo que necesité y me dio mucha tranquilidad saber que contaba con ella para cualquier eventualidad y nos sentimos muy agradecidos por ello. El lugar es tal cual se describe, fui con mi marido y mis dos hijos adolescentes ( 12 y 17) y nos sentimos muy cómodos. Nos esperaba el Papá de Erika, muy amable, con varias bebidas frescas, leche, manteca, pan, bombones que nos fueron de utilidad por el horario en que llegamos a instalarnos. La cocina está completa para cocinar, hay cafetera, tostadora, toallas de cocina, manteles, hay agua caliente, hay ventiladores de techo en ambos ambientes y aire acondicionado, tiene placares grandes, y teníamos sabanas limpias y varias toallas. El baño tenía jabón, pasta dental y papel higiénico. Había sombrillas y sillas para playa, que nos vinieron muy bien. Saliendo del condominio, que tiene seguridad las 24hs. y cruzando la calle está la playa que es bellísima  y con olas muy divertidas.  Esta el Sheraton muy cerquita, hay bares y restó, cajero, kioscos, y hay un sector que tiene farmacia, mercado, panadería y comida lista para llevar o consumir ahí mismo,  todo ello  a 2 /3 cuadras. El Papa de Erika, muy amable, llevo en su auto a mi marido para indicarle el lugar de compras. Respecto al transporte hay taxis a cada instante y pasan líneas de colectivos. El lugar y la ubicación son justos para una disfrutar una excelente estadía en esa linda ciudad. Muy agradecidos con Erika y su Papa! Hasta la vuelta!'}, {'_id': '114570883', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 11, 19, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '10390107', 'reviewer_name': 'Clarissa', 'comments': 'Eu fui ao Rio de Janeiro com uma amiga/colega de trabalho para um congresso. A nossa estadia no apartamento da Erika foi no geral boa. O apartamento é pequeno, mas é completo. Tem cadeiras de praia, guarda-sol, cafeteira, torradeira... O Sr. Waldyr nos recebeu com muita atenção e preocupação, mostrou-nos o apartamento, explicou algumas coisas, e até mesmo deixou água, sucos e refrigerantes na geladeira para nos receber. A receptividade dele foi extraordinária. Os únicos aspectos que nos decepcionaram e foram pontos negativos foram não ter wifi no apartamento e sim no condomínio e com sinal extremamente fraco, o que nos impossibilitou de utilizá-lo e o colchão, que era muito firme/duro não sendo confortável. '}, {'_id': '124284408', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 1, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '14354202', 'reviewer_name': 'Micaela', 'comments': 'El apartamento es super recomendable, excelente ubicación. La playa excelente y los transportes muy cerca. El apartamento tiene todos los servicios, aunque la red wi fi no funciona muy bien. Erika estuvo atenta al (Hidden by Airbnb) y a todas nuestras necesidades.
El lugar es tal cual se describe, fui con mi marido y mis dos hijos ( 9 y 12 años) y nos sentimos muy cómodos. Aunque nos desencontramos con el papá de Erika (llegamos el 25/12 con demoras) nos esperaba el departamento con varias bebidas frescas y bombones 
La cocina está completa para cocinar, con vajilla, hay cafetera, tostadora, toallas de cocina, manteles, hay agua caliente, hay ventiladores de techo en ambos ambientes y aire acondicionado, tiene placares grandes, y teníamos sabanas limpias y varias toallas. El baño tenía jabón, pasta dental y papel higiénico. Había sombrillas y sillas para playa, además de una tabla de barrenar de la que mis hijos hicieron muy buen uso! Y un tv con cable pero no lo utilizamos.
El complejo tiene además un sauna, un gimnasio pequeño y duchas exteriores para sacarse la arena de la playa. Además un lavadero para lavar ropa a mano y colgarla. Juegos para niños y una cancha de fútbol.
Saliendo del condominio, que tiene seguridad las 24hs. y cruzando la calle está la playa que es bellísima, tranquila de día y con olas por la tarde.
El hotel Sheraton muy cerquita, hay bares y restó, cajero, kioscos, y hay un sector que tiene farmacia, mercado, panadería y comida lista para llevar o consumir ahí mismo, todo ello a 2 /3 cuadras. Respecto al transporte hay taxis a cada instante y pasan líneas de colectivos. El lugar y la ubicación son ideales para una disfrutar una excelente estadía en esa linda ciudad. Muy agradecidos! Hasta la vuelta!'}, {'_id': '127697381', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 1, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '68869251', 'reviewer_name': 'Renan', 'comments': 'Uma vila em plena Barra da Tijuca!
Localizado a uns 300m da praia por conta da distância da portaria do Condomínio até o apto mas é só atravessar a Av Lúcio Costa!

Local seguro e silencioso, com tudo o que precisarem de utensílios.

Não é muito espaçoso porém acomoda bem um casal e 1 filho.

Única sugestão seria um ar condicionado split pois o de parede é muito barulhento; no mais, PERFEITO!!'}, {'_id': '136551574', 'date': datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 11, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '3411664', 'reviewer_name': 'Nana', 'comments': 'Erika was a great and attentive host. Except all of that, the doorkeeper watches the entrance all the time so you don’t need to worry about security or thieves. The place has everything you would expect and I have no complaints about it. Erika, once again, thank you  '}, {'_id': '369395023', 'date': datetime.datetime(2019, 1, 10, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9590078', 'reviewer_id': '82456493', 'reviewer_name': 'Fernando Oelze', 'comments': 'Casa pequena e confortável num condomínio muito seguro e aconchegante na Barra, de frente à praia. [{'_id': '58652157', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9614181', 'reviewer_id': '14800364', 'reviewer_name': 'Bruno', 'comments': 'A finalidade da minha hospedagem foi atendida (festas de reveillon). [{'_id': '58681314', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9643051', 'reviewer_id': '8749275', 'reviewer_name': 'Lisette', 'comments': '
La casa de Ewa y Davi resultó mucho mejor de lo que pensábamos, era hermosa, muy limpia y el desayuno muy rico tal cual lo ofrecen. Los anfitriones fueron muy amables y nos dieron recomendaciones para visitar Rio, incluyendo guías preparadas por ellos mismos que nos ubicaron rápidamente en el barrio y nos ayudaron a sacarle el mayor provecho al viaje. "}, {'_id': '63145457', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 2, 20, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9643051', 'reviewer_id': '13891166', 'reviewer_name': 'Juliette', 'comments': "We spent 2 nights and Ewa and her boyfriend's place. [{'_id': '58631806', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 3, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9853331', 'reviewer_id': '20358570', 'reviewer_name': 'Felipe', 'comments': 'O apartamento da Paola é excelente. Os quartos são ótimos, com muito conforto e armários. Todos os cômodos possuem ar condicionado, item indispensável para o verão carioca. A localização é perfeita, próxima da praia, restaurantes e supermercado. Fomos muito bem recebidos e a Paola se mostrou sempre à disposição para nos ajudar. Recomendo fortemente o apartamento.'}, {'_id': '60328938', 'date': datetime.datetime(2016, 1, 22, 5, 0), 'listing_id': '9853331', 'reviewer_id': '7418516', 'reviewer_name': 'Julieta', 'comments': 'Nuestra estadía en el departamento de Paola fue excelente! El mismo se encuentra tal cual se muestra en las fotos recientes (cuenta con WiFi, 2 TV, A-C en todos los ambientes, blanquería de sobra, shampoo y acondicionador de 1ra calidad, etc, etc, hasta frutas frescas!) IMPECABLE! Al igual que el edificio (de categoría), que cuenta con seguridad 24hs, en un barrio inmejorable para una estadía familiar (supermercados, shopping, comedores, lugar para estacionar en la puerta,etc.) y a solo 3 cuadras de la playa.
A Paola nunca la conocimos personalmente, pero igual siempre se mantuvo en contacto y a disposición para asegurarse que todo estuviese bien. Cabe destacar la simpatía y amabilidad de Caio -quien nos recibió y despidió- siempre atento hasta al mas mínimo detalle para nuestra comodidad. Si la estadía fue excelente, la atención fué aún mejor!
Muy recomendable y volveríamos, sin dudas! The place is a good cost benefit. A localização é ótimo, muito perto da praia. Fomos muito bem recebidas e sem nenhum atraso.'}, {'_id': '327806725', 'date': datetime.datetime(2018, 9, 24, 4, 0), 'listing_id': '9853331', 'reviewer_id': '63744716', 'reviewer_name': 'Eusebio', 'comments': "This is a big apartment I stayed in for 10 days. The location is great in a Leblon which is very safe and near the metro which takes you into central RJ, walking distance to the beaches of Leblon & Ipanema.  The block is getting on a bit but has 24-hour security/porter and you will need to give a copy of photo ID to them to access the block.

The apartment could do with updating but is comfortable and has a/c in every room. The washing machine/cooker works well and there are plenty of pots/pans/crockery etc. The things that dragged down my score overall is the lack of hot water anywhere but the showers. There is no kettle in the kitchen so making tea or/and boiling water to wash dishes needs to be done in a pan. The bedroom window needs repairing because it doesn't close and swings in the win, making noise. The fridge had a leak and the top shelf was covered in water each day. Though there is cable tv you will only get a handful of Brazilian channels (go out I guess).
